Yamaka of the Abhidhamma Pitaka, Part I:
I. Mula-Yamakam
II. Khandha-Yamakam
III. Ayatana-Yamakam
IV. Dhatu-Yamakam
V. Sacca-Yamakam
VI. Sankhara-Yamakam
VII. Anusaya-Yamakam


Based on the edition Rhys Davids
London : Pali Text Society 1911 (Reprinted 1987)


Input by the Dhammakaya Foundation, Thailand, 1989-1996
[GRETIL-Version vom 14.07.2016]


NOTICE
This file is (C) Copyright the Pali Text Society and the Dhammakaya Foundation, 2015.
This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

These files are provided by courtesy of the Pali Text Society for
scholarly purposes only.
In principle they represent a digital edition (without revision or
correction) of the printed editions of the complete set of Pali
canonical texts published by the PTS. While they have been subject to a
process of checking, it should not be assumed that there is no
divergence from the printed editions and it is strongly recommended that
they are checked against the printed editions before quoting.


ADDITIONAL NOTES
Italicized catchwords of the printed edition were already reduced
to plain Roman type in the original Dhammakaya file.
Corrections in braces were already inserted in the original Dhammakaya file.


ANNOTATED VERSION IN PTS LAYOUT

Text converted to Unicode (UTF-8).
(This file is to be used with a UTF-8 font and your browser's VIEW configuration
set to UTF-8.)

description:multibyte sequence:
long a ā
long A Ā
long i ī
long I Ī
long u ū
long U Ū
vocalic r ṛ
vocalic R Ṛ
long vocalic r ṝ
vocalic l ḷ
vocalic L Ḷ
long vocalic l ḹ
velar n ṅ
velar N Ṅ
palatal n ñ
palatal N Ñ
retroflex t ṭ
retroflex T Ṭ
retroflex d ḍ
retroflex D Ḍ
retroflex n ṇ
retroflex N Ṇ
palatal s ś
palatal S Ś
retroflex s ṣ
retroflex S Ṣ
anusvara ṃ
visarga ḥ
long e ē
long o ō
l underbar ḻ
r underbar ṟ
n underbar ṉ
k underbar ḵ
t underbar ṯ

Unless indicated otherwise, accents have been dropped in order
to facilitate word search.

Yamaka, Part I

[page 001]
                                  1
                     ABHIDHAMMAPIṬAKE YAMAKAṂ
                Namo tassa Bhagavato Arahato Sammāsambuddhassa!
                                  I.
                          [MŪLAYAMAKAṂ.
                             Uddesavāro.]
     1. Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlā? Ye vā
pana kusalamūlā, sabbe te dhammā kusalā?
     2. Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlena
ekamūlā? Ye vā pana kusalamūlena ekamūlā, sabbe te
dhammā kusalā?
     3. Ye keci kusalamūlena ekamūlā dhammā, sabbe te
kusalamūlena aññamaññamūlā? Ye vā pana kusalamūlena
aññamaññamūlā, sabbe te dhammā kusalā?
     4. Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlamūlā?
Ye vā pana kusalamūlamūlā, sabbe te dhammā kusalā?
     5. Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlena
ekamūlamūlā? Ye vā pana kusalamūlena ekamūlamūlā,
sabbe te dhammā kusalā?
     6. Ye keci kusalamūlena ekamūlamūlā dhammā, sabbe
te kusalamūlena aññamaññamūlamūlā? Ye vā pana kusa-
lamūlena aññamaññamūlamūlā, sabbe te dhammā kusalā?
     7. Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlakā? Ye
vā pana kusalamūlakā, sabbe te dhammā kusalā?
     8. Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlena
ekamūlakā? Ye vā pana kusalamūlena ekamūlakā, sabbe
te dhammā kusalā?
     9. Ye keci kusalamūlena ekamūlakā dhammā, sabbe te
kusalamūlena aññamaññamūlakā? Ye vā pana kusala-
mūlena aññamaññamūlakā, sabbe te dhammā kusalā?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 002]
2                        Mūlayamakaṃ
     10. Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlamū-
lakā? Ye vā pana kusalamūlamūlakā, sabbe te dhammā
kusalā?
     11. Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlena
ekamūlamūlakā? Ye vā pana kusalamūlena ekamūlamū-
lakā, sabbe te dhammā kusalā?
     12. Ye keci kusalamūlena ekamūlamūlakā dhammā,
sabbe te kusalamūlena aññamaññamūlakā? Ye vā
pana kusalamūlena aññamaññamūlakā, sabbe te dhammā
kusalā?
     1. Ye keci akusalā dhammā, sabbe te akusalamūlā? Ye
vā pana akusalamūlā, sabbe te dhammā akusalā? . . .
(continue as in preceding twelve questions, substituting
akusala for kusala).
     1. Ye keci abyākatā dhammā, sabbe te abyākatamūlā?
Ye vā {pana} abyākatamūlā, sabbe te dhammā abyākatā? . . .
(continue as in first twelve questions, substituting abyākata
for kusala).
     1. Ye keci nāmā dhammā, sabbe te nāmamūlā? Ye vā
pana nāmamūlā, sabbe te dhammā nāmā?
     2. Ye keci nāmā dhammā, sabbe te nāmamūlena eka-
mūlā? Ye vā pana nāmamūlena ekamūlamūlā,1 sabbe te
dhammā nāmā? (continue as for kusala, etc.).
     Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalahetū? . . . pe . . .
kusalanidānā? . . . pe . . . kusalasambhavā? . . . pe . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. and Br. ekamūlā.


[page 003]
                      Mūlayamakaṃ                        3
kusalappabhavā?1 . . . pe . . . kusalasamuṭṭhānā? . . . pe . . .
kusalāhārā? . . . pe . . . kusalārammaṇā? . . . pe . . .
kusalappaccayā?2 . . . pe . . . kusalasamudayā?3 . . . pe . . .
     Mūlaṇ hetu nidānañ ca sambhavo pabhavena ca
     samuṭṭhānāhārārammaṇā4 paccayo samudayena cāti.
                     UDDESAVĀRAṂ [NIṬṬHITAṂ].
                           [Niddesavāro.]
     1. Ye keci (a) kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlā ti?
          (b) akusalā dhammā, sabbe te {akusalamūlā} ti?
     (a) Tiṇ5 'eva kusalamūlāni,     |    (b) (Answer as for kusala-,
avasesā kusalā dhammā na                    |   substituting akusala-.)
kusalamūlā.                                 |
     Ye vā pana kusalamūlā, sabbe te dhammā kusalā ti?
          akusalamūlā, sabbe te dhammā akusalā ti?
     Āmantā.                                |     Āmantā.
     2. Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlena ekamūlā6 ti?
          akusalā dhammā, sabbe te akusalamūlena ekamūlā6 ti?
     Āmantā.                                |     Ahetukaṃ akusalaṃ ak.-
                                            |  mūlena na ekamūlaṃ, sahe-
                                            |  tukaṃ akusalaṃ ak.-mūlena
                                            |  ekamūlaṃ.
     Ye vā pana k.-mūlena7 ekamūlā, sabbe te dhammā kusalā ti?
          ak.-mūlena ekamūlā, sabbe te dhammā akusalā ti?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. kusalapabhavā.
2 Br. kusalapaccayā.
3 S. and Br. -samudayā ti.
4 S. samuṭṭhānāhārārammaṇaṃ. R. and Br. -ārammaṇaṃ.
5 S. tin 'eva always.
6 S. ekamūlakā.
7 For k. read kusala; for ak., akusala.


[page 004]
4                        Mūlayamakaṃ
     Kusalasamuṭṭhānaṃ rū-        |     (Answer as opposite, sub-
paṃ k.-mūlena ekamūlaṃ, na        |  stituting akusala-.)
kusalaṃ; kusalaṃ k.-mūlena        |
ekamūlañ ceva kusalañ ca.         |
     3. Ye keci k.-mūlena ekamūlā dhammā sabbe te
k.-mūlena aññamaññamūlā ti?
          ak.-mūlena ekamūlā dhammā sabbe te
ak.-mūlena aññamaññamūlā ti?
     Mūlāni yāni ekato uppaj-     |     (Answer as opposite, sub-
janti k.-mūlāni ekamūlāni         |  stituting akusalā-.)
ceva aññamaññamūlāni ca;          |
avasesā k.-mūlasahajātā           |
dhammā k.-mūlena ekamūlā,         |
na ca aññamaññamūlā.              |
     Ye vā pana k.-mūlena aññamaññamūlā sabbe te dhammā kusalā ti?
          ak.-mūlena aññamaññamūlā sabbe te dhammā akusalā ti?
     Āmantā.                      |     Āmantā.
     4. Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te k.-mūlamūlā ti?
          akusalā dhammā, sabbe te ak.-mūlamūlā ti?
     Tiṇ' eva k.-mūlamūlāni,      |     (Answer as opposite, sub-
avasesā kusalā dhammā na          |  stituting ak.)
k.-mūlamūlā.                      |
     Ye vā pana k.-mūlamūlā, sabbe te dhammā kusalā ti?
          ak.-mūlamūlā, sabbe te dhammā akusalā ti?
     Āmantā.                      |     Āmantā.
     5. Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te k.-mūlena ekamūlamūlā1 ti?
          akusala dhammā, sabbe te ak.-mūlena ekamūlamūlā1 ti?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. ekamūlamūlakā ti.


[page 005]
                          Mūlayamakaṃ                        5
     Āmantā.                      |     Ahetukaṃ akusalaṃ ak.-
                                  |     mūlena na ekamūlamūlaṃ,
                                  |     sahetukaṃ akusalaṃ ak.-
                                  |     mūlena ekamūlamūlaṃ.
     Ye vā pana k.-mūlena ekamūlamūlā, sabbe te dhammā kusalā ti?
          ak.-mūlena ekamūlamūlā, sabbe te dhammā akusalā ti?
     Kusalasamuṭṭhānaṃ rū-        |     (Answer as opposite, sub-
paṃ k.-mūlena ekamūlamū-          |     stituting ak.)
laṃ, na kusalaṃ; kusalaṃ          |
k.-mūlena ekamūlamūlañ            |
ceva kusalañ ca.                  |
     6. Ye keci k.-mūlena ekamūlamūlā dhammā, sabbe te k.-mūlena
aññamaññamūlamūlā ti?
          ak.-mūlena ekamūlamūlā dhammā, sabbe te ak.-mūlena
aññamaññamūlamūlā ti?
     Mūlāni yāni ekato uppaj-     |     (Answer as opposite, sub-
janti k.-mūlāni ekamūla-          |     stituting ak.)
mūlāni ceva aññamañña-            |
mūlamūlāni ca; avasesā            |
k.-mūlasahajātā dhammā            |
k.-mūlena ekamūlamūlā, na         |
ca aññamaññamūlamūlā.             |
     Ye vā pana k.-mūlena aññamaññamūlamūlā, sabbe te dhammā kusalā ti?
          ak.-mūlena aññamaññamūlamūlā, sabbe te dhammā akusalā ti?
     Āmantā.                      |     Āmantā.
     7. Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te k.-mūlakā ti?
          akusalā dhammā, sabbe te ak.-mūlakā ti?
     Āmantā.                      |     Ahetukaṃ akusalaṃ na
                                  |     akusalamūlakaṃ, sahetukaṃ
                                  |     akusalaṃ ak.-mūlakaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 006]
6                        Mūlayamakaṃ
     Ye vā pana k.-mūlakā, sabbe te dhammā kusalā ti?
          ak.-mūlakā, sabbe te dhammā akusalā ti?
     Kusalasamuṭṭhānaṇ rūpaṃ      |     (Answer as opposite, sub-
k.-mūlakaṃ, na kusalaṃ;           |     stituting ak.)
kusalaṃ k.-mūlakañ ceva           |
kusalañ ca.                       |
     8. Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te k.-mūlena ekamūlakā ti?
          akusalā dhammā, sabbe te ak.-mūlena ekamūlakā ti?
     Āmantā.                      |     Ahetukaṃ akusalaṃ ak.-
                                  |     mūlena na ekamūlakaṃ,
                                  |     sahetukaṃ akusalaṃ ak.-
                                  |     mūlena ekamūlakaṃ.
     Ye vā pana k.-mūlena ekamūlakā, sabbe te dhammā kusalā ti?
          ak.-mūlena ekamūlakā, sabbe te dhammā akusalā ti?
     Kusalasamuṭṭhānaṇ rū-        |     (Answer as opposite, sub-
paṃ k.-mūlena ekamūlakaṃ,         |     stituting ak.)
na kusalaṃ; kusalaṃ k.-mū-        |
lena ekamūlakañ ceva kusa-        |
lañ ca.                           |
     9. Ye keci k.-mūlena ekamūlakā dhammā, sabbe te k.-mūlena
aññamaññamūlakā ti?
          ak.-mūlena ekamūlakā dhammā, sabbe te ak.-mūlena
aññamaññamūlakā ti?
     Mūlāni yāni ekato uppaj-     |     (Answer as opposite, sub-
janti k.-mūlāni ekamūla-          |     stituting ak.)
kāni1 ceva aññamaññamūla-     |
kāni ca; avasesā k.-mūlasa-       |
hajātā dhammā k.-mūlena           |
ekamūlakā, na ca aññamañ-         |
ñamūlakā.                         |
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. and B. ekamūlāni.


[page 007]
                                   Mūlayamakaṃ               7
     Ye vā pana k.-mūlena aññamaññamūlakā, sabbe te dhammā kusalā ti?
          ak.-mūlena aññamaññamūlakā, sabbe te dhammā akusalā ti?
     Āmantā.                      |     Āmantā.
     10. Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te k.-mūlamūlakā ti?
          akusalā dhammā, sabbe te ak.-mūlamūlakā ti?
     Āmantā.                      |     Ahetukaṃ akusalaṃ na
                                  |     ak.-mūlamūlakaṃ, sahetukaṃ
                                  |     akusalaṃ ak.-mūlamūlakaṃ.
     Ye vā pana k.-mūlakā, sabbe te dhammā kusalā ti?
          ak.-mūlakā, sabbe te dhammā akusalā ti?
     K.-samuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ         |     (Answer as opposite, sub-
k.-mūlamūlakaṃ, na kusa-          |     stituting ak.)
laṃ; kusalaṃ k.-mūlamūla-         |
kañ ceva kusalañ ca.              |
     11. Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te k.-mūlena ekamūlamūlakā ti?
          akusalā dhammā, sabbe te ak.-mūlena ekamūlamūlakā ti?
     Āmantā.                      |     Ahetukaṃ akusalaṃ ak.-
                                  |     mūlena na ekamūlamūlakaṃ,
                                  |     sahetukaṃ akusalaṃ ak.-mū-
                                  |     lena ekamūlamūlakaṃ.
     Ye vā pana k.-mūlena ekamūlamūlakā, sabbe te dhammā kusalā ti?
          ak.-mūlena ekamūlamūlakā, sabbe te dhammā akusalā ti?
     K.-samuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ         |     (Answer as opposite, sub-
k.-mūlena ekamūlamūlakaṃ,         |     stituting ak.)
na kusalaṃ; kusalaṃ k.-mū-        |
lena ekamūlamūlakañ ceva          |
kusalañ ca.                       |
     12. Ye keci k.-mūlena ekamūlamūlakā dhammā,
          ak.-mūlena ekamūlamūlakā dhammā,
sabbe te k.-mūlena aññamaññamūlamūlakā ti?
sabbe te ak.-mūlena aññamaññamūlamūlakā ti?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 008]
8                           Mūlayamakaṃ
     Mūlāni yāni ekato uppaj-     |     (Answer as opposite, sub-
janti k.-mūlāni ekamūlamū-        |     stituting ak.)
lakāni ceva aññamaññamū-          |
lamūlakāni ca; avasesā            |
k.-mūlasahajātā dhammā            |
k.-mūlena ekamūlamūlakā           |
na ca aññamaññamūlakā.            |
     Ye vā pana k.-mūlena aññamaññamūlamūlakā, sabbe te dhammā kusalā ti?
          ak.-mūlena aññamaññamūlamūlakā, sabbe te dhammā akusalā ti?
     Āmantā.                      |     Āmantā.
     1. Ye keci abyākatā dhammā, sabbe te abyākata- mūlā ti?
          nāmā dhammā, sabbe te nāma- mūlā ti?
     Tīṇ' eva abyākatamūlāni,     |     Na c' eva nāmamūlāni,
avasesā abyākatā dhammā           |     avasesā nāmā dhammā na
na abyākatamūlā.                  |     nāmamūlā.
     Ye vā pana abyākata- mūlā, sabbe te dhammā abyākatā ti?
          nāma- mūlā, sabbe te dhammā nāmā ti?
     Āmantā.                      |     Āmantā.
     2. Ye keci abyakatā dhammā, sabbe te ab.-mūlena ekamūlā ti?
          namā dhammā, sabbe te n.-mūlena ekamūlā ti?
     Ahetukaṃ abyākataṃ ab.-      |     (Answer as opposite, sub-
mūlena na ekamūlaṃ, sahe-         |     stituting nāma- for abyā-
tukaṃ abyākataṃ ab.-mūlena        |     kata.-)
{ekamūlaṃ.}                       |
     Ye vā pana ab.-mūlena ekamūlā, sabbe te dhammā abyākatā ti?
          n.-mūlena ekamūlā, sabbe te dhammā nāmā ti?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 009]
                                Mūlayamakaṃ                     9
     {Āmantā.}                    |     Nāmasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ
                                  |     n.-mūlena ekamūlaṃ na
                                  |     nāmaṃ, nāmaṃ n.-mūlena
                                  |     ekamūlañ ceva nāmañ ca.
     3. Ye keci ab.-mūlena ekamūlā dhammā, sabbe te
ab.-mūlena aññamaññamūlā ti?
          n.-mūlena ekamūlā dhammā, sabbe te
n.-mūlena aññamaññamūlā ti?
     Mūlāni yāni ekato uppaj-     |     (Answer as opposite, sub-
janti ab.-mūlāni ekamūlāni        |     stituting nāma-.)
ceva aññamaññamūlāni ca;          |
avasesā ab.-mūlasahajatā          |
dhammā ab.-mūlena eka-            |
mūlā, na ca aññamañña-            |
mūlā.                             |
     Ye vā pana ab.-mūlena aññamaññamūlā, sabbe te dhammā abyākatā ti?
          n.-mūlena aññamaññamūlā, sabbe te dhammā namā ti?
     Āmantā.                      |     Āmantā.
     4. Ye keci abyākatā dhammā, sabbe te ab.-mūlamūlā ti?
          nāmā dhammā, sabbe te n.-mūlamūlā ti?
     Tīṇ' eva ab.-mūlamūlāni,     |     Na c' eva1 n.-mūlamūlāni,
avasesā abyākatā dhammā           |     avasesā nāmā dhammā na
na ab.-mūlamūlā.                  |     n.-mūlamūlā.
     Ye vā pana ab.-mūlamūlā, sabbe te dhammā abyākatā ti?
          n.-mūlamūlā, sabbe te dhammā nāmā ti?
     Āmantā.                      |     Āmantā.
     5. Ye keci abyākatā dhammā, sabbe te ab.-mūlena ekamūlamūlā ti?
          nāmā dhammā, sabbe te n.-mūlena ekamūlamūlā ti?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. naveva.


[page 010]
10                         Mūlayamakaṃ
     Ahetukaṃ abyākataṃ ab.-      |     (Answer as opposite, sub-
mūlena na ekamūlamūlaṃ,1       |     stituting nāma-.)
sahetukaṃ abyākataṃ ab.-          |
mūlena ekamūlamūlaṃ.              |
     Ye vā pana ab.-mūlena ekamūlamūlā, sabbe te dhammā abyākatā ti?
          n.-mūlena ekamūlamūlā, sabbe te dhammā nāmā ti?
     Āmantā.                      |     N.-samuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ n.-
                                  |     mūlena ekamūlamūlaṃ, na
                                  |     nāmaṃ; nāmaṃ n.-mūlena
                                  |     ekamūlamūlañ ceva nāmañ
                                  |     ca.
     6. Ye keci ab.-mūlena ekamūlamūlā dhammā, sabbe
te ab.-mūlena aññamaññamūlamūlā ti?
          n.-mūlena ekamūlamūlā dhammā, sabbe
te n.-mūlena aññamaññamūlamūlā ti?
     Mūlāni yāni ekato uppaj-     |     (Answer as opposite, sub-
janti ab.-mūlāni ekamūla-         |     stituting nāma-.)
mūlāni ceva aññamaññamū-          |
lāni2 ca; avasesā ab.-mūla-      |
sahajātā dhammā abyākata-         |
mūlena ekamūlamūlā, na ca         |
aññamaññamūlā.                    |
     Ye vā pana ab.-mūlena aññamaññamūlamūlā, sabbe
te dhammā abyākatā ti?
          n.-mūlena aññamaññamūlamūlā, sabbe
te dhammā abyākatā ti?
     Āmantā.                      |     Āmantā.
     7. Ye keci abyākatā dhammā, sabbe te ab.-mūlakā ti?
          nāmā dhammā, sabbe te n.-mūlakā ti?
     Ahetukaṃ abyākataṃ na        |     (Answer as opposite, sub-
ab.-mūlakaṃ, sahetukaṃ aby-       |     stituting nāma-.)
ākataṃ ab.-mūlakaṃ.               |
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. ekamūlamūlakaṃ.
2 Br. aññamaññamūlamūlāni.


[page 011]
                              Mūlayamakaṃ                    11
     Ye vā pana ab.-mūlakā, sabbe te dhammā abyākatā ti?
          n.-mūlakā, sabbe te dhammā nāmā ti?
     Āmantā.                      |     N.-samuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ n.-
                                  |     mūlakaṃ, na nāmaṃ; nāmaṃ
                                  |     n.-mūlakañ ceva nāmañ ca.
     8. Ye keci abyākatā dhammā, sabbe te ab.-mūlena ekamūlakā ti?
          nāmā dhammā, sabbe te n.-mūlena ekamūlakā ti?
     Ahetukaṃ abyākataṃ ab.-      |     (Answer as opposite, sub-
mūlena na ekamūlakaṃ, sa-         |     stituting nāma-.)
hetukaṃ abyākataṃ ab.-mū-         |
lena ekamūlakaṃ.                  |
     Ye vā pana ab.-mūlena ekamūlakā, sabbe te dhammā ekamūlakā ti?
          n.-mūlena ekamūlakā, sabbe te dhammā ekamūlakā ti?
     Āmantā.                      |     N.-samuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ n.-
                                  |     mūlena {ekamūlakaṃ,} na nā-
                                  |     maṃ; nāmaṃ n.-mūlena eka-
                                  |     mūlakañ ceva nāmañ ca.
     9. Ye keci ab.-mūlena ekamūlakā dhammā, sabbe
te ab.-mūlena aññamaññamūlakā ti?
          n.-mūlena ekamūlakā dhammā, sabbe
te n.-mūlena aññamaññamūlakā ti?
     Mūlāni yāni ekato uppaj-     |     (Answer as opposite, sub-
janti ab.-mūlāni ekamūla-         |     stituting nāma-.)
kāni ceva aññamaññamūla-          |
kāni ca; avasesā ab.-mūla-        |
sahajātā dhammā ab.-mū-           |
lena ekamūlakā, na ca añña-       |
maññamūlakā.                      |
     Ye vā pana ab.-mūlena aññamaññamūlakā, sabbe te dhammā abyākatā ti?
          n.-mūlena aññamaññamūlakā, sabbe te dhammā nāmā ti?
     Āmantā.                      |     Āmantā.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 012]
12                         Mūlayamakaṃ
     10. Ye keci abyākatā dhammā, sabbe te ab.-mūlamūlakā ti?
          nāmā dhammā, sabbe te n.-mūlamūlakā ti?
     Ahetukaṃ abyākataṃ na        |     (Answer as opposite, etc.)
ab.-mūlamūlakaṃ, sahetu-          |
kaṃ abyākataṃ ab.-mūlamū-         |
lakaṃ.                            |
     Ye vā pana ab.-mūlamūlakā, sabbe te dhammā abyākatā ti?
          n.-mūlamūlakā, sabbe te dhammā nāmā ti?
     Āmantā.                      |     Nāmasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ n.
                                  |     -mūlamūlakaṃ, na nāmaṃ;
                                  |     nāmaṃ1 n.-mūlamūlakañ
                                  |     ceva nāmañ ca.
     11. Ye keci abyākatā dhammā, sabbe te ab.-mūlena ekamūlamūlakā1 ti?
          nāmā dhammā, sabbe te n.-mūlena ekamūlamūlakā1 ti?
     Ahetukaṃ abyākataṃ ab.-      |     (Answer as opposite, etc.)
mūlena na ekamūlamūlakaṃ,         |
sahetukaṃ abyākataṃ ab.-          |
mūlena ekamūlamūlakaṃ.            |
     Ye vā pana ab.-mūlena ekamūlamūlakā, sabbe te dhammā abyākatā ti?
          n.-mūlena ekamūlamūlakā, sabbe te dhammā nāmā ti?
     Āmantā.                      |     N.-samuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ n.-
                                  |     mūlena ekamūlamūlakaṃ, na
                                  |     nāmaṃ; nāmaṃ n.-mūlena
                                  |     ekamūlamūlakañ ceva nā-
                                  |     mañ ca.
     12. Ye keci ab.-mūlena ekamūlamūlakā dhammā,
sabbe te ab.-mūlena aññamaññamūlamūlakā ti?
          n.-mūlena ekamūlamūlakā dhammā,
sabbe te n.-mūlena aññamaññamūlamūlakā ti?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. does not double the mūla- in this section.


[page 013]
                              Mūlayamakaṃ                    13
     Mūlāni yāni ekato uppaj-     |     (Answer as opposite, etc.)
janti ab.-mūlāni ekamūla-         |
mūlakāni ceva aññamañña-          |
mūlamūlakāni ca; avasesā          |
ab.-mūlena ekamūlamūlakā,         |
na ca aññamaññamūlamū-            |
lakā.                             |
     Ye vā pana ab.-mūlena aññamaññamūlamūlakā, sabbe
te dhammā abyākatā ti?
          n.-mūlena aññamaññamūlamūlakā, sabbe
te dhammā nāmā ti?
     Āmantā.                      |     Āmantā.
     Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalahetū kusalani-
dānā kusalasambhavā kusalappabhavā1 kusalasamuṭṭhānā
kusalāhārā2 kusalārāmmaṇā kusalappaccayā3 kusalasamu-
dayā.
     Ye keci akusalā dhammā,. . . ye keci abyākatā dhammā
. . . ye keci nāmā dhammā, sabbe te nāmahetū nāmani-
dānā nāmasambhavā nāmappabhavā3 nāmasamuṭṭhānā
nāmāhārā nāmārammaṇā nāmappaccayā nāmasamudayā.
     Mūlaṃ hetu nidānañ ca sambhavo pabhavena ca
     samuṭṭhānāhārārammaṇā4 paccayo samudayena cāti.
                        MŪLAYAMAKAṂ NIṬṬHITAṂ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. kusalapabhavā.
2 S. kusalāhārāhārā.
3 Br. kusalapaccayā.
4 Br. -ārammaṇaṃ.


[page 014]
                                 14
                                II.1
                           [KHANDHAYAMAKAṂ.
                             Uddesavāro.]
     Pañcakkhandhā: rūpakkhandho vedanākkhandho sañ-
ñākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho.
     1. Rūpaṃ rūpakkhandho, rūpakkhandho rūpaṃ; vedanā
vedanākkhandho, vedanākkhandho vedanā; saññā saññāk-
khandho, saññākkhandho saññā; saṅkhārā saṅkhārak-
khandho, saṅkhārakkhandho saṅkhārā; viññāṇaṃ viññā-
ṇakkhandho, viññāṇakkhandho viññāṇaṃ.
     2. Na rūpaṃ na rūpakkhandho, na rūpakkhandho na
rūpaṃ; na vedanā . . . pe . . . na saññā . . . pe . . . na
saṅkhārā . . . pe . . . na viññāṇaṃ na viññāṇakkhandho,
na viññāṇakkhandho na viññāṇaṃ.
     3. Rūpaṃ rūpakkhandho, khandhā vedanākkhandho;
rūpaṃ rūpakkhandho khandhā saññākkhandho; rūpaṃ
rūpakkhandho, khandhā saṅkhārakkhandho; rūpaṃ rūpak-
khandho, khandhā viññāṇakkhandho. Vedanā vedanāk-
khandho, khandhā rūpakkhandho . . . khandhā viññāṇak-
khandho. Saññā saññākkhandho, khandhā rūpakkhandho
. . . khandhā viññāṇakkhandho. Saṅkhārā saṅkhārak-
khandho, khandhā rūpakkhandho . . . khandhā viññā-
ṇakkhandho. Viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho, khandhā
rūpakkhandho . . . khandhā saṅkhārakkhandho.
     4. Na rūpaṃ na rūpakkhandho, na khandhā na vedanāk-
khandho; na rūpaṃ na rūpakkhandho, na khandhā na
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. repeats Nama tasso Bhagavato, etc.


[page 015]
                          Khandhayamakaṃ               15
saññākkhandho; na rūpaṃ na rūpakkhandho, na khandhā
na saṅkhārakkhandho; na rūpaṃ na rūpakkhandho, na
khandhā na viññāṇakkhandho. Na vedanā na vedanāk-
khandho . . . na viññāṇakkhandho . . . Na saññā na
saññākkhandho . . . na viññāṇakkhandho. Na saṅkhārā
na saṅkhārakkhandho . . . na viññāṇakkhandho.
Na viññāṇaṃ na viññāṇakkhandho . . . na saṅkhārak-
khandho.
     5. Rūpaṃ1 khandho, khandhā rūpaṃ2; vedanā khandho,
khandhā vedanā; saññā khandho, khandhā saññā; saṅ-
khārā khandho, khandhā saṅkhārā; viññāṇaṃ khandho,
khandhā3 viññāṇaṃ.
     6. Na rūpaṃ na khandho, na khandhā na rūpaṃ; na
vedanā . . . na viññāṇaṃ na khandho, na khandhā na
viññānaṃ.
     7. Rūpaṃ khandho, khandhā vedanā;4 rūpaṃ khandho,
khandhā saññā . . . saṅkhārā . . . khandhā viññāṇaṃ. Ve-
danā khandho, khandhā rūpaṃ; vedanā khandho, khandhā
saññā . . . khandhā viññānaṃ. Saññā khandho, khandhā
rūpan; saññā khandho, khandhā vedanā; saññā khandho . . .
viññāṇaṃ. Saṅkhārā khandho, khandhā rūpaṃ; saṅkhārā
khandho, khandhā vedanā . . . khandhā viññāṇaṃ. Viññā-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. rūpakkhandho.
2 K. has footnote:--Tattha `khandhā, rūpan ti ādīsu'
     khandho rūpakkhandho, khandhā vedanākkhandho ti attho
     gahetabbo. Kasmā? Niddesavāre evaṃ bhājitattā. Tattha
     hi `rūpaṃ khandho ti:' āmantā. Khandhā rūpakkhandho
     ti: rūpakkhandho rūpañ ceva rūpakkhandho ca; avasesā
     khandhā khandhā, na rūpakkhandho ti evaṃ `khandhā
     rūpan ti ādīnaṃ ' khandho rūpakkhandho ti ādīnā nayena
     padaṃ uddharitvā attho vibhatto ti Aṭṭhakathā.
3 S. khandho.
4 K. :--Tattha `khandhā vedanā ti ādīnaṃ' khandhā
     vedanākkhandho ti ādinā nayena attho veditabbo. Itarathā
     niddesavārena saddhiṃ virodho hotīti Aṭṭhakathā.


[page 016]
16                             Khandhayamakaṃ
ṇaṃ khandho, khandhā rūpaṃ; viññāṇaṃ khandho, khandhā
vedanā . . . khandhā saṅkhārā.
     8. Na rūpaṃ na khandho, na khandhā na vedanā; na
rūpaṃ na khandho, na khandhā na saññā . . . na viññāṇaṃ.
Na vedanā na khandho, na khandhā na rūpaṃ; na vedanā
na khandho . . . na khandhā na viññāṇaṃ. Na saññā na
khandho, {na} khandhā na rūpaṃ; na saññā na khandho
. . . na khandhā na viññāṇaṃ. Na saṅkhārā na khandho,
na khandhā na rūpaṃ; na saṅkhārā na khandho . . . na
khandhā na viññāṇaṃ. Na viññāṇaṃ na khandho, na
khandhā na rūpaṃ; na viññāṇaṃ na khandho . . . na
khandhā na saṅkhārā.
                      UDDESAVĀRAṂ NIṬṬHITAṂ.1
                           [{Niddesavāro.} ]
     1. Rūpaṃ2 rūpakkhandho ti? Piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ
rūpaṃ, na rūpakkhandho; rūpakkhandho rūpaṃ ceva
rūpakkhandho ca. Rūpakkh. rūpan ti? Āmantā. Vedanā
vedanākkhandho ti? Āmantā. Vedanākkh. vedanā ti?
Āmantā. Saññā saññākkhandho ti? Diṭṭhisaññā saññā,
na saññākkhandho; saññākkh. saññā ceva saññākkh. ca.
Saññakkh. saññā ti? Āmantā. Saṅkhārā saṅkhāra-
kkhandho ti? Saṅkhārakkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā
saṅkhārā saṅkhārā, na saṅkhārakkh., saṅkhārakkh. saṅ-
khārā ceva saṅkhārakkh. ca. Saṅkhārakkh. saṅkhārā ti?
Āmantā. Viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho ti? Āmantā.
Viññāṇakkh. viññāṇan ti? Āmantā.
     2. Na rūpaṃ na rūpakkhandho ti? Āmantā. Na
rūpakkh. na rūpan ti? Piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ3 na rūpakkh.,
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. and Br. omit niṭṭhitaṃ.
2 Cf. Compendium of Philosophy (P. T. S.,1910), p. 272.
3 S.inserts rūpaṃ.


[page 017]
                    Khandhayamakaṃ                   17
rūpaṃ;1 rūpañ ca rūpakkhandhañ ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na
ceva rūpaṃ na ca rūpakkh. Na vedanā na vedanākkhan-
dho {ti}? Āmantā. Na vedanākkh. na vedanā ti? Āmantā.
Na saññā na saññākkhandho ti? Āmantā. Na saññākkh.
na saññā ti? Diṭṭhisaññā2 na saññākkh., saññā3; saññañ
ca saññākkhandhañ ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva saññā na
ca saññākkh. Na saṅkhārā na saṅkhārakkhandho ti?
Āmantā. Na saṅkhārakkh. na saṅkhārā ti? Saṅkhāra-
kkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā saṅkhārā4 na saṅkhārakkh.
saṅkhārā;5 saṅkhāre6 ca7 saṅkhārakhandhañ ca ṭhapetvā
avasesā na ceva saṅkhārā na ca saṅkhārakkh. Na viñ-
ñāṇaṃ na viññāṇakkhandho ti? Āmantā. Na viññāṇakkh.
na viññāṇan ti? Āmantā.
     3. (a) Rūpaṃ rūpakkhandho ti? Piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ
rūpaṃ, na rūpakkh.; rūpakkh. rūpañ ceva rūpakkh. ca.
(b) Khandhā vedanākkhandho ti? Vedanākkh. khandho
ceva vedanākkh. ca; avasesā khandhā khandhā,8 na
vedanākkhandho . . .
     (a and b are each repeated three times, each of the remaining
khandha's being substituted in turn, in b, for vedanā.)
     (c) Vedanā vedanākkhandho ti? Āmantā. (b) Khandhā
rūpakkhandho ti? Rūpakkhandho khandho ceva rūpakkh.
ca; avasesā khandhā khandhā,9 na rūpakkh. . . .
     (c and b are each repeated as in the case of a and b. So
also for d:-- Saññā saññākkhandho ti? Diṭṭhisaññā saññā,
na saññākkh.; saññākkh. saññā ceva saññākkh. ca-- for e:
-- Saṅkhārā saṅkhārakkhandho ti? Saṅkhārakkhandhaṃ
ṭhapetvā, avasesā saṅkhārā saṅkhārā, na saṅkhārakkh.;
saṅkhārakkh. saṅkhārā ceva saṅkhārakkh. ca-- and for f:
-- Viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho ti? Āmantā:-- 5 sets of 8
questions and 8 answers each).
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. omits.
2 S. inserts saññā.
3 S. omits.
4 Br. omits.
5 S. substitutes sankhārañ ca.
6 S. omits.
7 S. omits.
8 S. and Br. omit.
9 S. and Br. omit.


[page 018]
18                        Khandhayamakaṃ
     4. (a) Na rūpaṃ na rūpakkhandho ti? Āmantā. (b) Na
khandhā na vedanākkhandho ti? Āmantā . . .
     (Here again a is made to alternate4 times with b; the
other3 khandha's being substituted in b in sucession. with
the invarible reply: Āmantā. Then Na vedanā, etc., replaces
Na rūpaṃ, etc., and b commences with Na khandhā na
rūpakkhandho ti? So on for the other three khandha's.)
     5. Rūpaṃ khandho ti? Āmantā. Khandhā rūpak-
khandho ti?1 Rūpakkh. khandho ceva rūpakkh. ca;
avasesā khandhā khandhā,2 na rūpakkh. Vedanā khan-
dho ti?3 Āmantā. Khandhā vedanākkhandho ti?
Vedanākkh. khandho4 ceva vedanākkh. ca; avasesā
khandhā khandhā,5 na vedanākkh. Saññā khandho ti?
Āmantā. Khandhā saññākkhandho ti . . . pe . . . Khandhā
viññāṇakkhandho ti? Viññāṇakkh. khandho6 ceva viññā-
ṇakkh. ca; avasesā khandhā khandhā,7 na viññāṇak-
khandho.
     6. Na rūpaṃ na khandho ti?8 Rūpaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā
khandhā na rūpaṃ,9 khandhā;10 rūpañ ca khandhe ca
ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva rūpaṃ na ca khandhā. Na
khandhā na rūpakkhandho ti? Āmantā.
     Na vedanā na khandho ti? . . . pe . . . Na viññāṇaṃ
na khandho ti? Viññāṇaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā khandhā na
viññāṇaṃ. khandhā; viññāṇañ ca khandhe ca ṭhapetvā
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. has footnote:--Khandhā rūpan ti pucchitabbe,
     yasmā rūpan ti vacanena rūpakkhandho va adhippeto,
     tasmā vacanaṃ anādiyitvā atthavasena pucchanto
     khandhā rūpakkhandho ti āhāti Aṭṭhakathā.
2 S. and Br. omit.
3 S. vedanākkhandho ti.
4 S. omits.
5 S. and Br. omit.
6 S. omits.
7 S. and Br. omit.
8 S. Na rūpakkhandho ti.
9 S. rūpakkhandho.
10 S. omits.


[page 019]
                          Khandhayamakaṃ             19
avasesā na ceva viññāṇaṃ na ca khandhā. Na khandhā
na viññāṇakkhandho ti? Āmantā.
     7. (a) Rūpaṃ khandho ti? Āmantā. (b) Khandhā vedanā-
kkhandho ti? Vedanākkh. khandho ceva vedanākkh. ca;
avasesā khandhā khandhā, na vedanākkh. (a) Rūpaṃ
khandho ti? Āmantā. (b) Khandhā saññākkhandho . . .
(a and b alternate as in 3, 4, q.v., followed by c, b, etc.).
     8. (a) Na rūpaṃ na khandho ti? Rūpaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā
khandhā na rūpaṃ, khandhā; rūpañ ca khandhe ca
ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva rūpaṃ na ca khandhā. (b) Na
khandhā na vedanākkhandho ti? Āmantā.
     (a and b alternate, c, d, and e following in turn, as in 3,
4, q.v.)
                      PAṆṆATTIVĀRO1 SAMATTĀ.
                             [Uppādavāro. ]
     1. i. Yassa rūpakkhandho uppajjati, tassa vedanāk-
khandho uppajjatīti? Asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
rūpakkh. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ vedanākkh. uppajjati;
pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpakkh. ca uppajjati,
vedanākkh. ca uppajjati. Yassa vā pana vedanākkh.
uppajjati, tassa rūpakkh. uppajjatīti? Arūpaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesaṃ vedanākkh. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ rūpakkh.
uppajjati; pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ vedanākkh.
ca uppajjati, rūpakkh. ca uppajjati.
     ii. Yattha rūpakkh. uppajjati, tattha vedanākkh. uppaj-
jatīti? Asaññasatte tattha rūpakkh. uppajjati, no ca
tattha vedanākkh. uppajjati; pañcavokāre tattha rūpakkh.
ca2 uppajjati, vedanākkh. ca uppajjati. Yattha vā pana
vedanākkh. uppajjati, tattha rūpakkh. uppajjatīti? Arūpe
tattha vedanākkh. uppajjati, no ca tattha rūpakkh. uppaj-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. and S. omit -vāro.
2 S. omits.


[page 020]
20                          Khandhayamakaṃ
jati; pañcavokāre tattha vedanākkh. ca uppajjati, rūpakkh.
ca uppajjati.
     iii. Yassa yattha rūpakkh. uppajjati, tassa tattha
vedanākkh. uppajjatīti? Asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ1
tesaṃ tattha rūpakkh. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha veda-
nākkh. uppajjati; pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha rūpakkh. ca uppajjati, vedanākkh. ca uppajjati.
Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkh. {uppajjati}, tassa tattha
rūpakkh. uppajjatīti? Arūpaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
vedanākkh. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpakkh. uppaj-
jati; pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkh.
ca uppajjati, rūpakkh. ca uppajjati.
     2. i. Yassa r.kh. nuppajjati, tassa2 v.kh.3 nuppajjatīti?
Arūpaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ r.kh. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ
v.kh. nuppajjati; sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ r.kh. ca
nuppajjati, v.kh. ca nuppajjati. Yassa vā pana v.kh.
nuppajjati, tassa r.kh. nuppajjatīti? Asaññasattaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ r.kh.
nuppajjati; sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh. ca nuppaj-
jati, r.kh. ca nuppajjati.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. nuppajjati, tattha v.kh. nuppajjatīti?
Uppajjati. Yattha vā pana v.kh. nuppajjati, tattha r.kh.
nuppajjatīti? Uppajjati.
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. nuppajjati, tassa tattha v.kh.
nuppajjatīti? Arūpaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh.
nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nuppajjati. Sabbesaṃ
cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca nuppajjati, v.kh. ca
nuppajjati. Yassa vā pana yattha v.kh. nuppajjati, tassa
tattha r.kh. nuppajjatīti? Asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh.
nuppajjati; sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca
nuppajjati, r.kh. ca nuppajjati.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. upapajjantānaṃ throughout.
2 S. omits.
3 For r.kh., v.kh., read rūpakkhandho, vedanākkhandho.


[page 021]
                           Khandhayamakaṃ                   21
     3. i. Yassa r.kh. uppajjittha, tassa v.kh. uppajjitthāti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana v.kh. uppajjittha, tassa r.kh.
uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. uppajjittha, tattha v.kh. uppajjitthāti?
Asaññasatte tattha r.kh. uppajjittha, no ca tattha v.kh.
uppajjittha; pañcavokāre tattha r.kh. ca uppajjittha,
v.kh. ca uppajjittha. Yattha vā pana v.kh. uppajjittha,
tattha r.kh. uppajjitthāti? Arūpe tattha v.kh. uppajjittha,
no ca tattha r.kh. uppajjittha; pañcavokāre tattha v.kh.
ca uppajjittha, r.kh. ca uppajjittha.
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. uppajjittha, tassa tattha v.kh.
uppajjitthāti? Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. uppaj-
jittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. uppajjittha; pañcavo-
kārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca uppajjittha, v.kh. ca
uppajjittha. Yassa vā pana yattha v.kh. uppajjittha,
tassa tattha r.kh. uppajjitthāti? Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
v.kh. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh. uppajjittha;
pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca uppajjittha, r.kh.
ca uppajjittha.
     4. i. Yassa r.kh. nuppajjittha, tassa v.kh. nuppajjit-
thāti ? Natthi. Yassa vā pana v.kh. nuppajjittha,1 tassa
r.kh. nuppajjitthāti? Natthi.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. nuppajjittha, tattha v.kh. nuppajjit-
thāti? Uppajjittha. Yattha vā pana v.kh. nuppajjittha,
tattha r.kh. nuppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha v.kh.
nuppajjitthāti? Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. nuppaj-
jittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nuppajjittha; suddhāvā-
sānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca nuppajjittha, v.kh. ca
nuppajjittha. Yassa2 vā pana yattha v.kh. nuppajjittha,
tassa tattha r.kh. nuppajjitthāti? Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha v.kh. nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. substitutes tattha vedanākkhandho.
2 S. yattha.


[page 022]
22                          Khandhayamakaṃ
nuppajjittha; suddhāvāsānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca
nuppajjittha, r.kh. ca nuppajjittha.
     5. i. Yassa r.kh. uppajjissati, tassa1 v.kh. uppajjissatīti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana v.kh. uppajjissati, tassa r.kh.
uppajjissatīti? Ye arūpaṃ uppajjitvā2 parinibbāyissanti,
tesaṃ v.kh. uppajjati,3 no ca tesaṃ r.kh. uppajjissati;
itaresaṃ4 v.kh. ca uppajjissati, r.kh. ca uppajjissati.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. uppajjissati, tattha v.kh. uppajjissatīti?
Asaññasatte tattha r.kh. uppajjissati, no ca tattha v.kh.
uppajjissati; pañcavokāre tattha r.kh. ca uppajjissati,
v.kh. ca uppajjissati. Yattha vā pana v.kh. uppajjissati,
tattha r.kh. uppajjissatīti? Arūpe tattha v.kh. uppajjis-
sati,5 no ca tattha r.kh. uppajjissati; pañcavokāre tattha
v.kh. ca uppajjissati, r.kh. ca uppajjissati.
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. uppajjissati, tassa tattha v.kh.
uppajjissatīti? Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. uppaj-
jissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. uppajjissati; pañcavo-
kārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca uppajjissati, v.kh. ca uppaj-
jissati. Yassa Vā pana yattha v.kh. uppajjissati, tassa
tattha r.kh. uppajjissatīti? Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
v.kh. uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ6 tattha r.kh. uppajjissati,
pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca uppajjissati, r.kh.
ca uppajjissati.
     6. i. Yassa r.kh. nuppajjissati, tasa v.kh. nuppajjis-
satīti? Ye arūpaṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ
r.kh. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ v.kh. nuppajjissati; pac-
chimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ r.kh. ca nuppajjissati, v.kh. ca
nuppajjissati. Yassa vā pana v.kh. nuppajjissati, tassa
r.kh. nuppajjissatīti? Āmantā.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. tattha.
2 Br. upapajjitvā always.
3 S. and Br. uppajjissati.
4 Br. inserts tesaṃ.
5 S. uppajjissatīti.
6 S. omits.


[page 023]
                 Khandhayamakaṃ                                 23
     ii. Yattha r.kh. nuppajjissati, tattha v.kh. nuppajjis-
satīti? Uppajjissati. Yattha vā pana v.kh. nuppajjissati,
tattha r.kh. nuppajjissatīti? Uppajjissati.
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. nuppajjissati, tassa1 tattha
v.kh. nuppajjissatīti?2 Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh.
nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nuppajjissati;
pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca nuppajjissati,
v.kh. ca uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yattha v.kh.
nuppajjissati, tassa tattha r.kh. nuppajjissatīti2? Asañña-
sattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha r.kh. nuppajjissati; pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha v.kh. ca3 nuppajjissati, r.kh. ca nuppajjissati.
     7. i. Yassa r.kh. uppajjati, tassa v.kh. uppajjitthāti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana v.kh. uppajjittha, tassa r.kh.
uppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ arūpaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ v.kh. uppajjittha, na ca tesaṃ r.kh. uppajjati; pañ-
cavokārānaṃ4 uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ v.kh. ca3 uppajjittha, r.kh. ca uppajjati.
     Yassa v.kh. uppajjati, tassa saññākkhandho uppajjit-
thāti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana s.kh. uppajjittha, tassa
v.kh. uppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ s.kh. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ v.kh.
uppajjati; catuvokāran pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
s.kh. ca uppajjittha. v.kh. ca uppajjati.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. uppajjati, tattha v.kh. uppajjitthāti?
Asaññasatte tattha r.kh. uppajjati, no ca tattha v.kh.
uppajjittha. *Pañcavokāre tattha r.kh. ca uppajjati, v.kh.
ca uppajjitthe.*5 Yattha vā pana v.kh. uppajjittha, tattha
r.kh. uppajjatīti? Arūpe tattha v.kh. uppajjittha, no ca
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. omits.
2 S. nuppajjissati.
3 S. omits.
4 S. and Br. pañcavokāraṃ.
5 S. omits sentence * to *.


[page 024]
24                         Khandhayamakaṃ
tattha r.kh. uppajjati. Pañcavokāre tattha v.kh. ca uppaj-
jittha, r.kh. ca uppajjati.
     Yattha v.kh. uppajjati, tattha s.kh. uppajjitthāti?
Āmantā. Yattha vā pana s.kh. uppajjittha, tattha v.kh.
uppajjatīti? Āmantā.
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. uppajjati, tassa tattha v.kh.
uppajjitthāti? Suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha v.kh. uppajjittha; itaresaṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. uppajjittha, v.kh. ca uppajjittha.
Yassa vā pana yattha v.kh. uppajjittha, tassa tattha r.kh.
uppajjatīti? Pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha v.kh. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh. uppaj-
jati. pañcavokāraṃ1 uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca
uppajjittha, r.kh. ca uppajjati.
     Yassa yattha v.kh. uppajjati, tassa tattha s.kh. uppaj-
jitthāti? Suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh.
uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha s.kh. uppajjittha; itaresaṃ
catuvokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
v.kh. ca uppajjati, s.kh. ca uppajjittha. Yassa vā pana
yattha s.kh. uppajjittha, tassa tattha v.kh. uppajjatīti?
Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha s.kh.
uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. uppajjati; catuvo-
kāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha s.kh. ca
uppajjittha, v.kh. ca uppajjati.
     8. i. Yassa r.kh. nuppajjati, tassa v.kh. nuppajjitthāti?
Uppajjittha. Yassa vā pana v.kh. nuppajjittha, tassa r.kh.
nuppajjatīti? Natthi.
     Yassa v.kh. nuppajjati, tassa s.kh. nuppajjitthāti?
Uppajjittha. Yassa vā pana s.kh. nuppajjittha, tassa
v.kh. nuppajjatīti? Natthi.
     ii. 2Yattha r.kh. nuppajjati, tattha v.kh. nuppajjitthāti?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. pañcavokārā.
2 S. inserts yattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjatīti natthi.


[page 025]
                          Khandhayamakaṃ                25
Uppajjittha. Yattha vā pana v.kh. nuppajjittha, tattha
r.kh. nuppajjatīti? Uppajjati.
     Yattha v.kh. nuppajjati, tattha s.kh. nuppajjitthāti?
Āmantā. Yattha vā pana s.kh. nuppajjittha, tattha v.kh.
nuppajjatīti? Āmantā.
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. nuppajjati, tassa tattha v.kh.
nuppajjitthāti? Pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha r.kh. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nuppaj-
jittha; suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattā cavan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca nuppajjati, v.kh. ca nuppaj-
jittha. Yassa vā pana yattha v.kh. nuppajjittha, tassa
tattha r.kh. nuppajjatīti? Suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
asaññasatta. uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nuppaj-
jittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh. nuppajjati; suddhāvāse
parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ1 cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
v.kh. ca nuppajjittha, r.kh. ca nuppajjati.
     Yassa yattha v.kh. nuppajjati, tassa tattha s.kh. nuppaj-
jitthāti? Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
v.kh. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha s.kh. nuppajjittha;
suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattā2 cavantānaṃ3
tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca nuppajjati, s.kh. ca nuppajjittha.
Yassa vā pana yattha s.kh. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha v.kh.
nuppajjatīti? Suddhāvāsaṃ nuppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
s.kh. nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nuppajjati,
suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ4 cavantānaṃ5
tesaṃ tattha s.kh. ca *nuppajjittha, v.kh. ca *6 nuppajjati.
     9. i. Yassa r.kh. uppajjati, tassa v.kh. uppajjissatīti?
Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
r.kh. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ v.kh. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ
pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br.asaññasattā cavantānaṃ.
2 Br. asaññasattānaṃ.
3 S. and Br. omit.
4 K. asaññasattā.
5 S. and Br. omit.
6 S. omits * to *.


[page 026]
26                                  Khandhayamakaṃ
tesaṃ r.kh. ca uppajjati, v.kh. ca uppajjissati. Yassa vā
pana v.kh. uppajjissati, tassa r.kh. uppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ
cavantānaṃ arūpaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh. uppajjissati,
no ca tesaṃ r.kh. uppajjati; pañcavokāraṃ1 uppajjantānaṃ,
asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh. ca uppajjissati,
r.kh. ca uppajjati.
     Yassa v.kh. uppajjati, tassa s.kh. uppajjissatīti? Pac-
chimabhavikānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh. uppajjati, no
ca tesaṃ s.kh. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ catuvokāraṃ pañca-
vokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh. ca uppajjati, s.kh. ca
uppajjissati. Yassa va pana s.kh. uppajjissati, tassa v.kh.
uppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesaṃ s.kh. uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ v.kh. uppaj-
jati; catuvokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
s.kh. ca uppajjissati, *vkh. ca uppajjati.*2
     ii. Yattha r.kh. uppajjati, tattha v.kh. uppajjissatīti?
Asaññasatte tattha r.kh. uppajjati, no ca tattha v.kh.
uppajjissati; pañcavokāre tattha r.kh. ca uppajjati, v.kh.
ca uppajjissati. Yattha vā pana v.kh. uppajjissati, tattha
r.kh. uppajjatīti? Arūpe tattha v.kh. uppajjissati, no ca
tattha r.kh. uppajjati; pañcavokāre tattha v.kh. ca uppaj-
jissati, r.kh. ca uppajjati.
     Yattha v.kh. uppajjati, tattha s.kh. uppajjissatīti?
Āmantā. Yattha vā pana s.kh. uppajjissati, tattha v.kh.
uppajjatīti? Āmantā.
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. uppajjati, tassa tattha v.kh.
uppajjissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ up-
pajjantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
r.kh. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. uppajjissati;
itaresaṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh.
ca uppajjati, v.kh. ca uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yattha
v.kh. uppajjissati, tassa tattha r.kh. uppajjatīti? Pañca-
vokārā cavantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. uppaj-
jissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh. uppajjati; pañcavokāraṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca uppajjissati, r.kh. ca
uppajjati.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. pañcavokārā.
2 S. omits * to *.


[page 027]
                          Khandhayamakaṃ                       27
     Yassa yattha v.kh. uppajjati, tassa tattha s.kh. up-
pajjissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha v.kh. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha s.kh. uppajjis-
sati: itaresaṃ catuvokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca uppajjati, s.kh. ca uppajjissati.
Yassa vā pana yattha s.kh. uppajjissati, tassa tattha v.kh.
uppajjatīti? Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha s.kh. uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. uppajjati;
catuvokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
s.kh. ca uppajjissati, v.kh. ca uppajjati.
     10. i. Yassa r.kh. nuppajjati, tassa v.kh. nuppajjissatīti?
Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ arūpaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ r.kh.
nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ v.kh. nuppajjissati; pañcavokāre
parinibbantānaṃ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ r.kh.
ca nuppajjati, v.kh. ca nuppajjissati. Yassa vā pana
v.kh. nuppajjissati, tassa r.kh. nuppajjatīti? Pacchima-
bhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh. nup-
pajjissati, no ca tesaṃ r.kh. nuppajjati; pañcavokāre
parinibbantānaṃ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh.
ca nuppajjissati, r.kh. ca nuppajjati.
     Yassa v.kh. nuppajjati, tassa s.kh. nuppajjissatīti?
Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ1 tesaṃ
v.kh. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ s.kh. nuppajjissati, parinib-
bantānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh. ca nuppajjati, s.kh. ca nuppajjissati.
Yassa vā pana s.kh. nuppajjissati, tassa v.kh. nuppajjatīti?
Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāran2 uppajjantānaṃ3 tesaṃ
s.kh. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ v.kh. nuppajjati; parinib-
bantānaṃ tesaṃ s.kh. ca nuppajjissati, v.kh. ca nuppajjati.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. nuppajjati, tattha v.kh. nuppajjissatīti?
Uppajjissati. Yattha vā pana v.kh. nuppajjissati, tattha
r.kh. nuppajjatīti? Uppajjati.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. upajjantānaṃ here only.
2 S. and Br. omit.
3 Br. upapajjantānaṃ as before.


[page 028]
28                          Khandhayamakaṃ
     Yattha v.kh. nuppajjati, tattha s.kh. nuppajjissatīti?
Āmantā Yattha vā pana s.kh. nuppajjissati, tattha v.kh.
nuppajjatīti? Āmantā.
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. nuppajjati, tassa tattha v.kh.
nuppajjissatīti? Pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha r.kh. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nuppaj-
jissati' pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpe pacchima-
bhavikānaṃ asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca
nuppajjati, v.kh. ca nuppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yattha
v.kh. nuppajjissati. tassa tattha r.kh. nuppajjatīti? Pac-
chimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ asañña-
sattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nuppajjissāti, no
ca tesaṃ tattha1 r.kh. nuppajjati: pañcavokāre parinib-
bantānaṃ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ asaññasattā cavan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca nuppajjissati, r.kh. ca nuppajjati.
     Yassa yattha v.kh. nuppajjati, tassa tattha s.kh. nup-
pajjissatīti? Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha v.kh. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha s.kh. nuppaj-
jissati; parinibbantanaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
v.kh. ca nuppajjati, s.kh. ca nuppajjissati. Yassa vā pana
yattha s.kh. nuppajjissati, tassa2 tattha v.kh. nuppajjatīti?
Pacchimabhavikānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha s.kh.
nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nuppajjati; parinib-
bantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha s.kh. ca nuppajjis-
sati, v.kh. ca nuppajjati.
     11. i. Yassa r.kh. uppajjittha, tassa v.kh. uppajjissatīti?3
Pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ r.kh. uppajjittha,4 no ca tesaṃ
v.kh. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ5 r.kh. ca uppajjittha, v.kh. ca
uppajjissati. Yasa vā pana v.kh. uppajjissati, tassa r.kh.
uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. inserts vedanākkhandho nuppajjissati no ca tesaṃ tattha.
2 S. omits.
3 S. nuppajjissatīti.
4 S. nuppajjittha.
5 Br. inserts tesaṃ.


[page 029]
                             Khandhayamakaṃ                  29
     Yassa v.kh. uppajjittha, tassa s.kh. uppajjissatīti?
Pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ
s.kh. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ v.kh. ca uppajjittha, s.kh. ca
uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana s.kh. uppajjissati, tassa v.kh.
uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. uppajjittha, tattha v.kh. uppajjissatīti?
Asaññasatte tattha r.kh. uppajjittha, no ca tattha v.kh.
uppajjissati; pañcavokāre tattha r.kh. ca uppajjittha,
v.kh. ca uppajjissati. Yattha vā pana v.kh. uppajjissati,
tattha r.kh. uppajjitthāti? Arūpe tattha v.kh. upajjis-
sati, no ca tattha r.kh. uppajjittha; pañcavokāre tattha
v.kh. ca uppajjissati, r.kh. ca uppajjittha.
     Yattha v.kh. uppajjittha, tattha s.kh. uppajjissatīti?
Āmantā. Yattha vā pana s.kh. uppajjissati, tattha v.kh.
uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. uppajjittha, tassa tattha v.kh.
uppajjissatīti? Pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṃ asañ-
ñasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ
tattha v.kh. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha r.kh. ca uppajjittha, v.kh. ca uppajjissati. Yassa
vā pana yattha v.kh. uppajjissati, tassa tattha r.kh. uppaj-
jitthāti? Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. uppajjissati, no ca
tesaṃ tattha r.kh. uppajjittha; pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha v.kh. ca uppajjissati, r.kh. ca uppajjittha.
     Yassa yattha v.kh. uppajjittha, tassa tattha s.kh.
uppajjissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh.
uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha s.kh. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ
catuvokārānaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca
uppajjittha, s.kh. ca1 uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yattha
s.kh. uppajjissati, tassa tattha v.kh. uppajjitthāti?
Āmantā.
     12. i. Yassa r.kh. nuppajjittha, tassa v.kh. nuppajjissa-
tīti2? Natthi. Yassa vā pana v.kh. nuppajjissati, tassa
r.kh. nuppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. omits.
2 S. nuppajjissati.


[page 030]
30                       Khandhayamakaṃ
     Yassa v.kh. nuppajjittha, tassa s.kh. nuppajjissatīti?
Natthi. Yassa vā pana s.kh. nuppajjissati, tassa v.kh.
nuppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. nuppajjittha, tattha v.kh. nuppajjis-
satīti? Uppajjissati. Yattha vā pana v.kh. nuppajjissati,
tattha r.kh. nuppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.
     Yattha v.kh. nuppajjittha, tattha s.kh. nuppajjissatīti?
Āmantā. Yattha vā pana s.kh. nuppajjissati, tattha v.kh.
nuppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha1 v.kh.
nuppajjissatīti? Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. nuppajjittha,
no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nuppajjissati. Suddhāvāsānaṃ
arūpe pacchimabhavikānan tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca nuppaj-
jittha, v.kh. ca nuppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yattha v.kh.
nuppajjissati, tassa tattha r.kh. nuppajjitthāti? Pañcavo-
kāre pacchimabhavikānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
v.kh. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh. nuppajjittha;
suddhāvāsānaṃ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
v.kh. ca nuppajjissati, r.kh. ca nuppajjittha.
     Yassa yattha v.kh. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha s.kh.
nuppajjissatīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana yattha s.kh.
nuppajjissati, tassa tattha v.kh. nuppajjitthāti? Pacchima-
bhavikānaṃ tesaṃ tattha s.kh. nuppajjissati. no ca tesaṃ
tattha v.kh. nuppajjittha, suddhāvāsānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha s.kh.2 nuppajjissati, v.kh. ca nuppajjittha.
                         UPPĀDAVĀRAṂ NIṬṬHITAṂ.
                              [Nirodhavāro. ]
     1. i. Yassa rūpakkhandho nirujjhati, tassa vedanāk-
khandho nirujjhatīti? Asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ
r.kh. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ v.kh. nirujjhati; pañcavo-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. omits.
2 S. and Br. inserts ca.


[page 031]
                             Khandhayamakaṃ                31
kārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ r.kh. ca nirujjhati, v.kh. ca niruj-
jhati. Yassa vā pana v.kh. nirujjhati, tassa r.kh. niruj-
jhatīti? Arūpā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh. nirujjhati, no ca
tesaṃ r.kh. nirujjhati; pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ
v.kh. ca1 nirujjhati, r.kh. ca nirujjhati.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. nirujjhati, tattha v.kh. nirujjhatīti?
Asaññasatte tattha r.kh. nirujjhati, no ca tattha v.kh.
nirujjhati; pañcavokāre tattha r.kh. ca nirujjhati, v.kh.
ca nirujjhati. Yattha vā pana v.kh. nirujjhati, tattha
r.kh. nirujjhatīti? Arūpe tattha v.kh. nirujjhati, no ca
tattha r.kh. nirujjhati; pañcavokāre tattha v.kh. ca niruj-
jhati, r.kh. ca nirujjhati.
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. nirujjhati, tassa tattha v.kh.
nirujjhatīti2? Asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh.
nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nirujjhati; pañcavo-
kārā3 cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca nirujjhati, v.kh.
ca1 nirujjhati. Yassa vā pana yattha v.kh. nirujjhati,
tassa tattha r.kh. nirujjhatīti? Arūpā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha v.kh. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh. nirujjhati;
pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca nirujjhati,
r.kh. ca nirujjhati.
     2. i. Yassa r.kh. na nirujjhati, tassa v.kh. na niruj-
jhatīti? Arūpā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ r.kh. na nirujjhati,
*no ca tesaṃ v.kh. na nirujjhati*4; sabbesaṃ uppajjan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ r.kh. ca1 na nirujjhati, v.kh. ca na nirujjhati.
Yassa vā pana v.kh. na nirujjhati, tassa r.kh. na niruj-
jhatīti? Asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh. na niruj-
jhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha5 r.kh. na nirujjhati; sabbesaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha5 v.kh. ca na6 nirujjhati, r.kh.
ca na nirujjhati.

1 S. omits.
2 S. nirujjhati.
3 S. pañcavokāraṃ.
4 S. omits * to *.
5 S. and Br. omit.
6 Br. omits.


[page 032]
32                         Khandhayamakaṃ
     Yattha r.kh. na nirujjhati, tattha v.kh. na nirujjhatīti?
Nirujjhati.
     ii. Yattha vā pana v.kh. na nirujjhati, tattha r.kh. na
nirujjhatīti? Nirujjhati.
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. na nirujjhati, tassa tattha v.kh.
na nirujjhatīti? Arūpā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. na
nirujjhati. no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. na nirujjhati; sabbesaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca na nirujjhati, *v.kh.
ca na nirujjhati.*1 Yassa vā pana yattha v.kh. na niruj-
jhati, tassa tattha r.kh. na nirujjhatīti? Asaññasattā
cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha r.kh. na nirujjhati; sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha v.kh. ca na nirujjhati, r.kh. ca na nirujjhati.
     3. i. Yassa r.kh. nirujjhittha, tassa v.kh. nirujjhitthāti?
{Āmantā.} Yassa vā pana v.kh. nirujjhittha, tassa r.kh.
nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. nirujjhittha, tattha v.kh. nirujjhitthāti?
Asaññasatte tattha r.kh. nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ2 tattha
v.kh.3 nirujjhittha; pañcavokāre tattha r.kh. ca nirujjhittha,
v.kh. ca nirujjhittha. Yattha vā pana v.kh. nirujjhittha,
tattha4 r.kh. nirujjhitthāti? Arūpe tattha v.kh. niruj-
jhittha, no ca tattha r.kh. nirujjhittha; pañcavokāre tattha
v.kh. ca nirujjhittha, r.kh. ca nirujjhittha.
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. nirujjhittha, tassa tattha v.kh.
nirujjhitthāti? Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. niruj-
jhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nirujjhittha; pañcavo-
kārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca nirujjhittha, v.kh. ca niruj-
jhittha. Yassa vā pana yattha v.kh. nirujjhittha, tassa
tattha r.kh. nirujjhitthāti? Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh.
nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh. nirujjhittha; pañca-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. omits * to *
2 S. and Br. omit.
3 S. inserts ca.
4 S. omits.


[page 033]
                          Khandhayamakaṃ                  33
vokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca nirujjhittha r.kh. ca
nirujjhittha.
     4. i. Yassa r.kh. na nirujjhittha, tassa v.kh. na niruj-
jitthāti? Natthi. Yassa vā pana v.kh. na nirujjhittha,
tassa r.kh. na nirujjhitthāti? Natthi.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. na nirujjhittha, tattha v.kh. na niruj-
jhitthāti? Nirujjhittha. Yattha vā pana v.kh. na niruj-
jhittha, tattha r.kh. na nirujjhitthāti? Nirujjhittha.
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. na nirujjhittha, tassa tattha
v.kh. na nirujjhitthāti? Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. na
nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. na nirujjhittha;
suddhāvāsānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca na nirujjhittha, v.kh.
ca na nirujjhittha. Yassa vā pana yattha v.kh. na niruj-
jhittha, tassa tattha r.kh. na nirujjhitthāti? Asaññasat-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. na nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha
r.kh. na nirujjhittha; suddhāvāsānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh.
ca na nirujjhittha, r.kh. ca na nirujjhittha.
     5. i. Yassa r.kh. nirujjhissati, tassa v.kh. nirujjhissa-
tīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana v.kh. nirujjhissati, tassa
r.kh. nirujjhissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ arūpaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ, ye ca arūpaṃ uppajjitvā1 parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ
cavantānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ r.kh.
nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ2 v.kh. ca nirujjhissati, r.kh. ca
nirujjhissati.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. nirujjhissati tattha v.kh. nirujjhissa-
tīti? Asaññasatte tattha r.kh. nirujjhissati, no ca tattha
v.kh. nirujjhissati; pañcavokāre tattha r.kh. ca nirujjhis-
sati, v.kh. ca nirujjhissati. Yattha vā pana v.kh. niruj-
jhissati, tattha r.kh. nirujjhissatīti? Arūpe tattha v.kh.
nirujjhissati, no ca tattha r.kh. nirujjhissati; pañcavo-
kāre tattha v.kh. ca nirujjhissati, r.kh. ca nirujjhissati.
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. nirujjhissati, tassa tattha v.kh.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. upapajjitvā always.
2 Br. inserts tesaṃ.


[page 034]
34                           Khandhayamakaṃ
nirujjhissatīti? Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. niruj-
jhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nirujjhissati: pañcavo-
kārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca nirujjhissati, v.kh. ca niruj-
jhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha v.kh. nirujjhissati, tassa
tattha r.kh. nirujjhissatīti? Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh.
nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh. nirujjhissati;
pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca nirujjhissati, r.kh.
ca nirujjhissati.
     6 i. Yassa r.kh. na nirujjhissati, tassa v.kh. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ arūpaṃ uppajjantānaṃ,
ye ca arūpaṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ cavan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ r.kh. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ v.kh. na
nirujjhissati; parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ r.kh. ca na niruj-
jhissati, v.kh. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana v.kh.
na nirujjhissati, tassa r.kh. na nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. na nirujjhissati, tattha v.kh. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Nirujjhissati. Yattha vā pana v.kh. na niruj-
jhissati. tattha r.kh. na nirujjhissatīti? Nirujjhissati.
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha
v.kh. na nirujjhissatīti? Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. na
nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. na nirujjhissati;
parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca na nirujjhissati,
v.kh. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha v.kh. na
nirujjhissati, tassa tattha r.kh. na nirujjhissatīti? Asañ-
ñasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha r.kh. na nirujjhissati; parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
v.kh. ca na nirujjhissati, r.kh. ca na nirujjhissati.
     7. i. Yassa r.kh. nirujjhati, tassa v.kh. nirujjhitthāti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana v.kh. nirujjhittha, tassa r.kh.
nirujjhatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ1 tesaṃ v.kh. niruj-
jhittha, no ca tesaṃ r.kh. nirujjhati; pañcavokārā cavan-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. inserts arūpā catuvokārā cavantānaṃ. Br. arūpā cavantānaṃ.


[page 035]
                              Khandhayamakaṃ                    35
tānaṃ asaññasattā1 cavantānaṃ1 tesaṃ v.kh. ca niruj-
jhittha, r.kh. ca nirujjhati.
     Yassa v.kh. nirujjhati, tassa saññākkhandho nirujjhit-
thāti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana s.kh. nirujjhittha, tassa
v.kh. nirujjhatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattā
cavantānaṃ tesaṃ s.kh. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ v.kh. niruj-
jhati; catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ s.kh.
ca nirujjhittha, v.kh. ca nirujjhati.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. nirujjhati, tattha v.kh. nirujjhitthāti?
Asaññasatte tattha r.kh. nirujjhati, no ca tattha v.kh.
nirujjhittha; pañcavokāre tattha r.kh. ca nirujjhati, v.kh.
ca nirujjhittha. Yattha vā pana v.kh. nirujjhittha, tattha
r.kh. nirujjhatīti? Arūpe tattha v.kh. nirujjhittha, no
ca tattha r.kh. nirujjhati; pañcavokāre tattha v.kh. ca
nirujjhittha r.kh. ca nirujjhati.2
     Yattha v.kh. nirujjhati, tattha s.kh. nirujjhitthāti?
Āmantā. Yattha vā pana s.kh. nirujjhittha, tattha v.kh.
nirujjhatīti? Āmantā.
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. nirujjhati, tassa tattha v.kh.
nirujjhitthāti? Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattā
cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha v.kh. nirujjhittha; itaresaṃ pañcavokārā cavan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca nirujjhati, v.kh. ca nirujjhittha

r.kh. nirujjhatīti? Pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh.
nirujjhati; pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca
nirujjhittha, r.kh. ca nirujjhittha.
     Yassa yattha v.kh. nirujjhati, tassa tattha s.kh. niruj-
jhitthāti? Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh.
nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha s.kh. nirujjhittha; itaresaṃ
catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh.
ca3 nirujjhati, s.kh. ca nirujjhittha. Yassa vā pana
yattha s.kh. nirujjhittha, tassa tattha v.kh. nirujjhatīti?
Catuvokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha

1 S. omits.
2 S. nirujjhittha.
3 S. omits.


[page 036]
36                        Khandhayamakaṃ
s.kh. nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nirujjhati;
catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha s.kh. ca
{nirujjhittha,} v.kh. ca nirujjhati.
     8. i. Yassa r.kh. na nirujjhati, tassa v.kh. na niruj-
jhitthāti? Nirujjhittha. Yassa vā pana v.kh. na niruj-
jhittha, tassa r.kh. na nirujjhatīti? Natthi. Yassa v.kh.
na nirujjhati, tassa s.kh. na nirujjhitthāti? Nirujjhittha.
Yassa vā pana s.kh. na nirujjhittha, tassa v.kh. na niruj-
jhatīti? Natthi.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. . . . (yattakaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ kātabbaṃ).1
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. na nirujjhati, tassa tattha v.kh.
na nirujjhitthāti? Pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha r.kh. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh.
na nirujjhittha; suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca na nirujjhati, v.kh.
ca na nirujjhittha. Yassa vā pana yattha v.kh. na niruj-
jittha, tassa tattha r.kh. na nirujjhatīti? Suddhāvāse
parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh.
na nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh. na nirujjhati;
suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca na nirujjhittha, r.kh. ca na niruj-
jhati.
     Yassa yattha v.kh. na nirujjhati, tassa tattha s.kh. na
nirujjhitthāti? Catuvokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha v.kh. na nirujjhati; no ca tesaṃ tattha s.kh.
na nirujjhittha; suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattā2
cavantānaṃ3 tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca na nirujjhati, s.kh. ca
na nirujjhittha. Yassa vā pana yattha s.kh. na niruj-
jhittha, tassa tattha v.kh. na nirujjhatīti? Suddhāvāse
parinibbantānaṃ tesan tattha s.kh. na nirujjhittha, no ca
tesaṃ tattha v.kh. na nirujjhati; suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Cf. corresponding ii., p. 35.
2 S. and Br. asaññasattānaṃ.
3 S. and Br. omit.


[page 037]
                           Khandhayamakaṃ                      37
asaññasattā1 cavantānaṃ2 tesaṃ tattha s.kh. ca3 niruj-
jhittha, v.kh. ca na nirujjhati.
     9. i. Yassa r.kh. nirujjhati, tassa v.kh. nirujjhissatīti?
Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ r.kh. nirujjhati, no ca
tesaṃ v.kh. nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ
asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ r.kh. ca nirujjhati, v.kh. ca
nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana v.kh. nirujjhissati, tassa
r.kh. nirujjhatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ arūpā cavan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ r.kh. niruj-
jhati; pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ asaññasattā cavantānaṃ
tesaṃ v.kh. ca nirujjhissati, r.kh. ca nirujjhati.
     Yassa v.kh. nirujjhati, tassa s.kh. nirujjhissatīti? Pari-
nibbantānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ s.kh.
nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ
tesaṃ v.kh. ca nirujjhati, s.kh. ca nirujjhissati. Yassa
vā pana s.kh. nirujjhissati, tassa v.kh. nirujjhatīti?
Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ
s.kh. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ v.kh. nirujjhati; catuvokārā
pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ s.kh. ca4 nirujjhissati,
v.kh. ca nirujjhati.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. nirujjhati, tassa tattha v.kh.
nirujjhissatīti? Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattā
cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
v.kh. nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha r.kh. ca nirujjhati, v.kh. ca nirujjhissati. Yassa vā
pana yattha v.kh. nirujjhissati, tassa tattha r.kh. niruj-
jhatīti? Pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha v.kh. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh. niruj-
jhati; pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca
nirujjhissati, r.kh. ca nirujjhati.
     Yassa yattha v.kh. nirujjhati, tassa tattha s.kh. niruj-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. omits. Br. asaññasattānaṃ.
2 S. and Br. omit.
3 S. omits.
4 S. Omits.


[page 038]
38                       Khandhayamakaṃ
jhissatīti? Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. niruj-
jhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha s.kh. nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ catu-
vokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca
nirujjhati, s.kh. ca nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha
s.kh. nirujjhissati, tassa tattha v.kh. nirujjhatīti? Catu-
vokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha s.kh.
nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nirujjhati; catuvo-
kārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha s.kh. ca niruj-
jhissati, v.kh. ca nirujjhati.
     10. i. Yassa r.kh. na nirujjhati, tassa v.kh. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ arūpā cavantānaṃ
tesaṃ r.kh. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ v.kh. na nirujjhis-
sati; arūpe parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ r.kh. ca na nirujjhati,
v.kh. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana v.kh. na
nirujjhissati, tassa r.kh. na nirujjhatīti? Pañcavokāre
parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ
r.kh. na nirujjhati; arūpe parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh. ca
na nirujjhissati, r.kh. ca na nirujjhati. Yassa v.kh. na
nirujjhati, tassa s.kh. na nirujjhissatīti? Nirujjhissati.
Yassa vā pana s.kh. na nirujjhissati, tassa v.kh. na
nirujjhatīti? Nirujjhati.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. na nirujjhati, tassa tattha v.kh.
na nirujjhissatīti? Pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ
tesaṃ tattah r.kh. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh.
na nirujjhissati; arūpe parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ up-
pajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca na nirujjhati, v.kh. ca
na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha v.kh. na niruj-
jhissati, tassa tattha r.kh. na nirujjhatīti? Pañcavokāre
parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh.
na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh. na nirujjhati;
arūpe parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha v.kh. ca na nirujjhissati, r.kh. ca na nirujjhati.
Yassa yattha v.kh. na nirujjhati, tassa tattha s.kh. na
nirujjhissatīti? Catuvokāraṃ pañcavokāran uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha v.kh. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha s.kh.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 039]
                        Khandhayamakaṃ                       39
na nirujjhissati; asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca na
nirujjhati, s.kh. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha
s.kh. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha v.kh. na nirujjhatīti?
Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha s.kh. na nirujjhissati, no ca
tesaṃ tattha v.kh. na nirujjhati; asaññasattā1 cavantānaṃ2
tesaṃ tattha s.kh. ca na nirujjhissati, v.kh. ca na niruj-
jhati.
     11. i. Yassa r.kh. nirujjhittha, tassa v.kh. nirujjhis-
satīti? Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ r.kh. nirujjhittha,3 no ca
tesaṃ v.kh. nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ4 r.kh. ca nirujjhittha,
v.kh. ca nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana v.kh. nirujjhissati,
tassa r.kh. nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa v.kh. niruj-
jhittha, tassa s.kh. nirujjhissatīti? Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ
v.kh. nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ s.kh. nirujjhissati: *itare-
saṃ5 v.kh. ca nirujjhittha, s.kh. ca nirujjhissati.*6 Yassa
vā pana s.kh. nirujjhissati, tassa v.kh. nirujjhitthāti?
Āmantā.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. nirujjhittha . . . pe . . .
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. nirujjhittha, tassa tattha v.kh.
nirujjhissatīti? Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ asañña-
sattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha
v.kh. nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
r.kh. ca nirujjhittha, v.kh. ca nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana
yattha v.kh. nirujjhissati, tassa tattha r.kh. nirujjhitthāti?
Suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh.
nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh. nirujjhittha; itaresaṃ
pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca nirujjhissati, r.kh.
ca nirujjhittha.
     Yassa yattha v.kh. nirujjhittha, tassa tattha s.kh.
nirujjhissatīti? Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. niruj-
jhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha s.kh. nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ

40                          Khandhayamakaṃ
catuvokārapañcavokārānaṃ1 tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca niruj-
jhittha, s.kh. ca nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha s.kh.
nirujjhissati, tassa tattha v.kh. nirujjhitthāti? Suddhā-
vāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha s.kh. nirujjhissati, no
ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nirujjhittha; itaresaṃ catuvokāra-
pañcavokārānaṃ2 tesaṃ tattha s.kh. ca nirujjhissati, v.kh.
ca nirujjhittha.
     12. i. Yassa r.kh. na nirujjhittha, tassa v.kh. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Natthi. Yassa vā pana v.kh. na nirujjhissati,
tassa r.kh. na nirujjhitthāti? Nirujjhittha.
     Yassa v.kh. na nirujjhittha,3 *tassa s.kh. na nirujjhis-
satīti? Natthi. *4 Yassa vā pana s.kh. na nirujjhissati,
tassa v.kh. na nirujjhitthāti? Nirujjhittha . . . pe . . .
     ii. Yattha r.kh. na nirujjhittha5 . . . pe . . .
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. na nirujjhittha, {tassa} tattha
v.kh. na nirujjhissatīti? Suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. na nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ
tattha v.kh. na nirujjhissati; suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ
arūpe parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca na nirujjhittha,
v.kh. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha v.kh. na
nirujjhissati, tassa tattha r.kh. na nirujjhitthāti? Pañ-
cavokāre parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh.
na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh. na nirujjhittha;
suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ arūpe parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha v.kh. ca na nirujjhissati, r.kh. ca na nirujjhittha.
Yassa yattha v.kh. na nirujjhittha, tassa tattha s.kh. na
nirujjhissatīti? Suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
v.kh. na nirujjhittha no ca tesaṃ tattha s.kh. na nirujjhis-
sati; suddhāvāse {parinibbantānaṃ} asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha v.kh. ca na nirujjhittha, s.kh. ca na nirujjhissati

1 S. and Br. catuvokārānaṃ.
2 S. and Br. catuvokāraṃ.
