[page 041]
                               Khandhayamakaṃ                  41
Yassa vā pana yattha s.kh. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha
v.kh. na nirujjhitthāti? Pañcavokāre1 parinibbantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha s.kh. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh.
na nirujjhittha; suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ2 tesaṃ tattha
s.kh. ca na nirujjhissati, v.kh. ca na nirujjhittha.
                            NIRODHAVĀRAṂ NIṬṬHITAṂ
                           [Uppāda-nirodha-vāro. ]
     1. i. Yassa rūpakkhandho uppajjati, tassa vedanākkhandho
nirujjhatīti? No. Yassa vā pana v.kh. nirujjhati, tassa
r.kh. uppajjatīti? No. Yassa v.kh. uppajjati, tassa saññāk-
khandho nirujjhatīti? No. Yassa vā pana s.kh. nirujjhati,
tassa v.kh. uppajjatīti? No.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. uppajjati, tattha v.kh. nirujjhatīti?
Asaññasatte tattha r.kh. uppajjati, no ca tattha v.kh. niruj-
jhati; pañcavokāre tattha r.kh. ca uppajjati, v.kh. ca
nirujjhati. Yattha vā pana v.kh. nirujjhati, tattha r.kh.
uppajjatīti? Arūpe tattha v.kh. nirujjhati, no ca tattha
r.kh. uppajjati; pañcavokāre tattha v.kh. ca nirujjhati,
r.kh. ca uppajjati. Yattha v.kh. uppajjati, tattha s.kh.
nirujjhatīti? Āmantā. Yattha vā pana s.kh. nirujjhati,
tattha v.kh. uppajjatīti? Āmantā.
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. uppajjati, tassa tattha v.kh. niruj-
jhatīti? No. Yassa vā pana yuttha v.kh. nirujjhati,
tassa tattha r.kh. uppajjatīti? No. Yassa yattha v.kh.
uppajjati, tassa tattha s.kh. nirujjhatīti? No. Yassa vā
pana yattha s.kh. nirujjhati, tassa tattha v.kh. uppajja-
tīti? No.
     2. i. Yassa r.kh. nuppajjati, tassa v.kh. na nirujjhatīti?
Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ r.kh. nuppajjati,
no ca tesaṃ v.kh. na nirujjhati; arūpaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. and Br. omits
2 S. and Br. insert asaññasattānaṃ.


[page 042]
42                       Khandhayamakaṃ
asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ r.kh. ca nuppajjati, v.kh. ca
na nirujjhati. Yassa vā pana v.kh. na nirujjhati, tassa
r.kh. nuppajjatīti? Pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ asañña-
sattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ
r.kh. nuppajjati; arupaṃ uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattā ca-
vantānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh. ca na nirujjhati, r.kh. ca nuppajjati.
     Yassa v.kh. nuppajjati, tassa s.kh. na nirujjhatīti?1
Catuvokārā . . . (as for rūpakkhandha above) . . . na niruj-
jhati; asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh. ca nuppajjati, s.kh. ca
na nirujjhati. Yassa vā pana s.kh. na nirujjhati, tassa
v.kh. uppajjatīti? Catuvokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ s.kh. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ v.kh. nuppaj-
jati: asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ s.kh. ca na nirujjhati, v.kh. ca
nuppajjati.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. nuppajjati, tattha v.kh. na nirujjhatīti?
Nirujjhati. Yattha vā pana v.kh. na nirujjhati, tattha r.kh.
nuppajjatīti?2 Uppajjati.3 Yattha v.kh. nuppajjati, tattha
s.kh. na nirujjhatīti? Āmantā. Yattha vā pana s.kh. . . .
pe . . . nuppajjatīti? Āmantā.
     iii. Yassa4 yattha r.kh. nuppajjati, tassa tattha v.kh. na
nirujjhatīti? Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha r.kh. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. na niruj-
jhati; arūpaṃ uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha r.kh. ca nuppajjati, v.kh. ca na nirujjhati. Yassa
vā pana yattha v.kh. na nirujjhati, tassa tattha r.kh.
nuppajjatīti? Pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha r.kh. nuppajjati; arūpaṃ uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattā
cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca na nirujjhati, r.kh. ca
nuppajjati.
     Yassa yattha v.kh. nuppajjati, tassa tattha s.kh. na
nirujjhatīti? Catuvokārā . . . (as for rūpakkhandha
above) . . . na nirujjhati, asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
v.kh. ca nuppajjati, s.kh. ca na nirujjhati. Yassa vā pana
yattha s.kh. na nirujjhati, tassa tattha v.kh. nuppajjatīti?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. nirujjhati.
2 S. nuppajjati.
3 S. and Br. omit.
4 K. and Br. vā pana.


[page 043]
                          Khandhayamakaṃ                      43
Catuvokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ1 uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
s.kh. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nuppajjati;
asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha s.kh. ca na nirujjhati, v.kh. ca
nuppajjati.
     3. i. Yassa r.kh. uppajjittha, tassa v.kh. nirujjhitthāti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana v.kh. nirujjhittha, tassa r.kh.
uppajjitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa v.kh. uppajjittha, tassa
s.kh. nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana s.kh. niruj-
jhittha, tassa v.kh. uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. uppajjittha, tassa tattha v.kh.
nirujjhitthāti? Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. uppaj-
jittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nirujjhittha; pañcavokā-
rānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca uppajjittha, v.kh. ca nirujjhittha.
Yassa vā pana yattha v.kh. nirujjhittha, tassa tattha r.kh.
uppajjitthāti? Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nirujjhittha,
no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh. uppajjittha; pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha v.kh. ca nirujjhittha, r.kh. ca uppajjittha. Yassa
yattha v.kh. uppajjittha, tassa tattha s.kh. nirujjhitthāti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana yattha s.kh. nirujjhittha, tassa
tattha v.kh. uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
     4. i. Yassa r.kh. nuppajjittha, tassa v.kh na nirujjhitthāti?
Natthu. Yassa vā pana v.kh. nuppajjittha,2 tassa
s.kh. na nirujjhitthāti? Natthi. Yassa vā pana s.kh. na
nirujjhittha3 tassa v.kh. nuppajjitthā?4 Natthi.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha v.kh.
na nirujjhitthāti? Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. nuppaj-
jittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. na nirujjhittha; suddhā-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. omits.
2 S. omits; inserts . . . pe . . .
3 S. omits na nirujjhittha; inserts . . . pe . . .
4 S. omits; inserts . . . pe . . .


[page 044]
44                       Khandhayamakaṃ
vāsānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca nuppajjittha, v.kh. ca na
nirujjhittha; yassa vā pana yattha v.kh. na nirujjhittha,
tassa tattha r.kh. nuppajjitthāti? Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha v.kh. na nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh.
nuppajjittha; suddhāvāsānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca na
nirujjhittha, r.kh. ca nuppajjittha. Yassa yattha v.kh.
nuppajjittha, tassa tattha s.kh. na nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā.
Yassa vā pana yattha s.kh. na nirujjhittha, tassa tattha
v.kh. nuppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
     5. i. Yassa r.kh. uppajjissati, tassa v.kh. nirujjhissatīti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana v.kh. nirujjhissati, tassa r.kh.
uppajjissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ, ye
ca arūpaṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ v.kh. niruj-
jhissati, no ca tesaṃ r.kh. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ1 v.kh. ca
nirujjhissati,2 r.kh. ca2 uppajjissati. Yassa v.kh. uppaj-
jissati, tassa s.kh. nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā
pana s.kh. nirujjhissati, tassa v.kh. uppajjissatīti? Pacchi-
mabbavikānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ s.kh. nirujjhissati, no
ca tesaṃ v.kh. uppajjissati;3 itaresaṃ4 s.kh. ca nirujjhissati,
v.kh. ca uppajjissati.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. uppajjissati, tassa tattha v.kh.
nirujjhissatīti? Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. uppaj-
jissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nirujjhissati; pañcavokā-
rānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca uppajjissati, v.kh. ca nirujjhis-
sati. Yassa vā pana yattha v.kh. nirujjhissati, tassa tattha
r.kh. uppajjissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ5 tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nirujjhissati,
no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh. uppajjissati, itaresaṃ {pañcavokā-
rānaṃ} tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca nirujjhissati, r.kh ca uppaj-
jissati. Yassa yattha v.kh uppajjissati, tassa tattha s.kh.
nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana yattha s.kh.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. inserts tesan.
2 S. omits.
3 S. substitutes nirujjhissati.
4 S. inserts tesaṃ.
5 S. arūpan.


[page 045]
                          Khandhayamakaṃ                      45
nirujjhissati, tassa tattha v.kh. uppajjissatīti? Pacchi-
mabhavikānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha s.kh. niruj-
jhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. uppajjissati, itaresaṃ
catuvokārānaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ1 tesaṃ tattha s.kh. ca
nirujjhissati, v.kh. ca uppajjissati.
     6. i. Yassa r.kh. nuppajjissati, tassa v.kh. na nirujjhis-
satīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ, ye ca arūpaṃ
uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ r.kh. nuppajjissati, no
ca tesaṇ v.kh. na nirujjhissati; parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ
r.kh. ca nuppajjissati, v.kh. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa
vā pana v.kh. na nirujjhissati, tassa r.kh. nuppajjhissatīti?
Āmantā. Yassa v.kh. nuppajjissati, tassa s.kh. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha2 v.kh. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ s.kh. na nirujjhis-
sati; parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh. ca nuppajjissati, s.kh.
ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana s.kh. na nirujjhissati,
tassa v.kh. nuppajjissatīti? Āmantā.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha v.kh.
na nirujjhissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ
uppajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. nuppajjissati,
no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. na nirujjhissati; parinibbantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca nuppajjissati, v.kh. ca na nirujjhis-
sati. Yassa vā pana yattha v.kh. na nirujjhissati, tassa
tattha r.kh. nuppajjissatīti? Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
vkh. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh. nuppaj-
jissati; parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca na niruj-
jhissati, r.kh. ca nuppajjissati. Yassa yattha v.kh. nuppaj-
jissati, tassa tattha s.kh. na nirujjhissatīti? Pacchima-
bhavikānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nuppajjissati,
no ca tesaṃ tattha s.kh. na nirujjhissati; parinibbantānaṃ
asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca nuppajjissati, s.kh.
ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha s.kh. na niruj-
jhissati, tassa tattha v.kh. nuppajjissatīti? Āmantā.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. pañcavokāraṃ.
2 S. omits.


[page 046]
46                       Khandhayamakaṃ
     7. i. Yassa r.kh. uppajjati, tassa v.kh. nirujjhitthāti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana v.kh. nirujjhittha, tassa r.kh.
uppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ arūpaṃ1 uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ v.kh. nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ r.kh. uppajjati; pañca-
vokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
v.kh. ca nirujjhittha, r.kh. ca uppajjati . . . pe . . . (yathā
Uppādavāre paccuppannenātītaṃ ribhattaṃ, tathā idha[ii,iii]
ribhajitabbaṃ).
     8. i. Yassa r.kh. uppajjati, tassa v.kh. nirujjhissatīti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana v.kh. nirujjhissati, tassa r.kh.
uppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ arūpaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ v.kh. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ r.kh. uppajjati;
pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ v.kh. ca nirujjhissati, r.kh. ca uppajjati. Yassa
v.kh. uppajjati, tassa s.kh. nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā. Yassa
vā pana s.kh. nirujjhissati, tassa v.kh. uppajjatīti?
Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
s.kh. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ v.kh. uppajjati; catu-
vokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ s.kh. ca niruj-
jhissati, v.kh. ca uppajjati.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. uppajjati, tassa tattha v.kh. niruj-
jhissatīti? Asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
*r.kh. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha*2 v.kh. nirujjhissati;
pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca uppaj-
jati, v.kh. ca nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha v.kh.
nirujjhissati, tassa tattha r.kh. uppajjatīti? Pañcavokārā
cavantānaṃ arūpaṃ3 uppajjantānaṃ4 tesaṃ tattha v.kh.
nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh. uppajjati; pañcavo-
kāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca nirujjhissati,
r.kh. ca uppajjati. Yassa yattha v.kh. uppajjati, tassa
tattha s.kh. nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana
yattha s.kh. nirujjhissati, tassa tattha v.kh. uppajjatīti?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. arūpānaṃ.
2 S. omits * to *
3 S. arūpānaṃ.
4 S. and Br. omit.


[page 047]
                          Khandhayamakaṃ                       47
Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha s.kh.
nirujjhissatī, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. uppajjati; catuvo-
kāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha s.kh. ca
nirujjhissati, v.kh. ca uppajjati.
     9. i. Yassa r.kh. nuppajjati, tassa v.kh. na nirujjhis-
satīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ arūpaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
r.kh. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ v.kh. na nirujjhissati; pari-
nibbantānaṃ tesaṃ r.kh. ca nuppajjati, *v.kh. ca na niruj-
jhissati.*1 Yassa vā pana v.kh. na nirujjhissati, tassa r.kh
nuppajjatīti? Āmantā. Yassa v.kh. nuppajjati, tassa
s.kh. na nirujjhissatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ asañña-
sattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ
s.kh. na nirujjhissati; parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh. ca
nuppajjati, s.kh. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana s.kh.
na nirujjhissati, tassa v.kh. nuppajjatīti? Āmantā.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. nuppajjati, tassa tattha v.kh. na
nirujjhissatīti? Pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ arūpaṃ2 uppaj-
jantānaṃ3 tesaṃ tattha r.kh. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
v.kh. na nirujjhissati; parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattā cavan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. nuppajjati, v.kh. ca na nirujjhis-
sati. Yassa vā pana yattha v.kh. na nirujjhissati, tassa
tattha r.kh. nuppajjatīti? Asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha v.kh. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh.
nuppajjati; parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha v.kh. ca na nirujjhissati, r.kh. ca nuppajjati. Yassa
yattha v.kh. nuppajjati, tassa tattha s.kh. na nirujjhissatīti?
Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh.
{nuppajjati}, no ca tesaṃ tattha s.kh. na nirujjhissati:
parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ4 tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca
nuppajjati, s.kh. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha
s.kh. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha v.kh. nuppajjatīti?
Āmantā.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. omits * to.
2 Br. arūpānaṃ.
3 S. and Br. omit.
4 S. omits.


[page 048]
48                         Khandhayamakaṃ
     10. i. Yassa r.kh. uppajjittha, tassa v.kh. nirujjhissatīti?
Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ1 tattha r.kh. uppajjittha, no ca
tesaṃ v.kh. nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ r.kh. ca uppajjittha, v.kh.
ca nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana v.kh. nirujjhissati, tassa
r.kh. uppajjitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa v.kh. uppajjittha,
tassa s.kh. nirujjhissatīti? Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ v.kh.
uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ s.kh. nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ2 v.kh.
ca uppajjittha, s.kh. ca nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana s.kh.
nirujjhissati, tassa v.kh. uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. uppajjittha, tassa tattha v.kh.
nirujjhissatīti? Paññavokāre parinibbantānaṃ asañña-
sattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha r.kh. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha
v.kh. nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
r.kh. ca uppajjittha, v.kh. ca nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana
yattha v.kh. nirujjhissati, tassa tattha r.kh. uppajjitthāti?
Suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh.
nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh. uppajjittha; itaresaṃ
pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca nirujjhissati, r.kh.
ca uppajjittha. Yassa yattha v.kh. uppajjittha, tassa
tattha s.kh. nirujjhissatīti? Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
v.kh. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha s.kh. nirujjhissati;
itaresaṃ catuvokārānaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh.
ca uppajjittha, s.kh. ca nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana
yattha s.kh. nirujjhissati, tassa tattha v.kh. uppajjitthāti?
Suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha s.kh. nirujjhis-
sati, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. uppajjittha: itaresaṃ catuvo-
kārānaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha s.kh. ca nirujjhissati,
v.kh. ca uppajjittha.3
     11. i. Yassa r.kh. nuppajjittha, tassa v.kh. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Natthi. Yassa vā pana v.kh. na nirujjhissati,
tassa r.kh. nuppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha. Yassa v.kh.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. omits.
2 Br. inserts tesaṃ.
3 Br. upapajjittha.


[page 049]
                               Khandhayamakaṃ                49
nuppajittha, tassa s.kh. na nirujjhissatīti? Natthi. Yassa
vā pana s.kh. na nirujjhissati, tassa v.kh. nuppajjitthāti?
Uppajjittha.
     ii. Yattha r.kh. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Yassa yattha r.kh. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha v.kh
na nirujjhissatīti? Suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha r.kh. nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. na
nirujjhissati; suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ arūpe parinib-
bantānaṃ1 tesaṃ tattha r.kh. ca nuppajjittha, v.kh. ca na
nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha v.kh. na nirujjhissati,
tassa tattha r.kh. nuppajjitthāti? Pañcavokāre parinib-
bantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. na nirujjhissati,
no ca tesaṃ tattha r.kh. nuppajjittha; suddhāvāse parinib-
bantānaṃ arūpe parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca na
nirujjhissati, r.kh. ca nuppajjittha. Yassa yattha v.kh.
nuppajjittha, tassa tattha s.kh. na nirujjhissatīti? Sud-
dhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nuppajjittha, no
ca tesaṃ tattha s.kh. na nirujjhissati; suddhāvāse parinib-
bantānaṃ2 tesaṃ tattha v.kh. ca3 nuppajjittha, s.kh. ca na
nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha s.kh. na nirujjhissati,
tassa tattha v.kh. nuppajjitthāti? Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha s.kh. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha v.kh. nuppaj-
jittha; suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha s.kh. ca na nirujjhissati, v.kh. ca nuppajjittha.
                   UPPĀDA-NIRODHA-VĀRAṂ NIṬṬHITAṂ.
                         [Pariññā-rāro. ]
     Yo rūpakkhandhaṃ parijānāti, so vedanākkhandhaṃ
parijānātīti? Āmantā. Yo vā pana vedanākkhandhaṃ
parijānāti, so rupakkhandhaṃ parijānātīti? Āmantā. Yo
rūpakkhandhaṃ na parijānāti, so vedanākkhandhaṃ na
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. omits arūpe parinibbantānaṃ.
2 S. and Br. insert asaññasattānaṃ.
3 S. omits.


[page 050]
50                       Khandhayamakaṃ
parijānātīti? Āmantā. Yo vā pana vedanākkhandhaṃ na
parijānātīti, so rūpakkhandhaṃ na parijānātīti? Āmantā.
     Yo rūpakkhandhaṃ parijānittha, so vedanākkhandhaṃ
parijānitthāti? Āmantā. Yo vā pana vedanākkhandhaṃ
parijānittha, so rūpakkhandhaṃ parijānitthāti? Āmantā.
Yo rūpakkhandhaṃ na parijānittha, so vedanākkhandhaṃ
na parijānitthāti? Āmantā. Yo vā pana vedanākkhan-
dhaṃ na parijānittha, so rūpakkhandhaṃ na parijānitthāti?
Āmantā.
     Yo rūpakkhandhaṃ parijānissati, so vedanākkhandhaṃ
parijānissatīti? Āmantā. Yo vā pana vedanākkhandhaṃ
parijānissati, so rūpakkhandhaṃ parijānissatīti? Āmantā.
Yo rūpakkhandhaṃ na parijānissati, so vedanākkhandhaṃ
na parijānissatīti? Āmantā. Yo vā pana vedanākkhandhaṃ
na parijānissati, so rūpakkhandhaṃ na parijānissatīti?
Āmantā.
     Yo rūpakkhandhaṃ parijānāti, so vedanākkhandhaṃ
parijānitthāti? No. Yo vā pana vedanākkhandhaṃ pari-
jānittha, so rūpakkhandhaṃ parijānātīti? No. Yo rūpak-
khandhaṃ na parijānāti, so vedanākkhandhaṃ na parijānit-
thāti? Arahā rūpakkhandhaṃ na parijānāti, no ca
vedanākkhandhaṃ na parijānittha; aggamaggasamaṅgiñ
ca arahantañ ca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā rūpakkhandhañ
ca na parijānanti, vedanākkhandhañ ca na parijānittha.1
Yo vā pana vedanākkhandhaṃ na parijānittha, so rūpak-
khandhaṃ na parijānātīti? Aggamaggasamaṅgī vedanāk-
khandhaṃ na parijānittha no ca rūpakkhandhaṃ na pari-
jānāti; aggamaggasamaṅgiñ ca arahantañ ca ṭhapetvā
avasesā puggalā vedanākkhandhañ ca na parijānittha,1
rūpakkhandhañ ca na parijānanti.
     Yo rūpakkhandhaṃ parijānāti, so vedanākkhandhaṃ
parijānissatīti? No. Yo vā pana vedanākkhandhaṃ pari-
jānissati, so rūpakkhandhaṃ parijānātīti? No. Yo rūpak-
khandhaṃ na parijānāti, so vedanākkhandhaṃ na parijā-
nissatīti? Ye maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti, te rūpakkhandhaṃ
na parijānanti, no ca vedanākkhandhaṃ na parijānissanti;
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Sic all versions throughout.


[page 051]
                         Khandhayamakaṃ                         51
arahā ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti, te
rūpakkhandhañ ca na parijānanti, vedanākkhandhañ ca
na parijānissanti. Yo vā pana vedanākkhandhaṃ na
parijānissati, so rūpakkhandhaṃ na parijānātīti? Ag-
gamaggasamaṅgī vedanākkhandhaṃ na parijānissati, no
ca rūpakkhandhaṃ na parijānāti; arahā ye ca puthuj-
janā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti, te1 vedanākkhandhañ ca
na parijānissanti, rūpakkhandhañ ca na parijānanti.
     Yo rūpakkhandhaṃ parijānittha, so vedanākkhandhaṃ
parijānissatīti? No. Yo vā pana vedanākkhandhaṃ
parijānissati, so rūpakkhandhaṃ parijānitthāti? No. Yo
rūpakkhandhaṃ na parijānittha, so vedanākkhandhaṃ na
parijānissatīti? Ye maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti, te rūpak-
khandhaṃ na parijānittha, no ca vedanākkhandhaṃ na
parijānissanti; aggamaggasamaṅgī ye ca puthujjanā
maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti, te rūpakkhandhañ ca na
parijānittha, vedanākkhandhañ ca na parijānissati. Yo
vā pana vedanākkhandhaṃ na parijānissati, so rūpak-
khandhaṃ na parijānitthāti? Arahā vedanākkhandhaṃ
na parijānissati, no ca rūpakkhandhaṃ na parijānittha;
aggamaggasamaṅgī ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭila-
bhissanti, te1 vedanākkhandhañ ca na parijānissanti,
rūpakkhandhañ ca na parijānittha.
                     PARIÑÑĀVĀRAṂ NIṬṬHITAṂ.
                  KHANDHAYAMAKAṂ NIṬṬHITAṂ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. omits


[page 052]
                                  52
                                III.1
                           [ĀYATANAYAMAKAṂ.
                               Uddesarāro. ]
     Dvādasāyatanāni: (1) cakkhāyatanaṃ, (2) sotāyatanaṃ,
(3) ghānāyatanaṃ. (4) jivhāyatanaṃ, (5) kāyāyatanaṃ, (6) rū-
pāyatanaṃ. (7) saddāyatanaṃ, (8) gandhāyatanaṃ, (9) rasā-
yatanaṃ. (10) phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, (11) manāyatanaṃ, (12)
dhammāyatanaṃ.
     Cakkhu cakkhāyatanaṃ, cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhu; sotaṃ
sotāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ sotaṃ; ghānaṃ . . . (continue as
for cakkhu) . . . dhammo dhammāyatanaṃ, dhammā-
yatanaṃ dhammo.
     Na cakkhu na cakkhāyatanaṃ, na cakkhāyatanaṃ na
cakkhu . . . (repeat for each āyatana in negative form).
Cakkhu2 cakkhāy., āyatanā sotāy.; cakkhu cakkhāy.,
āyatanā ghānāy.: . . . pe . . . āyatanā dhammāy. Sotaṃ
sotāy., āyatanā cakkhāy.: sotaṃ sotāy., āyatanā ghānāy.,
. . . pe . . . āyatanā dhammāy. . . . pe . . . dhammo
dhammāy., āyatanā cakkhāy.; dhammo dhammāy.,
āyatanā sotāy.: . . . pe . . . āyatanā manāy. (cakkaṃ
bandhitabbaṃ).
     Na cakkhu na cakkhāy., nāyatanā na sotāy.; na cakkhu
na cakkhāy., nāyatanā na ghānāy.; . . . pe . . . na dhammo
na dhammāy., nāyatanā na sotāy.; . . . pe . . . nāyatanā
na manāy. (cakkay bandhitabbaṃ).
     Cakkhu āyatanaṃ, āyatanā cakkhu; sotaṃ āyatanaṃ,
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. inserts Nibbānapaccayo hotu. Sabbattha siddhim atthu.
2 K. cakkhuṃ throughout. For -āy. read -āyatanaṃ throughout.


[page 053]
                              Āyatanayamakaṃ                  53
āyatanā sotaṃ; ghānaṃ āyatanaṃ, āyatanā ghānaṃ . . .
pe . . . dhammo āyatanaṃ, āyatanā dhammo.
     Na cakkhu nāyatanaṃ, nāyatanā na cakkhu; na sotaṇ
nāyatanaṃ, nāyatanā na sotaṃ; na ghānaṃ . . . pe . . . na
phoṭṭhabbo;1 na mano nāyatanaṃ nāyatanā na mano; na
dhammo nāyatanaṃ, nāyatanā na dhammo.
     Cakkhu āyatanaṃ, āyatanā sotaṃ; . . . pe . . .2cakkhu
āyatanaṃ, āyatanā dhammo. Sotaṃ āyatanaṃ, āyatanā
cakkhuṃ; . . . pe . . . sotaṃ āyatanaṃ, āyatanā dhammo.
Ghānaṃ āyatanaṃ, . . . pe . . .3 Dhammo āyatanaṃ, āyatanā
cakkhu; dhammo āyatanaṃ, āyatanā sotaṃ; . . . pe . . .
āyatanā mamo (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ).
     Na cakkhu nāyatanaṃ, nāyatanā na sotaṃ; . . . pe . . .
na cakkhu nāyatanaṃ, nāyatanā na dhammo. Na sotaṃ
nāyatanaṃ, nāyatanā na cakkhu; . . . pe . . . na sotaṃ
nāyatanaṃ, nāyatanā na dhammo. Na ghānaṃ nāya-
tanaṃ, . . . pe . . . na dhammo nāyatanaṃ, nāyatanā na
cakkhu; na dhammo nāyatanaṃ, nāyatanā na sotaṃ
. . . . pe . . . na dhammo nāyatanaṃ, nāyatanā na mano*4
(cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ).
                       UDDESAVĀRO.5
                      [Paṇṇattivāro. ]
     Cakkhu cakkhāyatanan ti? Dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu
cakkhu, na cakkhāy.; cakkhāy. cakkhu ceva cakkhāy.
ca. Cakkhāy. cakkhūti? Āmantā. Sotaṃ sotāy. ti?
Dibbasotaṃ taṇhāsotaṃ sotaṃ, na sotāy.; sotāy. sotañ
ceva sotāy. ca. Sotāy. sotan ti? Āmantā. Ghānaṃ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 In Dhs. phoṭṭhabbaṃ, in Vibh. phoṭṭhabbā.
2 S. inserts cakkhuṃ āyatanaṃ āyatanā rūpaṃ . . . pe . . .
3 Br. inserts āyatanā cakkhu . . . pe . . . āyatanā dhammo.
4 S. omits * to *. Br. omits na dhammo nāyatanaṃ only.
5 K. and S. omit.

ghānāy. ti? Āmantā. Ghānāy. ghānan ti? Āmantā.
Jivhā jivhāy. ti? Āmantā. Jivhāy. jivhā ti? Āmantā.
Kāyo kāyāy. ti? Kāyāy. ṭhapetvā avaseso kāyo kāyo,1 na
kāyāy.; kāyāy. kayo ceva kāyāyatañ ca. Kāyāy. kāyo ti?
Āmantā. Rūpaṃ rūpāyatanan ti? . . . (as for kāyāya-
tanaṃ). Saddo saddāy. ti? Āmantā. Saddāy. saddo ti?
Āmantā. Gandho gandhāy. ti? Sīlagandho samādhi-
gandho paññāgandho gandho, na gandhāy.; gandhāy. gandho
ceva gandhāy. ca. Grandhāy, gandho ti? Āmantā. Raso
rasāyatanan ti? Attharaso dhammaraso vimuttiraso raso,
na rasāyatanaṃ; rasāy. raso ceva rasāy. ca. Rasāy.
raso ti? Āmantā. Phoṭṭhabbo phoṭṭhabbāyatanan ti?

manāyatanan ti? Āmantā. Manāy. mano ti? Āmantā.

avaseso dhammo dhammo, na dhammāy.; dhammāy.
dhammo ceva dhammāy. ca. Dhammāy. dhammo ti?

na cakkhuti? Dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu2 na cakkhāy.,
cakkhu; cakkhuñ ca cakkhāy. ca ṭhapetvā avasesā3 na
ceva cakkhu na ca cakkhāy. Na sotaṃ na sotāy. ti?

na sotāy., sotaṃ; sotañ ca sotāy. ca ṭhapetvā avasesā8
na ceva sotaṃ na ca sotāy. Na ghānaṃ na ghānāy. ti?

na kāyo ti? Kāyāy. ṭhapetvā avaseso kāyo5 na kāyāy.,

rūpāy. . . . (as for kāyāyatanaṃ). Na saddo na saddāy.

     avaseso dhammo dhammo na dhammāyatanaṃ; dhammāyatanaṃ
     dhammo ceva dhammāyatanañ ca. Āyatanā sotāyatanaṃ, āyatanā

na manāy. (ekekapadamūlakaṃ1 cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ
asammohantena).2
     Na cakkhu na cakkhāy. ti? Āmantā. Nāyatanā na
sotāy. ti? Āmantā* . . . pe . . . nāyatanā na dhammāy.

na dhammo na dhammāy. ti? Āmantā. Nāyatanā na

manāy. ti? Āmantā (cakkaṃ bandhantena sabbattha
āmantāti kātabbaṃ).
     Cakkhu āyatanan ti? Āmantā. Āyatanā cakkhāy.
ti?4 Cakkhāy. āyatanañ ceva cakkhāy. ca, avasesā āyatanā5

ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva cakkhu na ca āyatanā. Nāya-
tanā na cakkhāy. ti? Āmantā. Na sotaṃ nāyatanan ti?

58                            Āyatanayamakaṃ
ti? Āmantā. . . . pe . . . nāyatanā na dhammāy. ti?

nāyatanā na manāy. ti? Āmantā (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ).
                      PAṆṆATTIVĀRAN NIṬṬHITAN.
                           [{Uppādavāro}. ]
                              (1-2.)3
     1. i. Yassa cakkhāyatanaṃ uppajjati, tassa sotāyatanaṃ
uppajjatīti? Sacakkhukānaṃ asotakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ cakkhāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ sotāy. uppajjati;
sacakkhukānaṃ sasotakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy.
ca uppajjati, sotāy. ca uppajjati. Yassa vā pana sotāy.
uppajjati, tassa cakkhāy. uppajjatīti? Sasotakānaṃ acak-
khukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ sotāy. uppajjati, no ca
tesaṃ cakkhāy. uppajjati; sasotakānaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ sotāy. ca uppajjati, cakkhāy. ca
uppajjati.
                                (1-3.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. uppajjati, tassa ghānāy. uppajjatīti?
Sacakkhukānaṃ aghānakānaṃ . . . (continue as for sotāy.)
. . . cakkhāy. ca uppajjati.
                                (1-6.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. uppajjati, tassa rūpāy. uppajjatīti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana rūpāy. uppajjati, tassa cakkhāy.
uppajjatīti? Sarūpakānaṃ4 acakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ rūpāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāy. uppajjati;
sacakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpāy. ca uppajjati,
cakkhāy. ca uppajjati.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. omits.
2 Br. inserts na dhammo nāyatananti? Āmantā. Nāyatanā
     na sotāyatanan ti? Āmantā.
3 The figures heading each paragraph denote the pair of āyatanas
     related, according to the numerical order given on p.52.
4 S. arūpa- throughout.


[page 059]
                          Āyatanayamakaṃ               59
                                (1-11.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. uppajjati, tassa manāy. uppajjatīti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana manāy. uppajjati, tassa cakkhāy.
uppajjatīti? Sacittakānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ manāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāy. uppajjati;
sacakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ manāy. ca uppajjati,
cakkhāy. ca uppajjati.
                                (1-12.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. uppajjati, tassa dhammāy. uppajjatīti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana dhammāy. uppajjati, tassa cak-
khāy. uppajjatīti? Acakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
dhammāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāy. uppajjati;
sacakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāy. ca uppaj-
jati, cakkhāy. ca uppajjati.
                                (3-6.)
     Yassa ghānāy. uppajjati, tassa rūpāy. uppajjatīti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana rūpāy. uppajjati, tassa ghānāy.
uppajjatīti? Sarūpakānaṃ aghānakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ rūpāy. uppajjati no ca tesaṃ ghānāy. uppajjati;
saghānakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpāy. ca uppajjati,
ghānāy. ca uppajjati.
                             (3-11.)
     Yassa ghānāy. uppajjati, tassa manāy. uppajjatīti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana manāy. uppajjati, tassa
ghānāy. uppajjatīti? Sacittakānaṃ1 aghānakānaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesaṃ manāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ ghānāy.
uppajjati; saghānakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ manāy. ca
uppajjati, ghānāy. ca uppajjati.
                                (3-12.)
     Yassa ghānāy. uppajjati, tassa dhammāy. uppajjatīti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana dhammāy. uppajjati, tassa
ghānāy. uppajjatīti? Aghānakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
dhammāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ ghānāy. uppajjati;
saghānakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāy. ca uppajjati,
ghānāy. ca uppajjati.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. substitutes rūpakānaṃ.


[page 060]
60                       Āyatanayamakaṃ
                                (6-11.)
     Yassa rūpāy. uppajjati, tassa manāy. uppajjatīti?
Acittakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpāy. uppajjati, no ca
tesaṃ manāy. uppajjati; sarūpakānaṃ sacittakānaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpāy. ca uppajjati, manāy. ca uppajjati.
Yassa vā pana manāy. uppajjati, tassa rūpāy. uppajjatīti?
Arūpakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ manāy. uppajjati, no ca
tesaṃ rūpāy. uppajjati; sarūpakānaṃ sacittakānaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesaṃ manāy. ca uppajjati, rūpāy. ca uppajjati.
                                (6-12.)
     Yassa rūpāy. uppajjati, tassa dhammāy. uppajjatīti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana dhammāy. uppajjati, tassa rūpāy.
uppajjatīti? Arūpakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāy.
uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ rūpāy. uppajjati; sarūpakānaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāy. ca uppajjati, rūpāy. ca
uppajjati.
                                (11-12.)
     Yassa manāy. uppajjati, tassa dhammāy. uppajjatīti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana dhammāy. uppajjati, tassa
manāy. uppajjatīti? Acittakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
dhammāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ manāy. uppajjati, sacitta-
kānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāy. ca uppajjati, manāy.
ca uppajjati.
                                (1-2.)
     ii. Yattha cakkhāy. uppajjati, tattha sotāy. uppajjatīti?
{Āmantā}. Yattha vā pana sotāy. uppajjati, tattha cakkhāy.
uppajjatīti? Āmantā.
                                (1-3.)
     Yattha cakkhāy. uppajjati, tattha ghānāy. uppajjatīti?
Rūpāvacare tattha cakkhāy. uppajjati, no ca tattha ghānāy.
uppajjati; kāmāvacare tattha cakkhāy. ca uppajjati, ghānāy.
ca uppajjati. Yattha vā pana ghānāy. uppajjati, tattha
cakkhāy. uppajjatīti? Āmantā.
                                (1-6.)
     Yattha cakkhāy. uppajjati, tattha rūpāy. uppajjatīti?
Āmantā. Yattha vā pana rūpāy. uppajjati, tattha cakkhāy.
uppajjatīti? Asaññasatte tattha rūpāy. uppajjati, no ca
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 061]
                             Āyatanayamakaṃ                  61
tattha cakkhāy. uppajjati; pañcavokāre tattha rūpāy. ca
uppajjati, cakkhāy. ca uppajjati.
                                   (1-11.)
     Yattha cakkhāy. uppajjati, tattha manāy. uppajjatīti?
Āmantā. Yattha vā pana manāy. uppajjati, tattha cakkhāy.
uppajjatīti? Arūpe tattha manāy. uppajjati, no ca tattha
cakkhāy. uppajjati; pañcavokāre tattha manāy. ca1 uppaj-
jati, cakkhāy. ca uppajjati.
                                   (1-12.)
     Yattha cakkhāy. uppajjati, tattha dhammāy. uppajjatīti?
Āmantā. Yattha vā pana dhammāy. uppajjati, tattha
cakkhāy. uppajjatīti? Asaññasatte arūpe tattha dham-
māy. uppajjati, no ca tattha cakkhāy. uppajjati; pañca-
vokāre tattha dhammāy. ca uppajjati, cakkhāy. ca up-
pajjati.
                                (3-6.)
     Yattha ghānāy. uppajjati, tattha rūpāy. uppajjatīti?
{Āmantā}. Yattha vā pana rūpāy. uppajjati, tattha ghānāy.
uppajjatīti? Rūpāvacare tattha rūpāy. uppajjati, no ca
tattha ghānāy. uppajjati; kāmāvacare tattha rūpāy. ca
uppajjati, ghānāy. ca uppajjati. (Yattha ghānāy. up-
pajjati, tattha manāy. ca dhammāy. ca ekasadisaṃ, nānaṃ
natthi, uparivāre saṅkhepo2 hotīti jānitabbaṃ.)
                                (3-12.)
     Yattha ghānāy. uppajjati; tattha dhammāy. uppajjatīti?
Āmantā. Yattha vā pana dhammāy. uppajjati, tattha
ghānāy. uppajjatīti? Rūpāvacare arūpāvacare tattha
dhammāy. uppajjati, no ca tattha ghānāyatanaṃ uppajjati;
kāmāvacare tattha dhammāy. ca uppajjati, ghānāy. ca
uppajjati.
                                (6-11.)
     Yattha rūpāy. uppajjati, tattha manāy. uppajjatīti?
Asaññasatte tattha rūpāy. uppajjati, no ca tattha manāy.
uppajjati; pañcavokāre tattha rūpāy. ca uppajjati, manāy.
ca uppajjati. Yattha vā pana manāy. uppajjati, tattha
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. dhammā-.
2 Br. sankhepaṃ.


[page 062]
62                            Āyatanayamakaṃ
rūpāy. uppajjatīti? Arūpe tattha manāy. uppajjati, no ca
tattha rūpāy. uppajjati; pañcavokāre tattha manāy. ca
uppajjati, rūpāy. ca uppajjati.
                                 (6-12.)
     Yattha rūpāy. uppajjati, tattha dhammāy. uppajjatīti?
Āmantā. Yattha vā pana dhammāy. uppajjati, tattha
rūpāy. uppajjatīti? Arūpe tattha dhammāy. uppajjati, no
ca tattha rūpāy. uppajjati; pañcavokāre asaññasatte tattha
dhammāy. ca uppajjati, rūpāy. ca uppajjati.
                                 (11-12.)
     Yattha manāy. uppajjati, tattha dhammāy. uppajjatīti?
Āmantā. Yattha vā pana dhammāy. uppajjati, tattha
manāy. uppajjatīti? Asaññasatte tattha dhammāy. uppaj-
jati, no ca tattha manāy. uppajjati; catuvokāre pañcavo-
kāre tattha dhammāy. ca uppajjati, manāy. ca uppajjati.
                                 (1-2.)
     iii. Yassa yattha cakkhāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha sotāy.
uppajjatīti? Sacakkhukānaṃ asotakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha sotāy.
uppajjati; sacakkhukānaṃ sasotakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. ca uppajjati, sotāy. ca uppajjati.
Yassa vā pana yattha sotāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha cak-
khāy. uppajjatīti? Sasotakānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha sotāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. uppajjati; sasotakānaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha sotāy. ca uppajjati, cakkhāy. ca
uppajjati. (Saṅkhittaṃ1 yass' ekasadisaṃ.)
                                (11-12.)
     Yassa yattha manāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha dhammāy.
uppajjatīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy.
uppajjati, tassa tattha manāy. uppajjatīti? Acittakānaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. uppajjati, no ca
tesaṃ tattha manāy. uppajjati; sacittakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. ca uppajjati, manāy. ca uppajjati.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. yassakaṃ pi sadisaṃ.


[page 063]
                               Āyatanayamakaṃ               63
                                   (1-2.)
     2. i. Yassa cakkhāy. nuppajjati, tassa sotāy. nuppajja-
tīti? Acakkhukānaṃ sasotakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
cakkhāy. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ sotāy. nuppajjati; sabbe-
saṃ cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ asotakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ cakkhāy. ca nuppajjati, sotāy. ca nuppajjati. Yassa
vā pana sotāy. nuppajjati, tassa cakkhāy. nuppajjatīti?
Asotakānaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ sotāy.
nuppajjati. no ca tesaṃ cakkhāy. nuppajjati; sabbesaṃ
cavantānaṃ asotakānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
sotāy. {ca} nuppajjati, cakkhāy. ca nuppajjati.
                                (1-3.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. nuppajjati, tassa ghānāy. nuppajjatīti?
. . . pe . . . (continue as in 1-2).
                                (1-6.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. nuppajjati, tassa rūpāy. nuppajjatīti?
. . . (continue as in 1-2). Yassa vā pana rūpāy. nup-
pajjati, tassa cakkhāy. nuppajjatīti? Āmantā.
                                (11-12.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. nuppajjati, tassa manāy. nuppajjatīti?
Acakkhukānaṃ sacittakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy.
nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ manāy. nuppajjati; sabbesaṃ
cavantānaṃ acittakānaṃ uppajjantānan tesaṃ cakkhāy. ca
nuppajjati, manāy. ca nuppajjati. Yassa vā pana manāy.
nuppajjati, tassa cakkhāy. nuppajjatīti? Āmantā.
                                (1-12.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. nuppajjati, tassa dhammāy. nuppaj-
jatīti? Acakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ, tesaṃ cakkhāy. nup-
pajjati, no ca tesaṃ dhammāy. nuppajjati, sabbesaṃ ca-
vantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. ca nuppajjati, dhammāy. ca
nuppajjati. Yassa vā pana dhammāy. nuppajjati tassa
cakkhāy. nuppajjatīti? Āmantā.
                                (3-6.)
     Yassa ghānāy. nuppajjati, tassa rūpāy. nuppajjatīti?
Aghānakānaṃ sarūpakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ ghānāy.

nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ rūpāy. nuppajjati; sabbesaṃ ca-
vantānaṃ arūpakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ ghānāy. ca
nuppajjati, rūpāy. ca nuppajjati. Yassa vā pana rūpāy.
nuppajjati, tassa ghānāy. nuppajjatīti? Āmantā.
                                (3-11.)

ca tesaṃ dhammāy. nuppajjati; sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ

                                (11-12.)

                                (1-2.)
     ii. Yattha cakkhāy. nuppajjati, tattha sotāy. nuppajjatīti?

nuppajjatīti? Āmantā.
                                (1-3.)
     Yattha cakkhāy. nuppajjati, tattha ghānāy. nuppajjatīti?
Āmantā. Yattha vā pana ghānāy. nuppajjati, tattha
cakkhāy. nuppajjatīti? Rūpāvacare tattha ghānāy. nup-
pajjati, no ca tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjati, asaññasatte
arūpe tattha ghānāy. ca nuppajjati, cakkhāy. ca nup-
pajjati.
                                (1-6.)
     Yattha cakkhāy. nuppajjati, tattha rūpāy. nuppajjatīti?
Asaññasatte tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjati, no ca tattha
rūpāy. nuppajjati; arūpe tattha cakkhāy. ca nuppajjati,
rūpāy. ca nuppajjati. Yattha vā pana rūpāy. nuppajjati,
tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjatīti? Āmantā.
                                (1-11.)

manāy. ca nuppajjati. Yattha vā pana manāy. nuppajjati,
tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjatīti? Āmantā.
                                (1-12.)

tīti? Uppajjati. Yattha vā pana dhammāy. nuppajjati,
tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjatīti? Natthi.

                                (3-6.)

nuppajjati; arūpe tattha ghānāy. ca nuppajjati, rūpāy. ca

ca nuppajjati, manāy. ca nuppajjati. Yattha vā pana
manāy. nuppajjati, tattha1 ghānāy. nuppajjatīti? Āmantā.

                                (1-3.)
     iii. Yassa yattha cakkhāy. uppajjittha, tassa tattha sotāy.
uppajjitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana yattha sotāy.
uppajjittha, tassa tattha cakkhāy. uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
                                (1-3.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. uppajjittha, tassa tattha ghānāy.

pajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. uppajjittha; kāmā-
{vacarānaṃ} tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. ca uppajjittha, ghānāy. ca1
uppajjittha.1 Yassa vā pana yattha ghānāy. uppajjittha,
tassa tattha cakkhāy. uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
                                (1-6.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. uppajjittha, tassa tattha rūpāy.

uppajjittha, tassa tattha cakkhāy. uppajjitthāti? Asañña-
sattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. uppajjittha; pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpay.
ca uppajjittha, cakkhāy. ca uppajjittha.
                                (1-11.)

manāy. uppajjitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana yattha
manāy. uppajjittha, tassa tattha cakkhāy. uppajjitthāti?
Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ
tattha cakkhāy. uppajjittha; pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
manāy. ca {uppajjittha}, cakkhāy. ca uppajjittha.
                                (1-12.)

jittha; no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. uppajjittha; pañcavo-
kārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. ca uppajjittha cakkhāy.
ca uppajjittha.

[page 069]
                            Āyatanayamakaṃ            69
                                (3-6.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. uppajjittha, tassa tattha rūpāy.
uppajjitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana yattha rūpāy.
uppajjittha, tassa tattha ghānāy. uppajjitthāti? Rūpāva-
carānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha
ghānāy. uppajjittha; kāmāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy.
ca uppajjittha, ghānāy. ca uppajjittha.
                                (3-11.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. uppajjittha, tassa tattha manāy.
uppajjitthāti? {Āmantā}. Yassa vā pana yattha manāy.
uppajjittha, tassa tattha ghānāy. uppajjitthāti? Rūpā-
vacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. uppaj-
jittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanaṃ uppajjittha;
kāmāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. ca uppajjittha, ghānāy.
ca uppajjittha.1
                                (6-11.)
     Yassa yattha rūpāy. uppajjittha, tassa tattha manāy.
uppajjitthāti? Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. uppaj-
jittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāy. uppajjittha; pañcavo-
kārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. ca uppajjittha, manāy. ca
uppajjittha. Yassa vā pana yattha manāy. uppajjittha, tassa
tattha rūpāyatanaṃ uppajjitthāti? Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
manāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. uppajjittha;
pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. ca uppajjittha, rūpāy.
ca uppajjittha.
                                (6-12.)
     Yassa yattha rūpāy. uppajjittha, tassa tattha dhammāy.
uppajjitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. inserts Yassa yattha ghānāyatanaṃ uppajjittha, tassa
     tattha dhammāyatanaṃ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa vā
     pana yattha dhammāyatanaṃ uppajjittha, tassa tattha
     ghānāyatanaṃ uppajjitthāti? Rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ
     tesaṃ tattha dhammāyatanaṃ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha
     ghānāyatanaṃ uppajjittha, kāmāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
     dhammāyatanañ ca uppajjittha, ghānāyatanañ ca uppajjittha.


[page 070]
70                            Āyatanayamakaṃ
uppajjittha, tassa tattha rūpāy. uppajjitthāti? Arūpānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha
rūpāy. uppajjittha; pañcavokārānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha dhammāy. ca uppajjittha, rūpay. ca uppajjittha.
                                (11-12.)
     Yassa yattha manāy. uppajjittha, tassa tattha dhammāy.
uppajjitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy.
uppajjittha, tassa tattha manāy. uppajjitthāti? Asañña-
sattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ
tattha manāy. uppajjittha; catuvokārānaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. ca uppajjittha, manāy. ca
uppajjittha.
                                (1-2, etc.)
     4. i. Yassa cakkhāy. nuppajjittha, tassa sotāy. nuppaj-
jitthāti? Natthi. Yassa vā pana sotāy. nuppajjittha,
tassa cakkhāy. nuppajjitthāti? Natthi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
                                (11-12.)
     Yassa manāy. nuppajjittha, tassa dhammāy. nuppajjit-
thāti? Natthi. Yassa vā pana dhammāy. nuppajjittha,
tassa manāy. nuppajjitthāti? Natthi . . . pe . . .1
                                (1-2.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. {nuppajjittha}, tassa tattha
sotāy. nuppajjitthāti? Āmanta. Yassa vā pana yattha
sotāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjitthāti?
Āmantā.
                                (1-3.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha ghānāy.
nuppajjitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana yattha ghānāy.
nuppajjittha, tassa tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjitthāti? Rūpā-
vacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ
tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjittha, suddhāvāsānaṃ asaññasat-
tānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesan tattha ghānāy. ca nuppajjittha,
cakkhāy. nuppajjittha.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. omits.


[page 071]
                          Āyatanayamakaṃ                      71
                                (1-6.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha rūpāy.
nuppajjitthāti? Asaññasattānaṃ tesan tattha cakkhāy.
nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpay. nuppajjittha;
suddhāvāsānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. ca nuppaj-
jittha, rūpāy. ca nuppajjittha. Yassa vā pana yattha
rūpāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjitthāti?
Āmantā.
                                (1-11.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha manāy.
nuppajjitthāti? Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. nuppaj-
jittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāy. nuppajjittha; suddhāvā-
sānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. ca nuppaj-
jittha, manāy. ca nuppajjittha. Yassa vā pana yattha
manāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjitthāti?
Āmantā.
                                (1-12.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha
dhammāy. nuppajjitthāti? Asaññasattānaṃ arūpānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha
dhammāy. nuppajjittha; suddhāvāsānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. ca nuppajjittha, dhammāy. ca nuppajjittha.
Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha
cakkhāy. nuppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
                                (3-6.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha rūpāy.
nuppajjitthāti? Rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānay. nup-
pajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. nuppajjittha; sud-
dhāvāsānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. ca nuppajjittha,
rūpāy. ca nuppajjittha. Yassa vā pana yattha {rūpāy}.
nuppajjittha, tassa tattha ghānāy. nuppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
                                (3-11.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha manāy.
nuppajjitthāti? Rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
ghānāy. nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāy. nuppaj-
jittha; suddhāvāsānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
ghānāy. ca nuppajjittha, manāy. ca nuppajjittha. Yassa
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 072]
72                       Āyatanayamakaṃ
vā pana yattha manāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha ghānāy.
nuppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
                             (3-12.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha dham-
may. nuppajjitthāti? Rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. nuppajjittha, no ca tesan tattha
dhammāy. nuppajjittha; suddhāvāsānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
ghānāy. ca nuppajjittha, dhammāy. ca nuppajjittha. Yassa
vā pana yattha dhammāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha
ghānāy. nuppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
                            (6-11.)

nuppajjitthāti? Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. nuppaj-
jittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāy. nuppajjittha; sud-
dhāvāsānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. ca nuppajjittha, manāy.
ca nuppajjittha; yassa vā pana yattha manāy. nuppaj-
jittha, tassa tattha rūpāy. nuppajjitthāti? Asaññasattānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha manāy. nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha
rūpāy. nuppajjittha; suddhāvāsānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy.
ca nuppajjittha, rūpāy. ca nuppajjittha.
                           (6-12.)

jittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. nuppajjittha, sud-
dhāvāsānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. ca nuppajjittha, dhammāy.
ca nuppajjittha. Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy. nuppaj-
jittha, tassa tattha rūpāy. nuppajjitthāti? Āmantā.

nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. nuppajjittha;
suddhāvāsānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. ca nuppajjittha,
dhammāy. ca nuppajjittha. Yassa vā pana yattha dham-
māy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha manāy. nuppajjitthāti?
Āmantā.

[page 073]
                               Āyatanayamakaṃ              73
                                (1-2.)
     5. i. Yassa cakkhāy. uppajjissati, tassa sotāy. uppajjis-
satīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana sotāy. uppajjissati, tassa
cakkhāy. uppajjissatīti? Āmantā.
                                (1-3.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. uppajjissati, tassa ghānāy. uppajjis-
satīti? Ye rūpāvacaraṃ uppajjitvā1 parinibbāyissanti,
tesaṃ cakkhāy. uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ ghānāy. uppajjis-
sati; itaresaṃ cakkhāy. ca uppajjissati, ghānāy. ca uppajjis-
sati. Yassa vā pana ghānāy. uppajjissati, tassa cakkhāy.
uppajjissatīti? Āmantā.
                                (1-6.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. uppajjissati, tassa {rūpāy}. uppajjissatīti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana rūpāy. uppajjissati, tassa cakkhāy.
uppajjissatīti? Āmantā.
                                (1-11.)
     (Yassa cakkhāy. uppajjissati, tassa manāy. ca dhammāy.
ca sadisaṃ. Ime dve sadisā yera honti.)
                                (1-12.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. uppajjissati, tassa dhammāy. uppajjis-
satīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana dhammāy. uppajjissati,
tassa cakkhāy. uppajjissatīti? Ye arūpaṃ uppajjitvā
parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ dhammāy. uppajjissati, no ca
tesaṃ cakkhāy. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ2 dhammāy. ca uppaj-
jissati, cakkhāy. ca uppajjissati.
                                (3-6.)
     Yassa ghānāy. uppajjissati, tassa rūpāy. uppajjissatīti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana rūpāy. uppajjissati, tassa ghānāy.
uppajjissatīti? Ye rūpāvacaraṃ uppajjitvā parinibbā-
yissanti, tesaṃ rūpāy. uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ ghānāy.

1 Br. upapajjitvā throughout.
2 Br. inserts tesaṃ.

                               (1-3.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. nuppajjissati, tassa ghānāy. nuppajjis-
satīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana ghānāy. nuppajjissati,
tasso cakkhāy. nuppajjissatīti? Ye rūpāvacaraṃ uppajjitvā

paṃ1 uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ ghānāy. nuppaj-
jissati, cakkhāy. ca nuppajjissati.

khāy. ca nuppajjissati, dhammāy. ca nuppajjissati. Yassa
vā pana dhammāy. nuppajjissati, tassa cakkhāy. nuppaj-
jissatīti? Āmanta.

satīti? Ye rūpāvacaraṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ

pajjissati. Yassa vā pana rūpāy. nuppajjissati, tassa

dhammāy. nuppajjissatīti? Ye rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ

78                       Āyatanayamakaṃ
uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ ghānāy. nuppajjissati,
no ca tesaṃ dhammāy. nuppajjissati; pacchimabhavi-
kānaṃ tesaṃ ghānāy. ca nuppajjissati, dhammāy. ca

tassa ghānāy. nuppajjissatīti? Āmantā.
                                (6-11.)

nibbāyissanti, tesaṃ rūpāy. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ
dhammāy. nuppajjissati; pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ rūpāy.
ca nuppajjissati, dhammāy. ca nuppajjissati. Yassa vā
pana dhammāy. nuppajjissati, tassa rūpāy. nuppajjissatīti?

     Yassa manāy. nuppajjissati, tassa dhammāy. {nuppajjis-
satīti}? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana dhammāy. nuppajjissati,
tassa manāy. nuppajjissatīti? Āmantā . . . pe . . .
                                (1-2.)
     iii. Yassa yattha cakkhāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha
sotāy. nuppajjissati? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana yattha
sotāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjissatīti?
Āmantā.
                                (1-3.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha
ghānāy. nuppajjissatīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana yattha
ghānāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha cakkhāy. nuppaj-
jissatīti? Rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. nuppaj-
jissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjissati; pañca-
vokāre pacchimabhavikānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ arūpānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. ca nuppajjissati, cakkhāy. nuppaj-
jissati.
                                (1-6.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha rūpāy.
nuppajjissatīti? Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy.
nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ rūpāy. nuppajjissati; pañca-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 079]
                          Āyatanayamakaṃ               79
vokāre pacchimabhavikānaṃ1 arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. ca nuppajjissati, rūpāy. ca nuppajjissati. Yassa
vā pana yattha rūpāy. nuppajjissati, tassa {tattha} cakkhāy.
nuppajjissatīti? Āmantā.
                                (1-11.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha manāy.
nuppajjissatīti? Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhā. nuppaj-
jissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāy. nuppajjissati; pacchima-
bhavikānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. ca
nuppajjissati, manāy. ca nuppajjissati. Yassa vā pana
yattha manāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha cakkhāy. nuppaj-
jissatīti? Āmantā.
                                (1-12.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha
dhammāy. nuppajjissatīti? Asaññasattānaṃ arūpānaṃ
tesan tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
dhammāy. nuppajjissati; pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha cakkhāy. ca nuppajjissati, dhammāy. ca nuppaj-
jissati. Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy. nuppajjissati,
tassa tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjissatīti? Āmantā.
                                (3-6.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha rūpāy.
nuppajjissatīti? Rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy.
nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. nuppajjissati;
pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
ghānāy. ca nuppajjissati, rūpāy. ca nuppajjissati. Yassa
vā pana yattha rūpāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha ghānāy.
nuppajjissatīti? Āmantā.
                                (3-11.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha manāy.
nuppajjissatīti? Rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha ghānāy. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāy.
nuppajjissati; pacchimabhavikānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. inserts asaññasattānaṃ.


[page 080]
80                       Āyatanayamakaṃ
tattha ghānāy. ca nuppajjissati, manāy. ca nuppajjissati.
Yassa vā pana yattha manāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha
ghānāy. nuppajjissatīti? Āmantā.
                                (3-12.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati, tassa tattha
dhammāy. nuppajjissatīti? Rūpāvacarānaṃ . . . (as in
3-11) nuppajjissati; pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
ghānāy. ca nuppajjissati, dhammāy. ca nuppajjissati.
Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy. . . . nuppajjissatīti?
Āmantā.
                                (6-11.)
     Yassa yattha rūpāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha manāy.
nuppajjissatīti? Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. nuppaj-
jissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāy. nuppajjissati; pacchima-
bhavikānaṃ {tesaṃ} tattha rūpāy. ca nuppajjissati, manāy.
ca nuppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yattha manāy. nuppaj-
jissati, tassa tattha rūpāy. nuppajjissatīti? Asaññasat-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
rūpāy. nuppajjissati; pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
manāy. ca nuppajjissati, rūpāy. ca nuppajjissati.
                                (6-12.)
     Yassa yattha rūpāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha dhammāy.
nuppajjissatīti? Arūpānaṃ . . . (as in 6-11). Yassa
vā pana yattha . . . rūpāy. nuppajjissatīti? Āmantā.
                                (11-12.)
     Yassa yattha manāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha dham-
māy. nuppajjissatīti? Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy.
nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. nuppajjissati;
pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. ca nuppajjissati,
dhammāy. ca nuppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yattha
dhammāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha manāy. nuppajjissa-
tīti? Āmantā.
                                (1-2.)
     7. i. Yassa cakkhāy. uppajjati, tassa sotāy. uppajjitthāti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana sotāy. uppajjittha, tassa cakkhāy.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 081]
                            Āyatanayamakaṃ                     81
uppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ, tesaṃ sotāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāy.
uppajjati; sacakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ sotāy. ca
uppajjittha, cakkhāy. ca uppajjati.
                              (1-3, etc.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. uppajjati, tassa ghānāy. . . . pe . . .
rūpāy. manāy. dhammāy. uppajjitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa
vā pana dhammāy. . . . (continue as for sotāyatanaṃ) . . .
cakkhāy. ca uppajjati.
                                (3-6, etc.)
     Yassa ghānāy. uppajjati, tassa rūpāy. . . . pe . . .
manāy. dhammāy. uppajjitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa vā
pana dhammāy. uppajjittha, tassa ghānāy. uppajjatīti?
Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ aghānakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
dhammāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ ghānāy. uppajjati;
saghānakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ, tesaṃ dhammāy. ca uppaj-
jittha, ghānāy. ca uppajjati.
                                (6-11, etc.)
     Yassa rūpāy. uppajjati, tassa manāy.1 . . . pe . . .
dhammāy. uppajjitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana
dhammāy. uppajjittha, tassa rūpāy. uppajjatīti? Sab-
besaṃ cavantānaṃ arūpakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
dhammāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ rūpāy. uppajjati;
sarupakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāy. ca uppaj-
jittha, rūpāy. ca uppajjati.
                                (11-12.)
     Yassa manāy. uppajjati, tassa dhammāy. uppajjitthāti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana dhammāy. uppajjittha, tassa
manāy. uppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ acittakānaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ
manāy. uppajjati; sacittakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesan
dhammāy. ca uppajjittha, manāy. ca uppajjati.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. omits.


[page 082]
82                       Āyatanayamakaṃ
                              (1-2, etc.)
     ii. Yattha cakkhāy. uppajjati1 . . . pe . . .
                               (1-3.)
     iii. Yassa yattha cakkhāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha sotāy.
uppajjitthāti? Suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha sotāy. uppajjittha;
itaresaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesan tattha
cakkhāy. ca uppajjati, sotāy. ca uppajjittha. Yassa vā
pana yattha sotāy. uppajjittha, tassa tattha cakkhāy.
uppajjatīti? Pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ kāmā-
vacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha sotāy. uppajjittha, no
ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. uppajjati, sacakkhukānaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesan tattha sotāy. ca uppajjittha, cakkhāy. ca
uppajjati.
                                (1-3.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha ghānāy.
uppajjitthāti? Rūpāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. uppajjittha;
sacakkhukānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. ca uppajjati, ghānāy. ca uppajjittha. Yassa vā
pana yattha ghānāy. uppajjittha, tassa tattha cakkhāy.
uppajjatīti? Kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ
kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. uppaj-
jittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. uppajjati; sacakkhu-
kānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy.
ca uppajjittha, cakkhāy. ca uppajjati.
                                (1-6.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha rūpāy.
uppajjitthāti? Suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. uppajjittha;
itaresaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ uppajantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. ca uppajjati, rūpāy. ca uppajjittha. Yassa vā
pana yattha rūpāy. uppajjittha, tassa tattha cakkhāy.
uppajjatīti? Pañcavokārā cavantaṃ acakkhukānaṃ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. inserts tattha sotāyatanaṃ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.


[page 083]
                          Āyatanayamakaṃ                      83
kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
rūpāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. uppajjati;
sacakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. ca
uppajjittha,1 cakkhāy. ca2 uppajjati.
                                (1-11.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha manāy.
uppajjitthāti? Suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāy. uppajjittha,
itaresaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. ca uppajjati, manāy. ca uppajjittha. Yassa vā
pana yattha manāy. uppajjittha, tassa tattha cakkhāy.
uppajjatīti? Pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ
kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy.
uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. uppajjati, sacak-
khukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. ca uppaj-
jittha, cakkhāy. ca uppajjati.
                                (1-12.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha dhammāy.
uppajjitthāti? Suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. uppaj-
jittha, itaresaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. ca uppajjati, dhammāy. ca uppajjittha.3 Yassa
vā pana yattha dhammāy. uppajjittha, tassa tattha
cakkhāy. uppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ4 cavantānaṃ acakkhu-
kānaṃ5 uppajjantānaṃ6 tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. uppajjittha,
no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. uppajjati, sacakkhukānaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. ca uppajjittha,
cakkhāy. ca uppajjati.
                                (3-6.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha rūpāy.
uppajjitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana yattha rūpāy.
uppajjittha, tassa tattha ghānāy. uppajjatīti? Kāmāva-

84                       Āyatanayamakaṃ
carā cavantānaṃ aghānakānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ
rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ
tattha ghānāy. uppajjati; saghānakānaṃ1 kāmāvacaraṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. ca uppajjittha, ghānāy.
ca uppajjati.
                                (3-11.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha manāy.
uppajjitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana yattha manāy.
uppajjittha, tassa tattha ghānāy. uppajjatīti? Kāmāva-
carā cavantānaṃ aghānakānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ
rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesan tattha manāy. uppaj-
jittha, no ca tesan tattha ghānāy. uppajjati; saghānakānaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. ca uppajjittha, ghānāy.
ca uppajjati.
                                (3-12.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha dhammāy.
uppajjitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy.
uppajjittha, tassa tattha ghānāy. uppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ
cavantānaṃ aghānakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
dhammāy. uppajjittha, *no ca tesan tattha ghānāy.
uppajjati; saghānakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
dhammāy. ca uppajjittha,*2 ghānāy. ca uppajjati.
                                (6-11.)
     Yassa yattha rūpāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha manāy.
uppajjitthāti? Suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha manāy. uppajjittha; itaresaṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesan tattha rūpāy. ca uppajjati, manāy. ca
uppajjittha. Yassa vā pana yattha manāy. uppajjittha,
tassa tattha rūpāy. uppajjatīti? Pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ
arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ
tattha rūpāy. uppajjati, pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha manāy. ca uppajjittha, rūpāy. ca uppajjati.

1 Br. omits.
2 S. omits * to *.

                            Āyatanayamakaṃ                     85
                                (6-12.)

uppajjitthāti? Suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānan tesaṃ tattha
rūpāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. uppajjittha;
itaresaṃ sarūpakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy.
ca uppajjati, dhammāy. ca uppajjittha. Yassa vā pana
yattha dhammāy. uppajjittha, tassa tattha rūpāy. uppaj-
jatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ arūpakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha
rūpāy. uppajjati; sarūpakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
dhammāy. ca uppajjittha, rūpāy. ca uppajjati.

jittha; itaresaṃ sacittakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
manāy. ca uppajjati, dhammāy. ca uppajjittha. Yassa vā
pana yattha dhammāy. uppajjittha tassa tattha manāy.
uppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ acittakānaṃ uppajjan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ
tattha manāy. uppajjati; sacittakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ

     8. i. Yassa cakkhāy. nuppajjati, tassa sotāy. nuppaj-
jitthāti? Uppajjittha. Yassa vā pana sotāy. nuppajjittha,
tassa cakkhāy. nuppajjatīti? Natthi.

pana dhammāy. nuppajjittha, tassa manāy. nuppajjatīti?
Natthi.
                              (1-2, etc.)
     ii. Yattha cakkhāy. nuppajjati,1 . . . pe . . .
                              (1-2.)
     iii. Yassa yattha cakkhāy. nuppajjati, tassa tattha
sotāy. nuppajjitthāti? Pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ acakkhu-
kānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy.
nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha sotāy. nuppajjittha; sud-
dhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha cakkhāy. ca nuppajjati, sotāy. ca nuppajjittha.
Yassa vā pana yattha sotāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha
cakkhāy. nuppajjatīti? Suddhāvāsan uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha sotāy. nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy.
nuppajjati; suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ
arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha sotāy. ca nuppajjittha, cakkhāy. ca
nuppajjati.

jati, no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. nuppajjittha; rūpāvacarā
cavantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy.
ca nuppajjati, ghānāy. ca nuppajjittha. Yassa vā pana
yattha ghānāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha cakkhāy. nuppaj-
jitīti? Rūpāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy.
nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjati; rūpā-
vacarā cavantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesan tattha
ghānāy. ca nuppajjittha, cakkhāy. ca nuppajjati.

cakkhāy. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. nuppaj-

[page 087]
                          Āyatanayamakaṃ                     87
jittha; suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. ca nuppajjati, rūpāy. ca nuppajjittha. Yassa vā
pana yattha rūpāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha cakkhāy.
nuppajjatīti? Suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
rūpāy. nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. nuppaj-
jati; suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
rūpāy. ca nuppajjittha, cakkhāy. ca nuppajjati.
                                (1-11.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. nuppajjati, tassa tattha manāy.
nuppajjitthāti? Pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ
kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāy. nuppaj-
jittha; suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha cakkhāy. ca nuppajjati, manāy. ca nuppajjittha.
Yassa vā pana yattha manāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha
cakkhāy. nuppajjatīti? Suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha manāy. nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāy. nuppaj-
jati; suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha manāy. ca nuppajjittha, cakkhāy. ca nuppajjati.
                                (1-12.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. nuppajjati, tassa tattha dham-
māy. nuppajjitthāti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjati, no ca
tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. nuppajjittha; suddhāvāse parinib-
bantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. ca nuppajjati, dhammāy.
ca nuppajjittha. Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy. nuppaj-
jittha, tassa tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjatīti? Suddhāvāsaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. nuppajjittha, no ca
tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjati; suddhāvāse parinib-
bantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. ca nuppajjittha, cakkhāy.
ca nuppajjati.
                           (3-6.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. nuppajjati, tassa tattha rūpāy.
nuppajjitthāti? Kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ aghānakānaṃ
kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 088]
88                       Āyatanayamakaṃ
ghānāy. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha1 rūpāy. nuppaj-
jittha; suddhāvāsānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesan tattha ghānāy. ca
nuppajjati, rūpāy. ca nuppajjittha. Yassa vā pana yattha
rūpāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha ghānāy. nuppajjatīti?
Āmantā.
                               (3-11.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. nuppajjati, tassa tattha manāy.
nuppajjitthāti? Kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ aghānakānaṃ
kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāva-
carānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. nuppajjati, no ca tesan tattha
manāy. nuppajjittha; suddhāvāsānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. ca nuppajjati, manāy. ca nuppajjittha.
Yassa vā pana yattha manāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha
ghānāy. nuppajjatīti? Āmantā.
                               (3-12.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. nuppajjati, tassa tattha dhammāy.
nuppajjitthāti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ ajhānakānaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. nuppajjati, no ca
tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. nuppajjittha; suddhāvāsānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. ca nuppajjati, dhammāy. ca nuppaj-
jittha. Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy. nuppajjittha,
tassa tattha ghānāy. nuppajjatīti? Āmantā.
                                (6-11.)
     Yassa yattha rūpāy. nuppajjati, tassa tattha manāy.
nuppajjitthāti? Pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha rūpāy. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāy.
nuppajjittha; suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ asaññasat-
tānaṃ2 tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. ca nuppajjati, manāy. ca
nuppajjittha. Yassa vā pana yattha manāy. nuppaj-
jittha, tassa tattha rūpāy. nuppajjatīti? Suddhāvāsaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
manāy. nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. nuppajjati;
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. omits tattha.
2 S. and Br. insert cavantānaṃ and substitute asaññasattā.


[page 089]
                          Āyatanayamakaṃ                    89
suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha manāy. ca {nuppajjittha}, rūpāy. ca nuppajjati.
                                (6-12.)
     Yassa yattha rūpāy. nuppajjati, tassa tattha dhammāy.
nuppajitthāti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ arūpakānaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
dhammāy. nuppajjittha; suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. ca nuppajjati, dhammāy. ca nuppaj-
jittha. Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy. uppajjittha, tassa
tattha rūpāy. nuppajjatīti? Suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha
rūpāy. nuppajjati; suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha dhammāy. ca nuppajjittha, rūpāy. ca nuppajjati.
                                (11-12.)
     Yassa yattha manāy. nuppajjati, tassa tattha dhammāy.
nuppajjitthāti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ acittakānaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha dhammāy. nuppajjittha; suddhāvāse parinib-
bantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. ca nuppajjati, dhammāy. ca
nuppajjittha. Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy. nuppaj-
jittha, tassa tattha manāy. nuppajjatīti? Suddhāvāsaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. nuppajjittha. no
ca tesaṃ tattha manāy. nuppajjati; suddhāvāse parinib-
bantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. ca nuppajjittha, manāy.
ca nuppajjati.
                           (1-2.)
     9. I. Yassa cakkhāy. uppajjati, tassa sotāy. uppaj-
jissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjan-
tānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ sotāy.
uppajjissati; itaresaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
cakkhāy. ca uppajjati, sotāy. ca uppajjissati. Yassa vā
pana sotāy. uppajjissati, tassa cakkhāy. uppajjatīti?
Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
sotāy. uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāy. uppajjati;
sacakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ sotāy. ca uppaj-
jisati, cakkhāy. ca uppajjati.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 090]
90                       Āyatanayamakaṃ
                                (1-3.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. uppajjati, tassa ghānāy. uppajjissatīti?
Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ ye ca
rūpāvacaraṃ1 uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ ghānāy.
uppajjissati; itaresaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ2 uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ cakkhāy. ca uppajjati, ghānāy. ca uppajjissati.
Yassa vā pana ghānāy. uppajjissati, tassa cakkhāy. uppaj-
jātīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ uppajjan-
tānaṃ3 tesaṃ ghānāy. uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāy.
uppajjati; sacakkhukānaṃ4 uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ ghānāy.
ca uppajjissati, cakkhāy. ca uppajjati.
                                (1-6.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. uppajjati, tassa rūpāy. uppajjissatīti?
Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ ye ca
arūpaṃ uppajjitvā5 parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ cakkhāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ rūpāy. uppajjissati;
itaresaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. ca
uppajjati, rūpāy. ca uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana rūpāy.
uppajjissati, tassa cakkhāy. uppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavan-
tānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpāy. uppaj-
jissati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāy. uppajjati; sacakkhukānaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpāy. ca uppajjissati, cakkhāy. ca
uppajjati.
                                (1-11.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. uppajjati, tassa manāy. uppajjissatīti?
Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
cakkhāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ manāy. uppajjissati;
itaresaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. ca
uppajjati, manāy. ca uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana manāy.
uppajjissati, tassa cakkhāy. uppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavan-
tānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ manāy. uppaj-

1 S. and Br. insert arūpāvacaraṃ.
2 S. inserts kāmāvacaraṃ.

5 Br. upapajjitvā.

                             (1-12.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. uppajjati, tassa dhammāy. uppajjis-
satīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ dhammāy.
uppajjissati; itaresaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ

                              (3-6.)

Pacchimabhavikānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ1 tesaṃ
ghānāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ rūpāy. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ
saghānakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ ghānāy. ca uppajjati,
rūpāy. ca uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana rūpāy. uppajjissati,
tassa ghānāy. uppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ aghāna-
kānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpāy. uppajjissati, no ca
tesaṃ ghānāy. uppajjati; saghānakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ rūpāy. uppajjissati, ghānāy. ca uppajjati.
                                (3-11.)

ghānāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ manāy. uppajjissati;
itaresaṃ saghānakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ ghānāy. ca
uppajjati, manāy. ca uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana manāy.

tānaṃ aghānakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ manāy. uppaj-

                           (6-11.)

Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāran uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ

sarūpakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpāy. ca uppajjati,
manāy. ca uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana manāy. uppaj-
jissati, tassa rūpāy. uppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ
arūpakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ manāy. uppajjissati, no
ca tesaṃ rūpāy. uppajjati; sarūpakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ manāy. ca uppajjissati, rūpāy. ca uppajjati.
                           (6-12.)
     Yassa rūpāy. uppajjati, tassa dhammāy. uppajjissatīti?
Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
rūpāy. uppajjati; no ca tesaṃ dhammāy. uppajjissati;
itaresaṃ sarūpakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpāy. ca
uppajjati, dhammāy. ca uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana
dhammāy. uppajjissati; tassa rūpāy. uppajjatīti? Sabbe-
saṃ cavantānaṃ arūpakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāy.
uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ rūpāy. uppajjati; sarūpakānaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāy. {ca} uppajjissati, rūpāy. ca
uppajjati.

                             (11-12.)

jati, no ca tesaṃ dhammāy. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ sacitta-
kānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ manāy. ca uppajjati, dhammāy.
ca uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana dhammāy. uppajjissati,
tassa manāy. uppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ acitta-
kānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāy. uppajjissati, no ca
tesaṃ manāy. uppajjati; sacittakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
dhammāy. ca uppajjissati, manāy. ca uppajjati.
                           (1-2, etc.)
     ii. Yattha cakkhāy. . . . pe . . .
                             (1-2.)
     iii. Yassa yattha cakkhāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha sotāy.
uppajjissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha sotāy. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. ca uppajjati, sotāy. ca
uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yattha sotāy. uppajjissati,
tassa tattha cakkhāy. uppajjatīti? Pañcavokārā cavan-
tānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesan
tattha sotāy. uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy.
uppajjati, sacakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
sotāy. ca uppajjissati, cakkhāy. uppajjati.
                           (1-3.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha ghānāy.
uppajjissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy.
uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ
sacakkhukānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. ca uppajjati, ghānāy. ca uppajjissati. Yassa vā
pana yattha ghānāy. uppajjissati, tassa tattha cakkhāy.
uppajjatīti? Kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ kāmā-
vacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. uppajjissati,
no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. uppajjati; sacakkhukānaṃ

94                       Āyatanayamakaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. ca uppajjissati, cak-
khāy. ca uppajjati.
                           (1-3.)
     Yassa yattha ckakhāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha rūpāy.
uppajjissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha

tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. ca uppajjati, rūpāy. ca uppajjissati.

cakkhāy. uppajjatīti? Pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ acakkhu-
kānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha rūpāy. uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy.
uppajjati; sacakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
rūpāy. ca uppajjissati, cakkhāy. ca uppajjati.
                           (1-11.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha manāy.

uppajjati; sacakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha

                           (1-12.)

uppajjissati, tassa tattha cakkhāy. uppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ
