dhammāy. uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. uppaj-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 095]
                          Āyatanayamakaṃ                    95
jati; sacakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesan tattha dham-
māy. ca uppajjissati, cakkhāy. ca uppajjati.
                                (3-6.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha rūpāy.
uppajjissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
rūpāy. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ saghānakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. ca uppajjati, rūpāy. ca uppajjissati.
Yassa vā pana yattha rūpāy. uppajjissati, tassa tattha
ghānāy. uppajjatīti? Kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ aghāna-
kānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha rūpāy. uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāy.
uppajjati, saghānakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
rūpāy. ca uppajjissati, ghānāy. ca uppajjati.
                                (3-11.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha manāy.
uppajjissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
manāy. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ saghānakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. ca uppajjati, manāy. ca uppajjissati.
Yassa vā pana yattha manāy. uppajjissati, tassa tattha
ghānāy. uppajjatīti? Kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ aghāna-
kānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpā-
vacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha ghānāy. uppajjati; saghānakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha manāy. ca uppajjissati, ghānāy. ca uppaj-
jati.
                           (3-12.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha dhammāy.
uppajjissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ1 uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha dhammāy. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ saghānakānaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. ca uppajjati, dham-
māy. ca uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. omits.


[page 096]
96                            Āyatanayamakaṃ
uppajjissati, tassa tattha ghānāy. uppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ
cavantānaṃ aghānakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
dhammāy. uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. uppaj-
jati; saghānakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy.
ca uppajjissati, ghānāy. ca uppajjati.
                                (6-11.)
     Yassa yattha rūpāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha manāy.
uppajjissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy.
uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāy. uppajjissati;
itaresaṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy.
ca uppajjati, manāy. ca uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana
yattha manāy. uppajjissati, tassa tattha rūpāy. uppaj-
jatīti? Pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ arūpakānaṃ1 uppajjan-
tānaṃ2 tesaṃ tattha manāy. uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha rūpāy. uppajjati; pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha manāy. ca uppajjissati, rūpāy. ca uppajjati.
                                (6-12.)
     Yassa yattha rūpāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha dhammāy.
uppajjissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
dhammāy. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ sarūpakānaṃ uppajjan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. ca uppajjati, dhammāy. ca
uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy. uppajjis-
sati, tassa tattha rūpāy. uppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavan-
tānaṃ arūpakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy.
uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. uppajjati; sarūpa-
kānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. ca uppajjis-
sati, rūpāy. ca uppajjati.
                               (11-12.)
     Yassa yattha manāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha dhammāy.
uppajjissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha manāy. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāy.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. arūpānaṃ.
2 S. and Br. omit.


[page 097]
                          Āyatanayamakaṃ                  97
uppajjissati; itaresaṃ sacittakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha manāy. ca uppajjati, dhammāy. ca uppajjissati.
Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy. uppajjissati, tassa tattha
manāy. uppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ acittakānaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. uppajjissati, no ca
tesaṃ tattha manāy. uppajjati; sacittakānaṃ uppajjan-
tanaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhamāy. ca uppajjissati, manāy. ca
uppajjati.
                                (1-2.)
     10. i. Yassa cakkhāy. nuppajjati, tassa sotāy. nuppajjis-
satīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ cakkhāy. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ sotāy. nuppajjissati;
pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ
ye ca arūpaṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ cavan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. ca nuppajjati, sotāy. ca nuppajjissati.
Yassa vā pana sotāy. nuppajjissati, tassa cakkhāy. nuppaj-
jatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ
ye ca arūpaṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesaṃ sotāy. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāy.
nuppajjati, pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpe pacchi-
mabhavikānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti,
tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ sotāy. ca nuppajjissati, cakkhāy.
ca nuppajjati.
                                (1-3.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. nuppajjati, tassa ghānāy. nuppaj-
jissatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ ghānāy.
nuppajjissati; pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpe pac-
chimabhavikānaṃ ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ1 uppajjitvā
parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. ca
nuppajjati, ghānāy. ca nuppajjissati. Yassa vā pana
ghānāy. nuppajjissati, tassa cakkhāy. nuppajjatīti? Pac-
chimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ ye ca rūpā-
vacaraṃ2 uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ ghānāy. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāy.

1 S. and Br. insert arūpāvacaraṃ.
2 S. and Br. insert arūpāvacaraṃ.


[page 098]
98                       Āyatanayamakaṃ
nuppajjati; pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpe pacchima-
bhavikānaṃ ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ uppajjitvā
parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ ghānāy. ca
nuppajjissati, cakkhāy. ca nuppajjati.
                                (1-6.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. nuppajjati, tassa rūpāy. nuppajjissatīti?

jatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ
ye ca arūpaṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpāy. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāy.

mabhavikānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti,
tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpāy. ca nuppajjissati, cakkhāy.
ca nuppajjati.

pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ

asaññasattānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha sotāy. ca nuppaj-

care1 pacchimabhavikānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy.

                              (3-11.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. nuppajjati, tassa tattha manāy.
nuppajjissatīti? Kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ aghānakānaṃ2
uppajjantānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ3 tesaṃ tattha ghānāy.
nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāy. nuppajjissati;
kāmāvacare parinibbantānaṃ rūpāvacare arūpāvacare
pacchimabhavikānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy.
ca nuppajjati, manāy. ca nuppajjissati. Yassa vā pana
yattha manāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha ghānāy. nuppaj-
jatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha manāy. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
ghānāy. nuppajjati; kāmāvacare parinibbantānaṃ rūpā-
vacare arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha manāy. ca nuppajjissati, ghānāy. ca nuppaj-
jati.
                              (3-12.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. nuppajjati, tassa tattha dhammāy.
nuppajjissatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ aghānakānaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha dhammāy. nuppajjissati; kāmāvacare parinibban-
tānaṃ rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha ghānāy. ca nuppajjati, dhammāy. ca nuppajjissati.
Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha
ghānāy. nuppajjatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. nuppajjissati, no ca
tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. nuppajjati; kāmāvacare parinib-
bantānaṃ rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha dhammāy.4 ca nuppajjissati, ghānāy. ca
nuppajjati.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. arūpā-.
2 S. and Br. insert kāmāvacaraṃ.
3 S. and Br. insert arūpā-.
4 Br. substitutes rūpāyatanañ ca.


[page 104]
104                      Āyatanayamakaṃ
                              (6-11.)
     Yassa yattha rūpāy.1 nuppajjati, tassa tattha manāy.
nuppajjissatīti? Pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha rūpāy. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāy. nuppaj-
jissati; pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpe pacchimabha-
vikānaṃ asaññattā {cavantānaṃ} tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. ca
nuppajjati, manāy. ca nuppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yattha
{manāy}. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha rūpāy. nuppajjatīti?
Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ asañña-
sattānaṃ tesaṃ2 tattha manāy. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha rūpāy. nuppajjati; pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ
arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha manāy. ca nuppajjissati, rūpāy. ca nuppajjati.
                              (6-12.)
     Yassa yattha rūpāy. nuppajjati, tassa tattha dhammāy.
nuppajjissatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ arūpaṃ3 uppajjan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
dhammāy. nuppajjissati; pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ
arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. ca nuppaj-
jati, dhammāy. ca nuppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yattha
dhammāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha rūpāy. nuppajjatīti?
Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesan
tattha dhammāy. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāy.
nuppajjati; pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpe pacchima-
bhavikānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. ca nuppajjissati, rūpāy.
ca nuppajjati.
                              (11-12.)
     Yassa yattha manāy. nuppajjati, tassa tattha dhammāy.
nuppajjissatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ acittakānaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
dhammāy. nuppajjissati; parinibbantānaṃ tesan tattha
manāy. ca nuppajjati, dhammāy. ca nuppajjissati. Yassa
vā pana yattha dhammāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha
manāy. nuppajjatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ uppajjan-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. substitutes dhammāyatanaṃ.
2 Br. inserts upapajjantānaṃ.
3 Br. arūpakānaṃ.


[page 105]
                          Āyatanayamakaṃ                    105
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha manāy. nuppajjati, parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
dhammāy. ca nuppajjissati, manāy. ca nuppajjati.
                              (1-2.)
     11. i. Yassa cakkhāy. uppajjittha, tassa sotāy. uppaj-
jissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ uppajjitvā,
parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ cakkhāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesan
sotāy. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ1 cakkhāy. ca uppajjittha,
sotāy. ca uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana sotāy. . . . Āmantā.
                              (1-3.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. uppajjittha, tassa ghānāy. uppajjissatīti?
Pacchimabhavikānaṃ ye ca {rūpāvacaraṃ}2 uppajjitvā pari-
nibbāyissanti, tesaṃ cakkhāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ
ghānāy. uppajjissati, itaresaṃ1 cakkhāy. ca uppajjittha,
ghānāy. ca uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana . . . Āmantā.
                              (1-6.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. uppajjittha, tassa rūpāy. uppajjissatīti?
Pacchimabhavikānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ uppajjitvā parinibbā-
yissanti, tesaṃ cakkhāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ rūpāy.
uppajjissati; itaresaṃ1 cakkhāy. ca uppajjittha, rūpāy.
ca uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana . . . Āmantā.
                            (1-11, etc.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. uppajjittha, tassa manāy. . . . pe . . .
dhammāy. uppajjissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ
cakkhāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ dhammāy. uppajjissati;
itaresaṃ1 cakkhāy. ca uppajjittha, dhammāy. ca uppaj-
jissati. Yassa vā pana dhammāy. . . . Āmantā.
                              (3-6.)
     Yassa ghānāy. uppajjittha, tassa rūpāy. uppajjissatīti?
Pacchimabhavikānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ uppajjitva parinibbāyis-
santi, tesaṃ ghānāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ rūpāy.
uppajjissati; itaresaṃ1 ghānāy. ca uppajjittha, rūpāy. ca
uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana rūpāy. . . . Āmantā.

1 Br. inserts tesaṃ.
2 S. and Br. insert arūpāva-.

itaresaṃ rūpāy. ca uppajjittha, dhammāy. ca uppajjissati.

satīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ manāy. uppajjittha,
no ca tesaṃ dhammāy. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ1 manāy.
ca uppajjittha, dhammāy. uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana
dhammāy. . . . Āmantā.
                             (1-2, etc.)
     ii. Yattha cakkhāy. . . . pe . . .
                               (1-2.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. uppajjittha, tassa tattha sotāy.
uppajjissatīti? Pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha cakkhāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha sotāy.
uppajjissati; itaresaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cak-
khāy. ca uppajjittha, sotāy. ca uppajjissati. Yassa vā
pana yattha sotāy. . . . Āmantā.
                              (1-3.)

uppajjissatīti? Kāmāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ rūpāva-
carānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ
tattha ghānāy. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ

                          Āyatanayamakaṃ                    107
tattha cakkhāy. ca uppajjittha, ghānāy. ca uppajjissati.
Yassa vā pana yattha ghānāy. . . . pe . . . Āmantā.
                              (1-6.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. uppajjittha, tassa tattha rūpāy.
uppajjissatīti? Pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha cakkhāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāy.
uppajjissati; itaresaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cak-
khāy. ca uppajjittha, rūpāy. ca uppajjissati. Yassa vā
pana yattha rūpāy. uppajjissati, tassa tattha cakkhāy.
uppajjitthāti? Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. uppaj-
jissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. uppajjittha; pañca-
vokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. ca uppajjissati, cakkhāy. ca
uppajjittha.
                              (1-11.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. uppajjittha, tassa tattha manāy.
uppajjissatīti? Pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha cakkhāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāy.
uppajjissati; itaresaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cak-
khāy. ca uppajjittha, manāy. ca uppajjissati. Yassa vā
pana yattha manāy. uppajjissati, tassa tattha cakkhāy.
uppajjitthāti? Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. uppajjis-
sati, no ca tesan tattha cakkhāy. uppajjittha; pañcavo-
kārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. ca uppajjissati, cakkhāy. ca
uppajjittha.
                              (1-12.)

māy. uppajjissatīti? Pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha
dhammāy. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha cakkhāy. ca uppajjittha, dhammāy. ca uppajjissati.
Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy. uppajjissati, tassa tattha
cakkhāy. uppajjitthāti? Asaññasattānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha dhammāy. uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy.
uppajjittha; pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. ca
uppajjissati, cakkhāy. uppajjittha.

108                      Āyatanayamakaṃ

uppajjissati; itaresaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy.
ca uppajjittha, rūpāy. ca uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana
yattha rūpāy. uppajjissati, tassa tattha ghānāy. uppaj-
jitthāti? Rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. uppajjissati,
no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. uppajjittha; kāmāvacarānaṃ
tesan tattha rūpāy. ca uppajjissati, ghānāy. ca uppajjittha.

. . . pe . . . dhammāy. uppajjissatīti? Kāmāvacare . . .
pe . . . dhammāy. uppajjissati; . . . dhammāy. ca uppaj-
jissati. Yassa vā pana dhammāy. . . . pe . . . uppajjitthāti?

uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. uppajjittha; kāmā-
vacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. ca uppajjissati, ghānāy.
ca uppajjittha.

jissati. Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy. uppajjissati,

                              (1-2.)
     12. i. Yassa cakkhāy. nuppajjittha, tassa sotāy. nuppaj-
jissatīti? Natthi. Yassa vā pana yattha sotāy. nuppaj-
jissati, tassa tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.

                              (1-2).

sotāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjitthāti

110                      Āyatanayamakaṃ
suddhāvāsānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ1 tesaṃ tattha sotāy. ca
nuppajjissati, cakkhāy. ca nuppajjittha.
                              (1-3.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha ghānāy.
nuppajjissatīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana yattha ghānāy.
nuppajjissati, tassa tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjitthāti? Kāmā-
vacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
ghānāy. nuppajjissati, no ca tesan tattha cakkhāy. nuppaj-
jittha; suddhāvāsānaṃ assaññasattānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha ghānāy. ca nuppajjissati, cakkhāy. ca nuppajjittha.
                              (1-6.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha rūpāy.
nuppajjissatīti? Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy.
nuppajjittha, no ca tesan tattha rūpāy. nuppajjissati;
suddhāvāsānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesan tattha cakkhāy. ca nuppaj-
jittha, rūpāy. ca nuppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yattha
rūpāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tatha cakkhāy. nuppajjitthāti?
Pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy.
nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjittha;
suddhāvāsānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. ca nuppaj-
jissati, cakkhāy. ca nuppajjittha.
                              (1-11.)

nuppajjissatīti? Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. nuppaj-
jittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāy. nuppajjissati; suddhāvā-
sānaṃ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha cakkhāy. ca nuppajjittha, manāy. ca nuppajjissati.
Yassa vā pana yattha manāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha
cakkhāy. nuppajjitthāti? Pañcavokāre pacchimabhavi-
kānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjittha; suddhāvāsānaṃ arūpe pac-
chimabhavikānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. ca
nuppajjissati, cakkhāy ca nuppajjittha.

                              (1-12.)

                              (3-6.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha rūpāy.
nuppajjissatīti? Rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy.
nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. nuppajjissati;
rūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
ghānāy. ca nuppajjittha, rūpāy. ca nuppajjissati. Yassa
vā pana yattha rūpāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha ghānāy.
nuppajjitthāti? Kāmāvacare pachimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha rūpāy. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāy.
nuppajjittha; rūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ1 tesaṃ
tatthā rūpāy. ca nuppajjissati, ghānāy. ca nuppajjittha.
                              (3-11.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha manāy.
nuppajjissatīti? Rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ2 tesaṃ
tattha ghānāy. nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāy.
nuppajjissati; rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchimabhavi-
kānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. ca nuppaj-
jittha, manāy. ca nuppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yattha
manāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha ghānāy. nuppajjitthāti?
Kāmāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy.
nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. nuppajjittha;
rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ asaññasat-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. ca nuppajjissati, ghānāy. ca
nuppajjittha.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. inserts arūpānaṃ.
2 S. omits.


[page 112]
112                      Āyatanayamakaṃ
                              (3-12.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha dham-
māy. nuppajjissatīti? Rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha
dhammāy. nuppajjissati; rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchi-
mabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. ca nuppajjittha,
dhammāy. ca nuppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yattha dham
māy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha ghānāy. nuppajjitthāti?
Kāmāvacare . . . pe . . . dhammāy. . . . rūpāvacare
arūpāvacare1 pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy.
ca nuppajjissati, ghānāy. ca nuppajjittha.
                              (6-11.)
     Yassa yattha rūpāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha manāy.
nuppajjissatīti? Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. nuppaj-
jittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha {manāy.} nuppajjissati; suddhā-
vāsānaṃ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy.
ca nuppajjittha, manāy. ca nuppajjissati. Yassa vā pana
yattha manāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha rūpāy. nuppaj-
jitthāti? Pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṃ asaññasat-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
rūpāy. nuppajjittha; suddhāvāsānaṃ arūpe pacchimabhavi-
kānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. ca nuppajjissati, rūpāy. ca
nuppajjittha.
                              (6-12.)
     Yassa yattha rūpāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha dhammāy.
nuppajjissatīti? Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. nuppaj-
jittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. nuppajjissati; suddhā-
vāsānaṃ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. ca
nuppajjittha, dhammāy. ca nuppajjissati. Yassa vā pana
yattha dhammāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha rūpāy.
nuppajjitthāti? Pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha dhammāy. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāy.
nuppajjittha; suddhāvāsānaṃ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. ca nuppajjissati, rūpāy. ca nuppaj-
jittha.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. omits.


[page 113]
                          Āyatanayamakaṃ                    113
                              (11-12.)
     Yassa yattha manāy. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha dham-
māy. nuppajjissatīti? Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy.
nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. nuppajjissati;
suddhāvāsānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. ca nuppajjittha,
dhammāy. ca nuppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yattha
dhammāy. nuppajjissati, tassa tattha manāy. nuppajjit-
thāti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy.
nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāy. nuppajjittha,
suddhāvāsānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. ca nuppajjissati,
manāy. ca nuppajjittha.
                       UPPĀDAVĀRAṂ NIṬṬHITAṂ.
                           [Nirodhavāro. ]
                              (1-2.)
     1. i. Yassa cakkhāy. nirujjhati, tassa sotāy. niruj-
jhatīti? Sacakkhukānaṃ asotakānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ
cakkhāy. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ sotāy. nirujjhati; sacak-
khukānaṃ sasotakānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. ca
nirujjhati, sotāy. ca nirujjhati. Yassa vā pana sotāy.
nirujjhati, tassa cakkhāy. nirujjhatīti? Sasotakānaṃ acak-
khukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ sotāy. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ
cakkhāy. nirujjhati; sasotakānaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ cavan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ sotāy. ca nirujjhati, cakkhāy. ca nirujjhati.
                              (1-3.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. nirujjhati, tassa ghānāy. nirujjhatīti?
(as for sotāy.) . . . cakkhāy. ca nirujjhati.
                              (1-6.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. nirujjhati, tassa rūpāy. nirujjhatīti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana rūpāy. nirujjhati, tassa cakkhāy.
nirujjhatīti? Sarūpakānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ
rūpāy. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāy. nirujjhati; sacak-
khukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpāy. ca nirujjhati, cakkhāy.
ca nirujjhati.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 114]
114                      Āyatanayamakaṃ
                              (1-11.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. nirujjhati, tassa manāy. nirujjhatīti?
{Āmantā}. Yassa vā pana manāy. nirujjhati, tassa cakkhāy.
nirujjhatīti? Sacittakānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ
manāy. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāy. nirujjhati; sacak-
khukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ manāy. ca nirujjhati, cakkhāy.
ca nirujjhati.
                              (1-12.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. nirujjhati, tassa dhammāy. nirujjhatīti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana dhammāy. nirujjhati, tassa
cakkhāy. nirujjhatīti? Acakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ
dhammāy. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāy. nirujjhati;
sacakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāy. ca nirujjhati,
cakkhāy. ca nirujjhati.
                              (3-6.)
     Yassa ghānāy. nirujjhati, tassa rūpāy. nirujjhatīti?
Āmantā . . . (as in 1-6).
                              (3-11.)
     Yassa ghānāy. nirujjhati, tassa manāy. nirujjhatīti . . .
(as in 3-6).
                              (3-12.)
     Yassa ghānāy. nirujjhati, tassa dhammāy. nirujjhatīti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana dhammāy. nirujjhati, tassa
ghānāy. nirujjhatīti? Aghānakānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ
dhammāy. nirujjhati, no ca . . . as in (3-6).
                              (6-11.)
     Yassa rūpāy. nirujjhati, tassa manāy. nirujjhatīti?
Sarūpakānaṃ1 acittakānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpāy. niruj-
jhati, no ca tesaṃ manāy. nirujjhati; sarūpakānaṃ sacit-
takānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpāy. ca nirujjhati, manāy.
ca nirujjhati. Yassa vā pana manāy. nirujjhati, tassa
rūpāy. nirujjhatīti? Arūpakānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ manāy.
nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ rūpāy. nirujjhati; sarūpakānaṃ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. and Br. omit.


[page 115]
                          Āyatanayamakaṃ                    115
sacittakānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ manāy. ca nirujjhati,
rūpāy. ca nirujjhati.
                              (6-12.)
     Yassa rūpāy. nirujjhati, tassa dhammāy. nirujjhatīti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana dhammāy. nirujjhati, tassa rūpāy.
nirujjhatīti? Arūpakānaṃ {cavantānaṃ} tesaṃ dhammāy.
nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ rūpāy. nirujjhati; sarūpakānaṃ
cavantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāy. ca nirujjhati, rūpāy. ca
nirujjhati.
                              (11-12.)

Āmantā. Yassa vā pana dhammāy. nirujjhati, tassa
manāy. nirujjhatīti? Acittakānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ dham-
māy. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ manāy. nirujjhati; sacit-
takānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāy. ca nirujjhati, manāy.
ca nirujjhati.
                              (1-2, etc.)

uppādanirodhe pi yatthakaṃ sabbattha sadisaṃ).
                              (1-2, etc.)

nirujjhatīti? . . . pe . . . ghānāy.1 manāy. dhammāy.2
nirujjhatīti? (yassakaṃ pi yassa-yattha-kaṃ pi sadisaṃ
citthāretabbaṃ).

jhatīti? Acakkhukānaṃ sasotakānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ cak-
khāy. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ sotāy. na nirujjhati;
sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ asotakānaṃ cavan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. ca na nirujjhati, sotāy. ca na
nirujjhati. Yassa vā pana sotāy. na nirujjhati, tassa
cakkhāy. na nirujjhatīti? Asotakānaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ
cavantānaṃ tesaṃ sotāy. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāy.
na nirujjhati; sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ3

116                      Āyatanayamakaṃ
asotakānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ sotāy. ca nirujjhati, cak-
khāy. ca na nirujjhati.

jhatīti . . . (as in 1-2).

sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ arūpakānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ

vā pana rūpāy. na nirujjhati, tassa cakkhāy. na niruj-
jhatīti? Āmantā.

sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ acittakānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ

sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. ca na nirujjhati,
dhammāy. ca na nirujjhati. Yassa vā pana dhammāy.

118                      Āyatanayamakaṃ

ca rūpāvacaraṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ cavan-

ca nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana ghānāy. nirujjhissati,

chimabhavikānaṃ arūpaṃ uppajjantānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ
uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ
dhammāy. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ cakhāy. nirujjhissati;
itaresaṃ1 dhammāy. ca nirujjhissati, cakkhāy. ca niruj-

120                      Āyatanayamakaṃ
nirujjhissati, tassa tattha ghānāy. nirujjhissatīti1 . . .
pe . . .*(rūpāvacarānaṃ,2 kāmāvacarānaṃ; rūpāvacarānaṃ.2

                              (3-117.)

nirujjhissatīti . . .pe . . . (asaññasattānaṃ,2 pañcavokā-
rānaṃ; arūpānaṃ,2 pañcavokārānaṃ; arūpānaṃ,2 pañcavo-
kārānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ).
                              (11-12.)
     Yassa yattha manāy. nirujjhissati, tassa tattha
dhammāy. nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana
yattha dhammāy. nirujjhissati, tassa tattha manāy.
nirujjhissatīti? āsaññasattānaṃ2 catuvokārānaṃ pañca-
vokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. ca nirujjhissati, manāy.
ca nirujjhissati (yathā uppādavāre yassa-yatthake anāgata
pucchā vitthāritā, evaṃ Nirodhe pi vitthāretabbā).
                              (1-2.)
     6. i. Yassa cakkhāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa sotāy. na
nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana sotāy. na niruj-
jhissati, tassa cakkhāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.
                              (1-3.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa ghānāy. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana ghānāy. na nirujjhis-
sati, tassa cakkhāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Pacchimabhavi-
kānaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ
uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ
ghānāy. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāy. na niruj-
jhissati; pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpe pacchimabha-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. inserts tesaṃ.
2 Br. inserts . . . pe . . .
3 Br. inserts rūpāvacarānaṃ, arūpāvacarānaṃ;. . . pe . . .
     kāmāvacarānaṃ.


[page 121]
                          Āyatanayamakaṃ                    121
vikānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ
cavantānaṃ tesaṃ ghānāy. ca na nirujjhissati, cakkhāy. ca
na nirujjhissati.
                              (1-6.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa rūpāy. . . .
(as in 1-2).
                            (1-11, etc.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa manāy. . . .
pe . . . dhammāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ
arūpaṃ uppajjantānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ uppajjitvā parinibbā-
yissanti, tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. na nirujjhis-
sati, no ca tesaṃ dhammāy. na nirujjhissati; parinibban-
tānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. ca na nirujjhissati, dhammāy. ca
na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana dhammāy. na nirujjhis-
sati, tassa cakkhāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.
                              (3-6.)
     Yassa ghānāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa rūpāy. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ . . . (as in 1-3). Yassa
vā pana rūpāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa ghānāy. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Āmantā.
                            (3-11, etc.)
     Yassa ghānāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa manāy. . . . pe . . .
dhammāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ rūpā-
vacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ
arūpāvacaraṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ cavan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ ghānāy. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ dham-
māy. na nirujjhissati; parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ ghānāy.
ca na nirujjhissati, dhammāy. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa
vā pana dhammāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa ghānāy. na
nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.
                              (6-11, etc.)
     Yassa rūpāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa manāy. . . . pe . . .
dhammāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ arūpan
uppajjantānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti,
tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpāy. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ
dhammāy. na nirujjhissati; parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpāy.

[page 122]
122                      Āyatanayamakaṃ
ca na nirujjhissati, dhammāy. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa
vā pana dhammā. na nirujjhissati, tassa rūpāy. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Āmantā.
                              (11-12.)
     Yassa manāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa dhammāy. na
nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana dhammāy. na
nirujjhissati, tassa {manāy.} na nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.
                              (1-2, etc.)
     ii. Yattha cakkhāy. . . . pe . . .
                                (1-2.)
     iii. Yassa yattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha
sotāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana yattha
sotāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha cakkhāy. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Āmantā.
                              (1-3.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha
ghānāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana yattha
ghānāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha cakkhāy. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. na niruj-
jhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhissati;
pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ arūpānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. ca na nirujjhissati, cakkhāy. ca na
nirujjhissati.
                              (1-6.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha
rūpāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. na
nirujjhissati; pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. ca na nirujjhissati, rūpāy. ca na
nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha rūpāy. na nirujjhissati,
tassa tattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.
                              (1-11.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha
manāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy.
na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāy. na nirujjhissati;
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 123]
                          Āyatanayamakaṃ                    123
parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. ca
na nirujjhissati, manāy. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā
pana yattha manāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha cakkhāy.
na nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.
                              (1-12.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha
dhammāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Asaññasattānaṃ arūpānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhissait, no ca tesaṃ tattha
dhammāy. na nirujjhissati; parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. ca na nirujjhissati, dhammāy. ca na nirujjhissati.
Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa
tattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.
                              (3-6.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha rūpāy.
na nirujjhissatīti? Rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. na
nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. na nirujjhissati;
pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
ghānāy. ca na nirujjhissati, rūpāy. ca na nirujjhissati.
Yassa vā pana yattha rūpāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha
ghānāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.
                              (3-11.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha
manāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
manāy. na nirujjhissati; parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. ca na nirujjhissati, manāy. ca na
nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha manāy. na niruj-
jhissati, tassa tattha ghānāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.
                              (3-12.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha
dhammāy. na nirujjhissatīti . . . (as in 3-11), parinib-
bantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. ca na nirujjhissati, dhammāy.
ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy. na
nirujjhissati, tassa tattha ghānāy. na nirujjhissatīti?
Ānantā.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 124]
124                      Āyatanayamakaṃ
                                   (6-11.)
     Yassa yattha rūpāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha manāy.
na nirujjhissatīti? Arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. na niruj-
jhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāy. na nirujjhissati, parinib-
bantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. ca na nirujjhissati, manāy.
na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha manāy. na niruj-
jhissati, tassa tattha rūpāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Asañña-
sattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. na nirujjhissati, no ca tasaṃ
tattha rūpāy. na nirujjhissati; parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha manāy. ca na nirujjhissati, rūpāy. ca na nirujjhissati.
                              (6-12.)
     Yassa yattha rūpāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha
dhammāy. na nirujjhissatīti . . . (as in 6-11). Yassa
vā pana yattha dhammāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha
rūpāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.
                              (11-12.)
     Yassa yattha manāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha
dhammāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
manāy. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāy.
na nirujjhissati; parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. ca
na nirujjhissati, dhammāy. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa
vā pana yattha dhammāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha
manāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.
                              (1-2.)
     7. i. Yassa cakkhāy. nirujjhati, tassa sotāy. nirujjhit-
thāti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana sotāy. nirujjhittha, tassa
cakkhāy. nirujjhatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ acakkhu-
kānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ sotāy. nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ
cakkhāy. nirujjhati, sacakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ sotāy.
ca nirujjhittha, cakkhāy. ca nirujjhati.
                              (1-3, etc.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. nirujjhati, tassa ghānāy. . . . pe . . .
rūpāy. manāy. dhammāy. nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa
vā pana dhammāy. nirujjhittha, tassa cakkhāy. niruj-
jhatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ cavan-

[page 125]

tānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāy. nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāy.
nirujjhati; sacakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāy.
ca nirujjhittha, cakkhāy. ca nirujjhati.
                              (3-6, etc.)
     Yassa ghānāy. nirujjhati, tassa rūpāy. . . . pe . . .
manāy. dhammāy. nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana
dhammāy. . . . (as in 1-3, etc.).
                              (6-11, etc.)
     Yassa rūpāy. nirujjhati, tassa manāy. . . . pe . . .
dhammāy. nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana dham-
māy. nirujjhittha, tassa rūpāy. nirujjhatīti? Sabbesaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ arūpakānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāy.
nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ rūpāy. nirujjhati; sarūpakānaṃ
cavantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāy. ca nirujjhittha, rūpāy. ca
nirujjhati.
                              (11-12.)
     Yassa manāy. nirujjhati, tassa {dhammāy}. nirujjhitthāti?
Āmantā. Yassa vā pana dhammāy. nirujjhittha, tassa
manāy. nirujjhatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ acittakānaṃ
cavantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāy. nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ
manāy. nirujjhati; sacittakānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ dham-
māy. ca nirujjhittha, manāy. ca nirujjhati.
                              (1-2, etc.)
     ii. Yattha cakkhāy. nirujjhati . . . pe . . .
                                (1-2.)
     iii. Yassa yattha cakkhāy. nirujjhati, tassa tattha sotāy.
nirujjhitthāti? Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha sotāy. nirujjhittha;
itaresaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy.
ca nirujjhati, sotāy. ca nirujjhittha. Yassa vā pana
yattha sotāy. nirujjhittha, tassa tattha cakkhāy. niruj-
jhātīti? Pañcavokāran uppajjantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ
kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha sotāy. nirujjhittha,
no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. nirujjhati. sacakkhukānaṃ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 126]
126                      Āyatanayamakaṃ
cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha sotāy. ca nirujjhittha, cakkhāy.
ca nirujjhati.
                              (1-3.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. nirujjhati, tassa tattha ghānāy.
nirujjhitthāti? Rūpāvacarā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cak-
khāy. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. nirujjhittha;
sacakkhukānaṃ kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cak-
khāy. ca nirujjhati, ghānāy. ca nirujjhittha. Yassa vā
pana yattha ghānāy. nirujjhittha, tassa tattha cakkhāy.
nirujjhatīti? Kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ
kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. nirujjhittha,
no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. nirujjhati; sacakkhukānaṃ
kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. ca niruj-
jhittha, cakkhāy. ca nirujjhati.
                              (1-6.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. nirujjhati, tassa tattha rūpāy.
nirujjhitthāti . . . (as in 1-2); pañcavokāraṃ1 uppaj-
jantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ asañña-
sattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ
tattha cakkhāy. nirujjhati; sacakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. ca nirujjhittha, cakkhāy. ca niruj-
jhati.
                              (1-11.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. nirujjhati, tassa tattha manāy.
nirujjhitthāti . . . (as in 1-2). Yassa vā pana yattha
manāy. nirujjhittha, tassa tattha cakkhāy. nirujjhatīti?
Pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ kāmāvacarā
cavantānaṃ arūpānaṃ2 tesaṃ tattha manāy. nirujjhittha,
no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. nirujjhati; sacakkhukānaṃ
cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. ca nirujjhittha, cakkhāy.
ca nirujjhati.
                              (1-12.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. nirujjhati, tassa tattha dham-
māy. nirujjhitthāti . . . (as in 1-2). Yassa vā pana
yattha dhammāy. nirujjhittha, tassa tattha cakkhāy. niruj-

1 S. substitutes kāmāvaca-.
2 S. substitutes asaññasattānaṃ.


[page 127]
                          Āyatanayamakaṃ                    127
jhatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ cavan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ
tattha cakkhāy. nirujjhati; sacakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. ca nirujjhittha, cakkhāy. ca niruj-
jhati.
                              (3-6.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. nirujjhati, tassa tattha rūpāy.
nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana yattha rūpāy.
{nirujjhittha}, tassa tattha ghānāy. nirujjhatīti? Kāmāva-
caraṃ uppajjantānaṃ aghānakānaṃ kāmāvacarā cavan-
tānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy nirujjhittha, no
ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. nirujjhati; saghānakānaṃ cavan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. ca nirujjhittha, ghānāy. ca
nirujjhati.
                              (3-11.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. nirujjhati, tassa tattha manāy.
nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana yattha manāy.
nirujjhittha, tassa tattha ghānāy. nirujjhatīti? Kāmāva-
caraṃ uppajjantānaṃ aghānakānaṃ kāmāvacarā cavan-
tānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy.
nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. nirujjhati;
saghānakānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. ca niruj-
jhittha, ghānāy. ca nirujjhati.
                              (3-12.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. nirujjhati, tassa tattha dhammāy.
nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy.
nirujjhittha, tassa tattha ghānāy. nirujjhatīti? Sabbesaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ aghānakānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
dhammāy. nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. niruj-
jhati; saghānakānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy.
ca nirujjhittha, ghānāy. ca nirujjhati.
                              (6-11.)
     Yassa yattha rūpāy. nirujjhati, tassa tattha manāy.
nirujjhitthāti? Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattā
cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 128]
128                      Āyatanayamakaṃ
tattha manāy. nirujjhittha; itaresaṃ pañcavokārā cavan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. ca nirujjhati, manāy. ca niruj-
jhittha. Yassa vā pana yattha manāy. nirujjhittha, tassa
tattha rūpāy. nirujjhatīti? Pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ
arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ
tattha rūpāy. nirujjhati; pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha manāy. ca nirujjhittha, rūpāy. ca nirujjhati.
                              (6-12.)
     Yassa yattha rūpāy. nirujjhati, tassa tattha dhammāy.
nirujjhitthāti . . . (as in 1-12).
                              (11-12.)
     Yassa yattha manāy. nirujjhati, tassa tattha dhammāy.
nirujjhitthāti . . . (as in 1-12).
                              (1-2.)
     8. i. Yassa cakkhāy. na nirujjhati, tassa sotāy. na niruj-
jhitthāti? Nirujjhittha. Yassa vā pana sotāy. na niruj-
jhittha, tassa cakkhāy. na nirujjhatīti? Natthi.
                            (1-3, etc.)
     Yassa cakkhāy. na nirujjhati, tassa ghānāy. . . .
pe . . . rūpāy. manāy. dhammāy. na nirujjhitthāti? Niruj-
jhittha. Yassa vā pana dhammāy. na nirujjhittha, tassa
{cakkhāy}. na nirujjhatīti? Natthi.
                             (3-6, etc.)
     Yassa ghānāy. . . . pe . . . rūpāy. manāy. na niruj-
jhati, tassa dhammāy. na nirujjhitthāti? Nirujjhittha.
Yassa vā pana dhammāy. na nirujjhittha, tassa manāy. na
nirujjhatīti? Natthi.
                              (1-2, etc.)
     ii. Yattha cakkhāy. . . . pe . . .
                                (1-2.)
     iii. Yassa yattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhati, tassa tattha
sotāy. na nirujjhitthāti? Pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 129]
                          Āyatanayamakaṃ                    129
acakkhukānaṃ kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha sotāy. na
nirujjhittha; suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ
arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. ca na nirujjhati, sotāy. ca
na nirujjhittha. Yassa vā pana yattha sotāy. na niruj-
jhittha, tassa tattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhatīti? Suddhāvāse
parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha sotāy. na nirujjhittha, no
ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. na1 nirujjhittha; suddhāvāsaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha sotāy.
ca na nirujjhittha, cakkhāy. ca na nirujjhati.
                              (1-3.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhati, tassa tattha
ghānāy. na nirujjhitthāti? Kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ
acakkhukānaṃ kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cak-
khāy. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. na
nirujjhittha; rūpāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ
. . . (as in 1-2). Yassa vā pana yattha ghānāy. na
nirujjhittha, tassa tattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhatīti? Rūpā-
vacarā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. na nirujjhittha,
no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhati; rūpāvacaraṃ
uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
ghānāy. ca na nirujjhittha, cakkhāy. ca na nirujjhati.
                              (1-6.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhati, tassa tattha rūpāy.
na nirujjhitthāti . . . (as in 1-2); suddhāvāsaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. ca na nirujjhati,
rūpāy. ca na nirujjhittha. Yassa vā pana yattha rūpāy.
. . . (as in 1-2).
                              (1-11.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhati, tassa tattha manāy.
na nirujjhitthāti . . . (as in 1-3, omitting arūpānaṃ after
asaññasattānaṃ).
                              (1-12.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhati, tassa tattha dham-
māy. na nirujjhitthāti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ acak-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. nirujjhati.


[page 130]
130                      Āyatanayamakaṃ
khukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhati,
no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. na nirujjhittha, suddhāvāsaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. ca na nirujjhati,
dhammāy. ca na nirujjhittha. Yassa vā pana yattha
dhammāy. na nirujjhittha, tassa tattha cakkhāy. na
nirujjhatīti? Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
dhammāy. na nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy.
na nirujjhati; suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
dhammāy. ca na nirujjhittha, cakkhāy. ca na nirujjhati.
                              (3-6.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. na nirujjhati, tassa tattha rūpāy.
na nirujjhitthāti? Kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ aghāna-
kānaṃ kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
ghānāy. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. na
nirujjhittha; suddhāvāsānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy.
ca na nirujjhati, rūpāy. ca na nirujjhittha. Yassa vā pana
yattha rūpāy. na nirujjhittha, tassa tattha ghānāy. na
nirujjhatīti? Āmantā.
                              (3-11.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. na nirujjhati, tassa tattha manāy.
na nirujjhitthāti? Kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ aghāna-
kānaṃ kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāva-
carānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha manāy. na nirujjhittha; suddhāvāsānaṃ asaññasat-
tānaṃ tesan tattha ghānāy. ca na nirujjhati, manāy. ca na
nirujjhittha. Yassa vā pana yattha manāy. na niruj-
jhittha, tassa tattha ghānāy. na nirujjhatīti? Āmantā.
                              (3-12.)
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. na nirujjhati, tassa tattha dham-
māy. na nirujjhitthāti . . . (as in 1-12); suddhāvāsānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. ca na nirujjhati, dhammāy. ca na
nirujjhittha. Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy. na niruj-
jhittha, tassa tattha ghānāy. na nirujjhatīti? Āmantā.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 131]
                          Āyatanayamakaṃ                    131
                              (6-11.)
     Yassa yattha rūpāy. na nirujjhati, tassa tattha manāy.
na nirujjhitthāti? Pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ arūpa-
kānaṃ1 cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. na nirujjhati,
no ca tesaṃ tattha manāy. na nirujjhittha; suddhāvāsaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
rūpāy. ca na nirujjhati, manāy. ca na nirujjhittha. Yassa
vā pana yattha manāy. na nirujjhittha, tassa tattha rūpāy.
na nirujjhatīti? Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ {asaññasattā}
cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. na nirujjhittha; no ca
tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. na nirujjhati; suddhāvāsaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesan tattha manāy.
ca na nirujjhittha, rūpāy. ca na nirujjhati.
                              (6-12.)
     Yassa yattha rūpāy. na nirujjhati, tassa tattha dham-
māy. na nirujjhitthāti . . . (as in 1-12).
                             (11-12.)
     Yassa yattha manāy. na nirujjhati, tassa tattha dham-
māy. na nirujjhitthāti . . . (as in 1-12).
     9. i. (1-2.) Yassa cakkhāy. nirujjhati, t. sotāy. nirujjhis-
satīti? Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ uppaj-
jitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ2 tesaṃ cakkhāy.
nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ sotāy. nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ sacak-
khukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. ca nirujjhati, sotāy.
ca nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana sotāy. nirujjhissati, tassa
cakkhāy. nirujjhatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ acakkhu-
kānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ sotāy. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ
cakkhāy. nirujjhati, sacakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ
sotāy. ca nirujjhissati, cakkhāy. ca nirujjhati.
     (1-3.) Yassa cakkhāy. nirujjhati, t. ghānāy. nirujjhissa-
tīti? Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ arū-
pāvacaraṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ
tesaṃ cakkhāy. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ ghānāy. nirujjhis

1 Br. arūpānaṃ.
2 S. and Br. substitute cavantānaṃ.

132                      Āyatanayamakaṃ
sati; itaresaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy.
ca nirujjhati, ghānāy. ca nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana
ghānāy. . . . pe . . .
     Yassa cakkhāy. nirujjhati, tassa rūpāy. nirujjhissatīti?

jhissati . . . (as in 1-3).

jhati, no ca tesaṃ rūpāy. nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ . . .

dhammāy. nirujjhissatīti? Kāmāvacare parinibbantānaṃ
tesaṃ ghānāy. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ dhammāy. niruj-
jhissati; itaresaṃ . . . (as in 1-2).

dhammāy. nirujjhissatīti? Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ
. . . (as in 1-2).

satīti? Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ manāy.
nirujjhati . . . (as in 1-2).

nirujjhissatīti? Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha sotāy. nirujjhissati;
itaresaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy.
ca nirujjhati, sotāy. ca nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana

1 Br. nirujjhissati.

                          Āyatanayamakaṃ                    133
kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha sotāy. nirujjhissati,
no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. nirujjhati; sacakkhukānaṃ
cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha sotāy. ca nirujjhissati, cakkhāy.
ca nirujjhati.
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. nirujjhati, tassa tattha ghānāy.
nirujjhissatīti? Kāmāvacare parinibbantānaṃ rūpāvacarā
cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha ghānāy. nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ
kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. ca niruj-
jhati, ghānāy. ca nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha1
ghānāy. . . . pe . . . (yathā paccuppannenātīte2 pi tividhaṃ
vitthāritaṃ evaṃ idam pi vitthāretabbaṃ).

nirujjhissatīti . . . (as in 1-2).

nirujjhissatīti . . . (as in 1-2).

māy. nirujjhissatīti . . . (as in 1-2, first question). Yassa
vā pana yattha dhammāy. nirujjhissati, tassa tattha
cakkhāy. nirujjhatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ acakkhu-
kānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. nirujjhissati,
no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. nirujjhissati3; sacakkhukānaṃ
cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. ca nirujjhissati, cak-
khāy. ca nirujjhati.
     (3-6.) Yassa yattha ghānāy. nirujjhati, t. t. rūpāy.
nirujjhissatīti? Kāmāvacare parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
ghānāy. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. nirujjhissati;
itaresaṃ saghānakānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy.
ca nirujjhati, rūpāy. ca nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana
yattha rūpāy. . . . pe . . .
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. nirujjhati, tassa tattha manāy.
. . . pe . . . dhammāy. nirujjhissatīti . . . (as in 3-6).
     Yassa yattha rūpāy. nirujjhati, tassa tattha manāy.

134                      Āyatanayamakaṃ
nirujjhissatīti? Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattā
cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha manāy. nirujjhissati, itaresaṃ pañcavokārā cavan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. ca nirujjhati, manāy. ca niruj-
jhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha manāy. . . . pe . . .
     (6-12.) Yassa yattha rūpāy. nirujjhati, t. t. dhammāy.
nirujjhissatīti? Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
rūpāy. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. niruj-
jhissati; itaresaṃ sarūpakānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
rūpāy. ca nirujjhati, dhammāy. ca nirujjhissati. Yassa
vā pana yattha dhammāy. nirujjhissati, tassa tattha
rūpāy. nirujjhatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ arūpakānaṃ
cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. nirujjhissati, no ca
tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. nirujjhati; sarūpakānaṃ cavantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. ca nirujjhissati, rūpāy. ca niruj-
jhati.
     Yassa yattha manāy. nirujjhati, tassa tattha dhammāy.
nirujjhissatīti? Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ . . . (as
in6-12).
     10. i. Yassa cakkhāy. na nirujjhati, tassa sotāy. na
nirujjhissatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ
cavantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ
sotāy. na nirujjhissati; arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ
cakkhāy. ca na nirujjhati, sotāy. ca na nirujjhissati.
Yassa vā pana sotāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa cakkhāy. na
nirujjhatīti? Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ
uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ sotāy.
na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāy. na nirujjhati;
arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ sotāy. ca nirujjhissati,
cakkhāy. ca na nirujjhati.
     Yassa {cakkhāy}. na nirujjhati, tassa ghānāy. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ cavan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ ghānāy.
na nirujjhissati; pacchimabhavikānaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. ca
na nirujjhati, ghānāy. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 135]
                          Āyatanayamakaṃ                    135
ghānāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa cakkhāy. na nirujjhatīti?
Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ1 uppaj-
jitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ ghānāy.
na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāy. na nirujjhati;
pacchimabhavikānaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ arūpe
pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ ghānāy. ca na nirujjhissati,
cakkhāy. ca na nirujjhati.
     Yassa cakkhāy. na nirujjhati, tassa rūpāy. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ cavan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ rūpāy.
na nirujjhissati; arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ cak-
khāy. ca na nirujjhati, rūpāy. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa
vā pana rūpāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa cakkhāy. na niruj-
jhatīti? Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ
uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpāy.
na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāy. na nirujjhati;
arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ rūpāy. ca na nirujjhissati,
cakkhāy. ca na nirujjhati.
     (1-11.) Yassa cakkhāy. na nirujjhati, t. manāy. . . . pe
. . . dhammāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
acakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. na nirujjhati,
no ca tesaṃ dhammāy. na nirujjhissati; arūpe parinib-
bantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. ca na nirujjhati, dhammāy.2 ca
na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana dhammāy. na nirujjhis-
sati, tassa cakkhāy. na nirujjhatīti? Pañcavokāre pari-
nibbantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāy. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ
cakkhāy. na nirujjhati; arūpe parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ
dhammāy. ca na nirujjhissati, cakkhāy. ca na nirujjhati.
     Yassa ghānāy. na nirujjhati, tassa rūpāy. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ aghānakānaṃ cavan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ ghānāy. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ rūpāy. na
nirujjhissati; rūpāvacare parinibbantānaṃ arūpe pacchima-
bhavikānaṃ tesaṃ ghānāy. ca na nirujjhati, rūpāy. ca na
nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana rūpāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa

1 Br. inserts arūpāvacaraṃ.
2 S. substitutes manāyatanañ.


[page 136]
136                      Āyatanayamakaṃ
ghānāy. na nirujjhatīti? Kāmāvacare parinibbantānaṃ
ye ca arūpaṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ cavan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ rūpāy. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ ghānāy.
na nirujjhati; rūpāvacare parinibbantānaṃ arūpe pacchima-
bhavikānaṃ tesaṃ rūpāy. ca na nirujjhissati, ghānāy. ca
na nirujjhati.
     Yassa ghānāy. na nirujjhati, tassa manāy. . . . pe . . .
dhammāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
aghānakānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ ghānāy. na nirujjhati, no
ca tesaṃ dhammāy. na nirujjhissati; rūpāvacare arūpāva-
care parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ ghānāy. ca na nirujjhati,
dhammāy. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana dhammāy.
na nirujjhissati, tassa ghānāy. na nirujjhatīti? Kāmā-
vacare parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāy. na nirujjhissati,
no ca tesaṃ ghānāy. na nirujjhati; rūpāvacare arūpāvacare
parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāy. ca na nirujjhissati,
ghānāy. ca na nirujjhati.
     Yassa rūpāy. na nirujjhati, tassa manāy. . . . pe . . .
dhammāy. na nirujjhissatīti . . . (as in 1-11, etc.).
     Yassa manāy. na nirujjhati, tassa dhammāy. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana dhammāy. na
nirujjhissati, tassa manāy. na nirujjhatīti? Nirujjhati.
     ii. Yattha cakkhāy. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Yassa yattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhati, tassa tattha
sotāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ
acakkhukānaṃ kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha sotāy. na
nirujjhissati; asaññasattānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. ca na nirujjhati, sotāy. ca na nirujjhissati.
Yassa vā pana yattha sotāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha
cakkhāy. na nirujjhatīti? Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ
tesaṃ tassa sotāy. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. na nirujjhati; asaññasattānaṃ1 tesaṃ tattha
sotāy. ca na nirujjhissati. cakkhāy. ca nirujjhati.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. and Br. insert arūpānaṃ.


[page 137]
                          Āyatanayamakaṃ                    137
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhati, tassa tattha
ghānāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ
acakkhukānaṃ kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. na
nirujjhissati; rūpāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ1
tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. ca nirujjhati, ghānāy. ca na niruj-
jhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha ghānāy. na nirujjhissati,
tassa tattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhatīti? Kāmāvacare
parinibbantānaṃ rūpāvacarā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
ghānāy. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. na
nirujjhati; rūpāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ
arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. ca na nirujjhissati, cakkhāy.
ca na nirujjhati.
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhati, tessa tattha
rūpāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ
acakkhukānaṃ kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
rūpāy. na nirujjhissati; arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. ca
na nirujjhati rūpāy. ca nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana
yattha rūpāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha cakkhāy. na
nirujjhatīti? Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
rūpāy. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. na
nirujjhati; arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. ca na nirujjhis-
sati, cakkhāy. ca na nirujjhati.
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhati, tassa tattha
manāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ
acakkhukānaṃ kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāy.
na nirujjhissati; arūpe parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. ca na nirujjhati, manāy. ca na niruj-
jhissati, Yassa vā pana yattha manāy. na nirujjhissati,
tassa tattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhatīti? Pañcavokāre pari-
nibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. na nirujjhissati, no ca
tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhati; arūpe parinibban-
tānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. ca na nirujjhis-
sati, cakkhāy. ca na nirujjhati.

1 Br. inserts arūpānaṃ


[page 138]
138                      Āyatanayamakaṃ
     (1-12.) Yassa yattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhati, t. t.
dhammāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
acakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. na
nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. na nirujjhissati;
arūpe parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. ca na niruj-
jhati, dhammāy. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha
dhammāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha cakkhāy. na
nirujjhatīti? Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
dhammāy. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. na
nirujjhati; arūpe parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy.
ca na nirujjhissati, cakkhāy. ca na nirujjhati.
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. na nirujjhati, tassa tattah rūpāy.
na nirujjhissatīti? Kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ aghāna-
kānaṃ kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
ghānāy. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. na niruj-
jhissati; rūpāvacare parinibbantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
ghānāy. ca na nirujjhati, rūpāy. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa
vā pana yattha rūpāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha ghānāy.
na nirujjhatīti? Kāmāvacare parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
rūpāy. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. na
nirujjhati; rūpāvacare parinibbantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha rūpāy. ca na nirujjhissati, ghānāy. ca na nirujjhati.
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. na nirujjhati, tassa tattha manāy.
na nirujjhissatīti? Kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ aghāna-
kānaṃ kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāva-
caranaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha manāy. na nirujjhissati; rūpāvacare arūpāvacare
parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesan tattha ghānāy. ca
na nirujjhati, manāy. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana
yattha manāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha ghānāy. na
nirujjhatīti? Kāmāvacare parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
manāy. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāy.
na nirujjhati; rūpāvacare arūpāvacare parinibbantānaṃ
asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. ca na nirujjhissati,
ghānāy. ca na nirujjhati.

ca na nirujjhissati, rūpāy, na nirujjhati.

māy. na nirujjhissatīti? Nirujjhissati. Yattha vā pana
yattha dhammāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha manāy. na
nirujjhatīti? Nirujjhati.

mabhavikānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti,

     ii. Yattha cakkhāy. . . . pe . . .
     iii. (1-2.) Yassa yattha cakkhāy. nirujjhittha, t. t.
sotāy. nirujjhissatīti? Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha cakkhāy. nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha sotāy.
nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy.
ca nirujjhittha, sotāy. ca nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha
sotāy. nirujjhissati, tassa tattha cakkhāy. nirujjhitthāti?

jhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. nirujjhittha; itaresaṃ
pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha sotāy. ca nirujjhissati, cak-
khāy. ca nirujjhittha.

nirujjhissatīti? Kāmāvacare parinibbantānaṃ rūpāvaca-
rānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ
tattha ghānāy. nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. ca nirujjhittha, ghānāy. ca niruj-
jhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha ghānāy. nirujjhissati, tassa
tattha cakkhāy. nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā.

rūpāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ

     (1-11). Yassa yattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhittha, t. t.
manāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhittha, no ca
tesaṃ tattha manāy. na nirujjhissati; suddhāvāse parinib-
bantānaṃ arūpe parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ

jhissati, Yassa vā pana yattha manāy. na nirujjhissati,
tassa tattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhitthāti? Pañcavokāre
parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. na nirujjhissati, no
ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhittha; suddhāvāse
parinibbantānaṃ arūpe parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha manāy. ca na nirujjhissati, cakkhāy. ca na
nirujjhittha.
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. na nirujjhittha, tassa tattha
dhammāy, na nirujjhissatīti? Suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
asaññasattānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. na niruj-
jhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. na nirujjhissati;
suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ1 tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. ca na
nirujjhittha, dhammāy. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā
pana yattha dhammāy. . . . (as in 1-11, omitting asañ-
ñasattānaṃ).
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. na nirujjhittha, tassa tattha
rūpāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
ghānāy. na nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. na
nirujjhissati; rūpāvacare parinibbantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha ghānāy. ca na nirujjhittha, rūpāy. ca na niruj-
jhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha rūpāy. na nirujjhissati,
tassa tattha ghānāy. na nirujjhitthāti? Kāmāvacare pari-
nibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. na nirujjhissati, no ca
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. inserts arūpe parinibbantānaṃ.


[page 145]
                      Āyatanayamakaṃ                       145
tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. na nirujjhittha; rūpāvacare parinib-
bantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. ca na nirujjhissati,
ghānāy. ca nirujjhittha.
     (3-11.) Yassa yattha ghānāy. na nirujjhittha, t. t.
manāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāva-
carānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. na nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ
tattha manāy. na nirujjhissati; rūpāvacare arūpāvacare
parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. ca
na nirujjhittha, manāy. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā
pana yattha manāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha ghānāy.
na nirujhitthāti? Kāmāvacare parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha manāy. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāy.
na nirujjhittha; rūpāvacare arūpāvacare parinibbantānaṃ
asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. ca na nirujjhissati,
ghānāy. ca na nirujjhittha.

dhammāy. na nirujjhissatīti . . . (as in 3-11, omitting
asaññasattānaṃ both times).

na nirujjhissatīti? Suddhāvāsan . . . (as in 1-11, omitting

jhissati, t. t. rūpāy. na nirujjhitthāti Pañcavokāre parinib-

māy. na nirujjhissatīti? Suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ . . .

tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. na nirujjhissati; suddhāvāse parinib-

[page 146]
146                       Āyatanayamakaṃ
bantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. ca na nirujjhittha, dhammāy.
ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy.
na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha manāy. na nirujjhitthāti?1
Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. na nirujjhissati,
no ca tesaṃ tattha manāy. na nirujjhittha; suddhāvāse
parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. ca na nirujjhissati,
manāy. ca na nirujjhittha.
                  NIRODHAVĀRAṂ NIṬṬHITAṂ.
                   [Uppāda-nirodha-vāro. ]
     1 i. Yassa cakkhāy. uppajjati, tassa sotāy. nirujjhatīti?
No. Yassa vā pana sotāy. nirujjhati, tassa cakkhāy.
uppajjatīti? No . . . pe . . .2
     Yassa manāy. uppajjati, tassa dhammāy. nirujjhatīti?
No. Yassa vā pana dhammāy. nirujjhati, tassa manāy.
uppajjatīti? No.
     ii. Yattha cakkhāy . . . pe . . . (yatthakaṃ no ti3
kātabbaṃ. Yatthakaṃ itaresaṃ yatthakānaṃ sadisaṃ kātabbaṃ,
yatthakaṃ tisu4 vāresu sadisaṃ).
     iii. Yassa yattha cakkhāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha sotāy.
nirujjhatīti? No. Yassa vā pana5* yattha sotāy. niruj-
jhati, tassa tattha cakkhāy. uppajjatīti? No . . .*
pe . . .
     Yassa yattha manāy. uppajjati, tassa tattha dhammāy.
nirujjhatīti? No. Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāy. niruj-
jhati, tassa tattha manāy. uppajjatīti? No.

     rūpāyatanaṃ, manāyatanaṃ,dhammāyatanaṃ nirujjhatīti? No.
     Yassa vā pana dhammāyatanaṃ nirujjhati, tassa cakkhāyatanaṃ

     2. i. (1-2) Yassa cakkhāy. nuppajjati, t. sotāy. na niruj-

jantānaṃ asotakānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. ca nuppaj-
jati, sotāy. ca na nirujjhati. Yassa vā pana sotāy. nā

kānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ sotāy. ca na nirujjhati, cakkhāy.
ca nuppajjati.

cavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ uppajjitvā parinib-
bāyissanti, tesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ sotāy. nirujjhissati,
no ca tesaṃ cakkhāy. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ sotāy. ca
nirujjhissati, cakkhāy. ca uppajjissati.

satīti? Ye rūpāvacaraṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ

ghānāy. nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ6 cakkhāy. ca uppajjissati,

     6. i. (1-2.) Yassa cakkhāy. nuppajjissati, t. sotāy. na
nirujjhissatīti? Pacchimabhāvikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ
sotāy. na nirujjhissati; pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpe
pacchimabhavikānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ uppajjitvā parinib-
bāyissanti, tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. ca nuppaj-
jissati, sotāy. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana sotāy. na
nirujjhissati, tassa cakkhāy. nuppajjissatīti? Āmantā.
     Yassa cakkhāy. nuppajjissati, tassa ghānāy. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjan-
tānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ
ghānāy. na nirujjhissati; kāmāvacare parinibbantānaṃ
rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ
uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesan cavantānaṃ tesaṃ cak-
khāy. ca ṇuppajjissati, ghānāy. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa
vā pana ghānāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa cakkhāy. nuppaj-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 153]

jissatīti? Ye1 rūpāvacaraṃ2 uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti,

154                      Āyatanayamakaṃ
     Yassa manāy. nuppajjissati, tassa dhammāy. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
manāy. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ dhammāy. na niruj-
jhissati; parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ manāy. ca nuppajjissati,
dhammāy. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana dhammāy.
na nirujjhissati, tassa manāy. nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.

sotāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavo-
kāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjissati,
no ca tesaṃ tattha sotāy. na nirujjhissati; pañcavokāre
parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cakkhāy. ca nuppajjissati, sotāy. ca na nirujjhissati; yassa
vā pana yattha sotāy. . . . pe . . .

na nirujjhissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ

tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. na nirujjhissati; kāmāvacare parinib-
bantānaṃ rūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ
arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. ca nuppajjissati, ghānāy.
ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha ghānāy. na
nirujjhissati, tassa tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjissatīti? Rūpā-
vacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. na nirujjhissati, no ca
tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjissati; kāmāvacare parinib-
bantānaṃ rūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ
arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. ca na nirujjhissati, cakkhāy.
ca nuppajjissati.

na nirujjhissatīti . . . (as in 1-2, adding asaññasattānaṃ
after uppajjantānaṃ, omitting it after parinibbantānaṃ).

na nirujjhissatīti . . . (as in 1-2, omitting pañcavokāre).

na nirujjhissatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ up-
pajjantānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. nuppaj-

tesaṃ sotāy. ca nirujjhittha, cakkhāy. ca uppajjati. (Yathā

na nirujjhissaīti? Kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ
kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. nup-
pajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. na nirujjhissati; kāmā-
vacare parinibbantānaṃ rūpāvacarā cavantānaṃ asaññasat-
tānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. ca nuppajjati,
ghānāy. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha ghānāy.
na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjatīti?

jhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. nuppajjati; kāmāvacare
parinibbantānaṃ rūpāvacarā cavantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ
arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. ca na nirujjhissati, cakkhāy.
ca nuppajjati.
