[page 161]
                          Āyatanayamakaṃ                    161
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. ca nuppajjati, tassa tattha rūpāy.
na nirujjhissatīti . . . (as in 1-2, adding asaññasattānaṃ,
after kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ, omitting it before arū-
pānaṃ.)
     Yassa yattha cakkhāy. nuppajjati, tassa tattha manāy. na
nirujjhissatīti . . . (as in 1-2, inserting arūpānaṃ after
kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ, omitting it in following clause,
omitting too pañcavokāre).
     (1-12.) Yassa yattha cakkhāy. nuppajjati, tassa tattha
dhammāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ
acakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. nup-
pajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāy. na nirujjhissati;
parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāy. ca nuppajjati,
dhammāy. ca na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha
dhammāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha cakkhāy. nuppaj-
jatīti? Āmantā.
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. nuppajjati, tassa tattha rūpāy.
na nirujjhissatīti? Kamāvacarā cavantānaṃ aghānakānaṃ
kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
ghānāy. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. na niruj-
jhissati; pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha ghānāy. ca nuppajjati, rūpāy. ca na nirujjhissati.
Yassa vā pana yattha rūpāy. na nirujjhissati, tassa tattha
ghānāy. nuppajjatīti? Āmantā.
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. nuppajjati, tassa tattha manāy.
na nirujjhissatīti? Kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ aghāna-
kānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ uppajjantānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpā-
vacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha manāy. na nirujjhissati; parinibbantānaṃ asaññasat-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāy. ca nuppajjati, manāy. ca na
nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha manāy. na nirujjhis-
sati, tassa tattha ghānāy. nuppajjatīti? Āmantā.
     Yassa yattha ghānāy. nuppajjati, tassa tattha dhammāy.
na nirujjhissatīti . . . (as in 1-12).
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 162]
162                      Āyatanayamakaṃ
     (6-11). Yassa yattha rūpāy. nuppajjati, tassa tattha
manāy. na nirujjhissatīti? Pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ
arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
manāy. na nirujjhissati; parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattā
cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. ca nuppajjati, manāy. ca
na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yattha manāy. na niruj-
jhissati, tassa tattha rūpāy. uppajjatīti? Asaññasattaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. na nirujjhissati, no ca
tesaṃ tattha rūpāy. nuppajjati; parinibbantānaṃ asañña-
sattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāy. ca na nirujjhissati,
rūpāy. ca nuppajjati.
     Yassa yattha rūpāy. nuppajjati, tassa tattha dhammāy.
na nirujjhissatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ arūpakānaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha . . . (as in 6-11, omitting
asaññasattā cavantānaṃ).
     Yassa yattha manāy. nuppajjati, tassa tattha dhammāy.
na nirujjhissatīti . . . (as in 6-11).
     11 i. Yassa cakkhāy. uppajjittha, tassa sotāy. niruj-
jhissatīti? Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpe pac-
chimabhavikānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāy-
issanti, tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāy. uppajjittha, no ca
tesaṃ sotāy. nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ1 cakkhāy. ca uppaj-
jittha, sotāy. ca nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana sotāy.
nirujjhissati, tassa cakkhāy. uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
(Yathā Nirodhavāre atītenānāgatā2 pucchā yassakaṃ3 pi
yatthakaṃ pi yassa-yatthakaṃ pi anulomaṃ pi paccaniyaṃ4
pi cibhattā, ecaṃ5 Uppādanirodhe pi atītenānāyatā2 pucchā
cibhajitabbā).
                      UPPĀDANIRODHAVĀRAṂ NIṬṬHITAṂ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. inserts tesaṃ.
2 Br. atitānāgatā.
3 Br. yassakam pi, etc.
4 Br. paccanīyam pi.
5 S. substitutes yeva.


[page 163]
                          Āyatanayamakaṃ                    163
                           [Pariññāvāro. ]
     1. Yo cakkhāy. parijānāti, so sotāy. parijānātīti?
Āmantā. Yo vā pana sotāy. parijānāti, so cakkhāy. pari-
jānātīti? Āmantā.
     2. Yo cakkhāy. na parijānāti, so sotāy. na parijānātīti?
Āmantā. Yo vā pana sotāy. na parijānāti, so cakkhāy. na
parijānāti? Āmantā.
     3. Yo cakkhāy. parijānittha, so sotāy. parijānitthāti?
Āmantā. Yo vā . . . pe . . .1
     4. Yo cakkhāy. na parijānittha, so sotāy. na parijān-
itthāti? Āmantā. Yo vā . . .
     5. Yo cakkhāy. parijānissati, so sotāy. parijānissatīti?
Āmantā. Yo vā . . .
     6. Yo cakkhāy. na parijānissati, so sotāy. na parijān-
issatīti? Āmantā. Yo vā . . .
     7. Yo cakkhāy. parijānāti, so sotāy. parijānitthāti? No.
Yo vā . . . parijānātīti? No
     8. Yo cakkhāy. na parijānāti, so sotāy. na parijānitthāti?
Arahā cakkhāy. na parijānāti, no ca sotāy. na parijānittha;
aggamaggasamaṅgiñ ca arahantañ ca ṭhapetvā avasesā
puggalā cakkhāy. ca na parijānanti, sotāy. ca na parijā-
nittha. Yo vā pana sotāy. na parijānittha, so cakkhāy. na
parijānātīti? Aggamaggasamaṅgī sotāy. na parijānittha,
na ca cakkhāy. na parijānāti; aggamaggasamaṅgiñ ca
arahantañ ca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā sotāy. ca na
parijānittha, cakkhāy. ca na parijānanti.
     9. Yo cakkhāy. parijānāti, so sotāy. parijānissatīti? No
Yo vā . . . parijānātīti? No.
     10. Yo cakkhāy. na parijānāti, so sotāy. na parijānis-
satīti? Ye maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti, te cakkhāy. na pari-
jānanti, no ca sotāy. na parijānissanti; arahā ye ca puthuj-
janā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti, te cakkhāy. ca na pari-
jānanti, sotāy. ca na parijānissanti. Yo vā . . ṇa pari-
jānātīti? Aggamaggasamaṅgī sotāy. na parijānissati, no
ca cakkhāy. na parijānāti; arahā ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Converse question as above; same reply.


[page 164]
164                      Āyatanayamakaṃ
na paṭilabhissanti, te sotāy. ca na parijānissanti, cakkhāy.
ca na parijānanti.
     11. Yo cakkhāy. parijānittha, so sotāy. parijānissatīti?
No. Yo vā . . . parijānitthāti? No.
     12. Yo cakkhāy. na parijānittha, so sotāy. na parijānis-
satīti? Ye maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti, te cakkhāy. na pari-
jānittha, no ca sotāy. na parijānissanti; aggamaggasamaṅgī
ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti, te cakkhāy.
ca na parijānittha, sotāy. ca na parijānissanti. Yo vā . . .
na parijānitthāti? Arahā sotāy. na parijānissati, no ca
cakkhāy. na parijānittha; aggamaggasamaṅgī ye ca
puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti, te sotāy. ca na
parijānissanti, cakkhāy. ca na parijānittha.
                        PARIÑÑĀVĀRAṂ NIṬṬHITAṂ.
                       ĀYATANAYAMAKAṂ NIṬṬHITAṂ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 165]
                                 165
                                 IV.
                             DHĀTUYAMAKAṂ.1
                           Aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo:
     1. cakkhudhātu.                         6. rūpadhātu.
     2. sotadhātu.                           7. saddadhātu.
     3. ghānadhātu.                          8. gandhadhātu.
     4. jivhādhātu.                          9. rasadhātu.
     5. kāyadhātu.                           10. phoṭṭhabbadhātu.
     11. cakkhuviññāṇadhātu.                 15. kāyaviññāṇadhātu.
     12. sotaviññāṇadhātu.                   16. manodhātu.
     13. ghānaviññāṇadhātu.                  17. manoviññāṇadhātu.
     14. jivhāviññāṇadhātu.                  18. dhammadhātu.
     Cakkhu2 cakkhudhātu, cakkhudhātu cakkhu; sotaṃ
sotādhātu, sotadhātu sotaṃ . . . pe . . .
     Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātu, cakkhuviññāṇa-
dhātu {cakkhuviññāṇaṃ}; . . . pe . . .
     Mano manodhātu, manodhātu mano; manoviññāṇaṃ
manoviññāṇadhātu, manoviññāṇadhātu manoviññaṇaṃ;
dhammo dhammadhātu, dhammadhātu dhammo.
     Na cakkhu na cakkhudhātu, na cakkhudhātu na cakkhu;
na sotaṃ na sotadhātu, na sotadhātu na sotaṃ . . . pe . . .
     Na cakkhuviññāṇaṃ na cakkhuviññāṇadhātu, na cakkhu-
viññāṇadhātu na cakkhuviññāṇaṃ; . . . pe . . .
     Na mano na manodhātu, na manodhātu na mano; na
manoviññāṇaṃ na manoviññāṇadhātu, . . . na manoviñ-
ñāṇaṃ; na dhammo na dhammadhātu, . . . na dhammo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. inserts here Namo tassa, etc.
2 K. and S. cakkhuṃ always.


[page 166]
166                      Dhātuyamakaṃ
     Cakkhu cakkhudhātu, dhātū sotādhātu . . . pe . . .
cakkhu cakkhudhātu, dhātū dhammadhātu. (Yathā
Āyatanayamake cakkaṃ bandhitaṃ, cvaṃ idha cakkaṃ
bandhitabbaṃ.)
     Na cakkhu na cakkhudhātu, na dhātū1 na sotadhātu;
na cakkhu na cakkhudhātu, na {dhātū} na ghānadhātu;
. . . pe . . . *na cakkhu na cakkhudhātu, na dhātū*2 na
dhammadhātu . . . pe . . . na dhammo na dhammadhātu,
na dhātū na cakkhudhātu; . . . pe . . . *na dhammo na
dhammadhātu,*2 na dhātū an manoviññāṇadhātu. (cakkaṃ
bandhitabbaṃ.)
     Cakkhu dhātu, dhātū cakkhu; sotaṃ3 . . . pe . . .
ghānaṃ4 jivhā4 kāyo4 rūpaṃ4 saddo4 gandho raso phoṭ-
ṭhabbo cakkhuviññāṇaṃ5 sotaviññāṇaṃ6 ghānaviññāṇaṃ
jivhāviññāṇaṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ mano dhātu, dhātū mano;
manoviññāṇaṃ dhātu, dhātū manoviññāṇaṃ; dhammo
dhātu, dhātū dhammo.
     Na cakkhu na dhātu, na dhātū na cakkhu; na sotaṃ
. . . pe7 . . . na ghānaṃ na jivhā na kāyo na rūpaṃ na
saddo na gandho na raso na phoṭṭhabbo na cakkhuviñ-
ñāṇaṃ8 na sotaviññāṇaṃ na ghānaviññāṇaṃ na jivhāviñ-
ñāṇaṃ na kāyaviññāṇaṃ9 na mano na dhātu, na dhātū na
mano; na manoviññāṇaṃ na dhātu, na dhātū na mano-
viññāṇaṃ; na dhammo na dhātu, na dhātū na dhammo.
     Cakkhu dhātu, dhātū sotaṃ; . . . pe . . . cakkhu
dhātu, dhātū dhammo, . . . pe . . . dhammo dhātu, dhātū
cakkhuṃ; . . . pe . . . *dhammo dhātu,*2 dhātū mano-
viññāṇaṃ. (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ.)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. has dhātu always.
2 Br. omits * to *
3 Br. omits pe and inserts dhātu, dhātu sotaṃ.
4 S. and Br. insert dhātū, dhātu respectively.
5 Br. inserts dhātu, dhātu cakkhuviññāṇaṃ.
6 Br. inserts dhātu, {dhātu} sotaviññāṇaṃ.
7 Br. omits pe and inserts na dhātu, na dhātu na sotaṃ.
8 Br. inserts na dhātu, na dhātu na cakkhuviññāṇaṃ.
9 Br. inserts na dhātu, na dhātu na kāyaviññāṇaṃ.


[page 167]
                          Dhātuyamakaṃ                      167
     Na cakkhu na dhātu, na dhātū na sotaṃ; . . . pe . . .
na cakkhu na dhātu,1 na dhātū na dhammo . . . pe . . .
na dhammo na dhātu, na dhātū na cakkhu; . . . pe *. . . .
na dhammo na dhātu,*2 na dhātū na mānoviññāṇaṃ.
(cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ.)
                        UDDESAVĀRAṂ NIṬṬHITAṂ.3
                            [Paṇṇattivāro. ]
     Cakkhu cakkhudhātūti? Dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu
cakkhu, na {cakkhudhātu}; cakkhudhātu cakkhu ceva
cakkhudhātu ca. Cakkhudhātu cakkhūti? Āmantā.
     Sotaṃ sotadhātūti? Dibbasotaṃ taṇhāsotaṃ sotaṃ na
sotadhātu; sotadhātu sotañ ceva sotadhātu ca. Sotadhātu
sotan ti? Āmantā.
     Ghānaṃ ghānadhātūti? Āmantā. Ghānadhātu ghānanti?
Āmantā. (Jivhā pi ghānadhātusadisā.)
     Kāyo kāyadhātūti? Kāyadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso kāyo
kāyo, na kāyadhātu; kāyadhātu kāyo ceva kāyadhātu ca.
Kāyadhātu kāyo ti? Āmantā.
     Rūpaṃ rūpadhātūti? Rūpadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ
rūpaṃ rūpaṃ,3 na rūpadhātu; rūpadhātu rūpañ ceva
rūpadhātu ca. Rūpadhātu rūpan ti? Āmantā. (Saddo
ghānasadiso.)
     Gandho gandhadhātūti? Sīlagandho samādhigandho
paññāgandho gandho, na gandhadhātu; gandhadhātu
gandho ceva gandhadhātu ca. Gandhadhātu gandho ti?
Āmantā.
     Raso rasadhātūti? Attharaso dhammaraso vimuttiraso
raso, na rasadhātu; rasadhātu raso ceva rasadhātu ca.
Rasadhātu raso ti? Āmantā. (Phoṭṭhabbo ghānasadiso.)
     CAkkhuviññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātūti? Āmantā.
Cakkhuviññāṇadhātu cakkhuviññāṇan ti? Āmantā.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. inserts na dhātu na ghānaṃ.
2 Br. omits * to *
3 Br. omits.


[page 168]
168                      Dhātuyamakaṃ
     Sotaviññāṇaṃ . . . pe . . . ghānaviññāṇaṃ jivhāviñ-
ñāṇaṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ mano manodhātū ti? Manodhātuṃ
ṭhapetvā avaseso mano1 mano, na manodhātu; manodhātu
mano ceva manodhātu ca. Manodhātu mano ti? Āmantā.
Manoviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇadhātūti? Āmantā. Mano-
viññāṇadhātu manoviññāṇan ti? Āmantā.
     Dhammo dhammadhātūti? Dhammadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā
avaseso dhammo1 dhammo, na dhammadhātu; dhamma-
dhātu dhammo ceva dhammadhātu ca. Dhammadhātu
dhammo ti? Āmantā.
     Na cakkhu na cakkhudhātūti? Āmantā. Na cakkhu-
dhātu na cakkhūti? Dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu na cak-
khudhātu, cakkhu; cakkhuñ2 ca cakkhudhātuñ ca ṭhapetvā
avasesā3 na ceva cakkhu na ca cakkhudhātu.
     Na sotaṃ na sotadhātūti? Āmantā. Na sotadhātu na
sotan ti? Dibbasotaṃ taṇhāsotaṃ na sotadhātu, sotaṃ;
sotañ ca sotadhātuñ ca ṭhapetvā avasesā3 na ceva sotaṃ na
ca sotadhātu.
     Na ghānaṃ na ghānadhātūti? Āmantā. Na ghāna-
dhātu na ghānan ti? Āmantā.
     (Yaṃ1 saṅkhittaṃ, ubhato āmantā.) Na jivhā . . . pe . . .
na kāyo na kāyadhātūti? Āmantā. Na kāyadhātu na
kāyo ti? Kāyadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso kāyo1 na kāya-
dhātu, kāyo; kāyañ ca kāyadhātuñ ca ṭhapetvā avasesā4 na
ceva kāyo na ca kāyadhātu.
     Na rūpaṃ na rūpadhātūti? Āmantā. Na rūpadhātu
na rūpan ti? Rūpadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ rūpaṃ1 na
rūpadhātu, rūpaṃ; rūpañ ca rūpadhātuñ ca ṭhapetvā
āvasesā3 na ceva rūpaṃ na ca rūpadhātu.
     Na saddo . . . pe . . . na gandho na gandhadhātūti?
Āmantā.
     Na gandhadhātu na gandho ti? Sīlagandho samādhi-
gandho paññāgandho na gandhadhātu, gandho; gandhañ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. omits.
2 Br. cakkhuṃ.
3 Br. avasesaṃ.
4 Br. avaseso.


[page 169]
                          Dhātuyamakaṃ                      169
ca gandhadhātuñ ca ṭhapetvā avasesā1 na ceva gandho na
ca gandhadhātu.
     Na raso na rasadhātūti? Āmantā. Na rasadhātu na
raso ti? Attharaso dhammaraso vimuttiraso na rasa-
dhātu, raso; rasaṃ ca rasadhātuñ ca ṭhapetvā avasesā1 na
ceva raso na ca rasadhātu.
     Na phoṭṭhabbo . . . pe . . . na cakkhuviññāṇaṃ2 na
sotaviññāṇaṃ na ghānaviññāṇaṃ na jivhāviññāṇaṃ na
kāyaviññāṇaṃ na mano na manodhātūti? Āmantā. Na
manodhātu na mano ti? Manodhātuṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso
mano3 na manodhātu, mano; manañ ca manodhātuñ ca
ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva mano na ca manodhātu. Na
manoviññāṇaṃ na manoviññāṇadhātūti? Āmantā.
     Na manoviññāṇadhātu na manoviññāṇan ti? Āmantā.
     Na dhammo na dhammadhātūti? Āmantā. Na dham-
madhātu na dhammo ti? Dhammadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā
avaseso dhammo3 na dhammadhātu, dhammo; dhammañ
ca dhammadhātuñ ca ṭhapetvā avasesā1 na ceva dhammo
na ca dhammadhātu.
     Cakkhu cakkhudhātūti? Dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu
cakkhu, na cakkhudhātu; cakkhudhātu cakkhu ceva
cakkhudhātu ca.
     Dhātū sotadhātūti? Sotadhātu dhātu ceva sotadhātu
ca, avasesā dhātū3 dhātū,5 na sotadhātu . . . pe4 . . . dhātū
dhammadhātūti? Dhammadhātu dhātu ceva dhamma-
dhātu ca, avasesā dhātū3 dhātū,5 na dhammadhātu. (yathā
Āyatanayamake paṇṇatti, evaṃ Dhātuyamake pi paṇṇatti.
CAkkhaṃ bandhitabbaṃ.)
     Na cakkhu na cakkhudhātūti? Āmantā. Na dhātū5
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. avaseso.
2 Br. inserts na cakkhuviññāṇadhātūti? Āmantā. Na cakkhuviññāṇadhātu
     na cakkhuviññāṇan ti? Āmantā.
3 Br. omits.
4 Br. omits pe and inserts cakkhu cakkhudhātū ti? Dibbacakkhu
     paññācakkhu cakkhu, na cakkhudhātu, cakkhudhātu cakkhu ceva
     cakkhudhātu ca. Dhātū ghānadhātu . . . pe . . .
5 Br. dhātu throughout.


[page 170]
170                      Dhātuyamakaṃ
na sotadhātūti? Āmantā . . . pe1 . . . na dhātū2 na
dhammadhātūti? Āmantā. (Cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ. Sabbe
āmantā ubhato pi sese pi.)
     Cakkhu dhātūti? Āmantā. Dhātū2 cakkhudhātūti?
Cakkhudhātu dhātu ceva cakkhudhātu ca, avasesā dhātū2
dhātū,3 na cakkhudhātu.
     Sotaṃ dhātūti? Āmantā . . . pe . . . ghānaṃ jivhā
kāyo rūpaṃ saddo gandho raso phoṭṭhabbo cakkhuviñ-
ñāṇaṃ4 sotaviññāṇaṃ ghānaviññāṇaṃ jivhāviññāṇaṃ kāya-
viññāṇaṃ mano dhātūti? Āmantā. Dhātū3 manodhātūti?
Manodhātu dhātu ceva manodhātu ca, avasesā dhātū2
dhātū,3 na manodhātu.
     Manoviññāṇaṃ dhātūti? Āmantā. Dhātū3 manoviñ-
ñāṇadhātūti? Manoviññaṇadhātu dhātu ceva manoviñ-
ñaṇadhātu ca, avasesā dhātū2 dhātū,3 na manoviññāṇadhātu.
     Dhammo dhātūti? Āmantā. Dhātū3 dhammadhātūti?
Dhammadhātu dhātu ceva dhammadhātu ca, avasesā
dhātū2 dhātū,3 na dhammadhātu.
     Na cakkhu na dhātūti? Cakkhuṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā
dhātū2 na cakkhu, dhātū,3 cakkhuñ ca dhātuñ ca ṭhapetvā
avasesā na ceva cakkhu na ca dhātū.3 Na dhātū3 na
cakkhudhātūti?5 Āmantā. Na sotaṃ na dhātūti? Sotaṃ
ṭhapetvā . . . pe2 . . . ghānaṃ ṭhapetvā jivhaṃ ṭhapetvā
. . . pe . . . na kāyo na dhātūti? Āmantā. Na dhātū
na kāyadhātūti? Āmantā.
     Na rūpaṃ na dhātūti? Rūpaṃ ṭhapetvā . . . pe . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. omits pe and inserts na cakkhu na cakkhudhātū ti?
     Āmantā. Na dhātu na ghānadhātu . . . pe . . .
2 Br. omits.
3 Br. dhātu.
4 S. inserts dhātūti? Āmantā. Dhātū cakkhuviññāṇadhātūti?
     Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ dhātū dhātū ceva cakkhuviññāṇadhātū ca
     avasesā dhātū na cakkhuviññāṇadhātu.
     Br. has dhātūti? Āmantā. Dhātu cakkhuviññāṇadhātūti?
     Cakkhuviññānadhātu ceva cakkhuviññāṇadhātu ca avasesā
     dhātu, na cakkhuviññaṇadhātu.
5 Br. na cakkhūti.


[page 171]
                          Dhātuyamakaṃ                      171
saddaṃ gandhaṃ rasaṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ
*sotaviññāṇaṃ ghānaviññāṇaṃ jivhāviññāṇaṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ

na dhātūti? Āmantā. Na dhātū na dhammadhātūti?
Āmantā.
     Cakkhu dhātūti? Āmantā. Dhātū sotadhātūti? Sota-
dhātu dhātu ceva sotādhātu ca, avasesā dhātū3 dhātū, na
sotadhātu . . . pe2 . . . dhātū dhammadhātūti? Dham-
madhātu dhātu ceva dhammadhātu ca, avasesā dhātū3
dhātū, na dhammādhātu. (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ.)

dhātū3 na cakkhu dhātū; cakkhuñ ca dhātuñ ca ṭhapetvā

dhātūti? Āmantā.4 . . . pe . . . na dhātū na dham-
madhātūti? Āmantā . . . pe . . . na dhammo na dhā-
tūti? Āmantā. Na dhātū na cakkhudhātūti? Āmantā.
. . . pe5 . . . na dhātū na manoviññāṇadhātūti? {Āmantā}.
(cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ. Yathā Āyatanayamakassa paṇṇatti,
evaṃ Dhātuyamakassa paṇṇatti vitthāretabbā.)
                      PAṆṆATTIVĀRAṂ NIṬṬHITAṂ.6
                           [Uppādavāro. ]
     (1-2.) Yassa cakkhudhātu uppajjati, tassa sotadh.
uppajjatīti? Sacakkhukānaṃ asotakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ cakkhudh. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ sotadh. uppajjati;
sacakkhukānaṃ sasotakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhudh.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. and Br. inserting pe, omits * to *.
2 Br. inserts cakkhu dhātūti? Āmantā. Dhātu ghānadhātu.
3 Br. omits.
4 Br. inserts na cakkhu na dhātūti? Cakkhuṃ ṭhapetvā
     avasesā na cakkhudhātu, cakkhuñ ca dhātuñ ca ṭhapetvā
     avasesā na ceva cakkhu na ca dhātu, na dhātu na
     ghānadhātu . . . pe.
5 Br. inserts na dhammo na dhatūti? Āmantā. Na dhātu na sotadhātu.
6 Br. paṇṇattivāro; omits niṭṭhitaṃ.


[page 172]
172                      Dhātuyamakaṃ
ca uppajjati, sotadh. ca uppajjati. Yassa vā pana sotadh.
uppajjati, tassa cakkhudh. uppajjatīti? Sasotakānaṃ
acakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ sotadh. uppajjati, no
ca tesaṃ cakkhudh. uppajjati; sasotakānaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ sotadh. ca uppajjati, cakkhudh. ca
uppajjati.
     (1-3.) Yassa cakkhudh. uppajjati, tassa ghānadh.
uppajjatīti? Sacakkhukānaṃ aghānakānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
. . . (as in 1-2).
     (1-6.) Yassa cakkhudh. uppajjati, tassa rūpadh. uppaj-
jatīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana rūpadh. uppajjati, tassa
cakkhudh. uppajjatīti? Sarūpakānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ up-
pajjantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpadh. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhudh.
uppajjati; sarūpakānaṃ1 sacakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ rūpadh. ca uppajjati, cakkhudh. ca uppajjati.

ñāṇadh. uppajjatīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana mano-
viññāṇadh. uppajjati, tassa cakkhudh. uppajjatīti? Sacit-
takānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ manoviñ-
ñāṇadh. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhudh. uppajjati; sacit-
takānaṃ2 sacakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ manoviñ-
ñāṇadh. ca uppajjati, cakkhudh. ca uppajjati.
     (1-8.) Yassa cakkhudh. uppajjati, tassa dhammadh. up-
pajjatīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana dhammadh. uppajjati,
tassa cakkhudh. uppajjatīti? Acakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ dhammadh. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhudh. uppaj-
jati, sacakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammadh. ca
uppajjati, cakkhudh. ca uppajjati. (yathā Āyatanayamakaṃ
vibhattaṃ, evaṃ Dhātuyamakam pi vibhajitabbaṃ; sadisaṃ
kātabbaṃ.)
                           [Pariññāvāro. ]
     Yo cakkhudhātuṃ parijānāti, so sotadhātuṃ parijānātīti?
Āmantā . . . pe2 . . . Dhātuyamakaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ pey-
yālena.

2 Br. omits.

                              173
                               V.
                         SACCAYAMAKAṂ.1
                         [Uddesavāro. ]
     Cattāri saccāni:
          1. dukkhasaccaṃ            3. nirodhasaccaṃ.
          2. samudayasaccaṃ.         4. maggasaccaṃ.
     Dukkhaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ, dukkhasaccaṃ dukkhaṃ; samu-
dayo samudayasaccaṃ, samudayasaccaṃ samudayo; nirodho
nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhasaccaṃ nirodho; maggo magga-
saccaṃ, maggasaccaṃ maggo.
     Na dukkhaṃ na dukkhasaccaṃ, na dukkhasaccaṃ na
dukkhaṃ; na samudayo na samudayasaccaṃ, na samuda-
yasaccaṃ na samudayo; na nirodho na nirodhasaccaṃ na
nirodhasaccaṃ na nirodho; na maggo na maggasaccaṃ, na
maggasaccaṃ na maggo.
     Dukkhaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ, saccā samudayasaccaṃ; duk-
khaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ, saccā nirodhasaccaṃ; dukkhaṃ duk-
khasaccaṃ, saccā maggasaccaṃ. Samudayo samudaya-
saccaṃ, saccā dukkhasaccaṃ,2 . . . pe . . . saccā magga-
saccaṃ. Nirodho nirodhasaccaṃ, saccā dukkhasaccaṃ;
. . . pe . . . saccā maggasaccaṃ. Maggo maggasaccaṃ, saccā
dukkhasaccaṃ; . . . pe . . . saccā nirodhasaccaṃ.
     Na dukkhaṃ na dukkhasaccaṃ, na saccā na samuday-
asaccaṃ; na dukkhaṃ na dukkhasaccaṃ, na saccā na
nirodhasaccaṃ; na dukkhaṃ na dukkhasaccaṃ, na saccā
na maggasaccaṃ. Na samudayo na samudayasaccaṃ, na

saccā na dukkhasaccaṃ; . . . pe . . . na saccā na magga-
saccaṃ. Na nirodho na nirodhasaccaṃ, na saccā na

. . . pe . . . na saccā na nirodhasaccaṃ.

saccā maggo.

samudayo na saccaṃ . . ṇa saccā na maggo.

saccā nirodho; dukkhaṃ saccaṃ, saccā maggo. Samudayo
saccaṃ, saccā dukkhaṃ; . . . pe . . . saccā maggo.

maggo. Maggo saccaṃ, saccā dukkhaṃ; . . . pe . . .
saccā nirodho.

dukkhaṃ na saccaṃ, na saccā na nirodho; na dukkhaṃ na

nirodho na saccaṃ, na saccā na dukkhaṃ; . . . pe . . .
na {saccā} na maggo. Na maggo na saccaṃ, na saccā na
dukkhaṃ; . . . pe . . . na saccā na nirodho.
                      UDDESAVĀRAN NIṬṬHITAṂ.

     1. Dukkhaṃ dukkhasaccan ti? Āmantā. Dukkhasaccaṃ
dukkhan ti? Kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ
ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ1 dukkhasaccaṃ, na duk-
khan; kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ dukkhañ
ceva dukkhasaccañ ca. 2. Samudayo samudayas. ti?

dayas. ca. Samudayas. samudayo ti? Āmantā. 3.

                      PAṆṆATTIVĀRAṂ NIṬṬHITAṂ.
                           [Uppādavāro. ]
     (1-2.)1. i. Yassa dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjati, tassa samud-
ayasaccaṃ uppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ1 pavatte
taṇhāvippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas.
uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ samudayas. uppajjati; taṇhāya
uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas. ca uppajjati, samudayas.
uppajjati. {Yassa} {vā} pana samudayas. uppajjati, tassa
dukkhas. uppajjatīti? Āmantā.
     (1-4.) Yassa dukkhas. uppajjati, tassa maggas. upaj-
jatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte maggavippayut-
tacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas. uppajjati, no ca
tesaṃ maggas. uppajjati; pañcavokāre maggassa uppādak-
khaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas. ca uppajjati, maggas. ca uppajjati.
Yassa vā pana maggas. uppajjati tassa dukkhas. uppaj-
jatīti? Arūpe maggassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggas.
uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ dukkhas. uppajjati, pañcavokāre
maggassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggas. ca uppajjati,
dukkhas. ca uppajjati.
     (2-4.) Yassa samudayas. uppajjati, tassa maggas.
uppajjatīti? No. Yassa vā pana maggas. . . . pe . . .
No.
     ii. Yattha dukkhas. uppajjati, tattha samudayas. uppaj-
jatīti? Asaññasatte tattha dukkhas. uppajjati, no ca
tattha samudayas. uppajjati; catuvokāre pañcavokāre
tattha dukkhas. ca uppajjati, samudayas. ca uppajjati.
Yattha vā pana samudayas. . . . pe . . . Āmantā.
     Yattha dukkhas. uppajjati, tattha maggas. uppajjatīti?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. upapajjantānaṃ throughout.


[page 179]
                          Saccayamakaṃ                      179
Apāye asaññasatte tattha dukkhas. uppajjati, no ca tattha
maggas. uppajjati; avasese catuvokāre pañcavokāre tattha
dukkhas. ca uppajjati, maggas. ca uppajjati. Yattha vā
pana maggas. uppajjati, tattha dukkhas. uppajjatīti?
Āmantā.
     Yattha samudayas. uppajjati, tattha maggas. uppaj-
jatīti? Apāye tattha samudayas. uppajjati, no ca tattha
maggas. uppajjati; avasese catuvokāre pañcavokāre tattha
samudayas. ca uppajjati, maggas. ca uppajjati. Yattha vā
pana maggas. . . . pe . . . Āmantā.
     iii. Yassa yattha dukkhas. uppajjati, tassa tattha
samudayas. uppajjatīti? (yassakaṃ pi yassayatthakaṃ pi
sadisaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ).
     2. i. Yassa dukkhas. nuppajjati, tassa samudayas. nup-
pajjatīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana samudayas. nuppaj-
jati, tassa dukkhas. nuppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ pavatte taṇhāvippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe
tesaṃ samudayas. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ dukkhas. nuppaj-
jati; sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ
samudayas. ca nuppajjati, dukkhas. ca nuppajjati.
     Yassa dukkhas. nuppajjati, tassa maggas. nuppajjatīti?
Arūpe maggassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas. nuppajjati,
no ca tesaṃ maggas. nuppajjati; sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ
pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe phalassa uppādak-
khaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas. ca nuppajjati maggas. ca nuppajjati.
Yassa vā pana maggas. nuppajjati, tassa dukkhas. nuppaj-
jatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte maggavippayut-
tacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggas. nuppajjati, no ca
tesaṃ dukkhas. nuppajjati; sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte
cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe phalassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ
maggas. ca nuppajjati, dukkhas. ca nuppajjati.
     Yassa samudayas. nuppajjati, tassa maggas. nuppaj-
jatīti? Maggassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayas. nuppaj-
jati, no ca tesaṃ maggas. nuppajjati; sabbesaṃ cittassa
bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttamaggavippayuttacittassa
uppādakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 180]
180                      Saccayamakaṃ
tesaṃ samudayas. ca nuppajjati, maggas. ca nuppajjati.
Yassa vā pana maggas. nuppajjati, tassa samudayas.
nuppajjatīti? Taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggas.
nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ samudayas. nuppajjati; sabbesaṃ
cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttamaggavippayut-
tacittassa1 uppādakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asañña-
sattānaṃ tesaṃ maggas. ca nuppajjati, samudayas. ca
nuppajjati.
     ii. Yattha dukkhas. nuppajjati, tattha samudayas.
nuppajjatīti? Natthi. Yattha vā pana samudayas.
nuppajjati, tattha dukkhas. nuppajjatīti? Uppajjati.
     Yattha dukkhas. nuppajjati, tattha maggas. nuppajjatīti?
Natthi. Yattha vā pana maggas. . . . pe . . . Uppajjati.
     Yattha samudayas. nuppajjati, tattha maggas. nuppaj-
jatīti? Āmantā. Yattha vā pana maggas. nuppajjati,
tattha samudayas. nuppajjatīti? Apāye tattha maggas.
nuppajjati, no ca tattha samudayas. nuppajjati; asañ-
ñasatte tattha maggas. ca nuppajjati; samudayas. ca
nuppajjati.
     iii. Yassa yattha dukkhas. nuppajjati, tassa tattha
samudayas. nuppajjatīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana yattha
samudayas. nuppajjati, tassa tattha dukkhas. nuppaj-
jatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte taṇhāvippayut-
tacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha samudayas. nup-
pajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. nuppajjati; sabbesaṃ
cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa
ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha samudayas. ca
nuppajjati, dukkhas. ca nuppajjati.

nuppajjatīti? Arūpe maggassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha
dukkhas. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha maggas. nuppaj-
jati; sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
arūpe phalassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. ca
nuppajjati, maggas. ca nuppajjati. Yassa vā pana yattha

maggas. nuppajjati, tassa tattha dukkhas. nuppajjatīti?
Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte maggavippayuttacittassa
uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha maggas. nuppajjati, no ca
tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. nuppajjati; sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ
pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe phalassa uppādak-
khaṇe tesaṃ tattha maggas. ca nuppajjati {dukkhas. ca nuppajjati.}

maggas. nuppajjatīti? Maggassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ
tattha samudayas. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha maggas.
nuppajjati; sabbesaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvip-
payuttamaggavippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe nirodha-
samāpannānaṃ2 asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ t. samudayas. ca
nuppajjati, maggas. ca nuppajjati. Yassa vā pana yattha
maggans. nuppajjati, tassa tattha samudayas. nuppajjatīti?

no ca tesaṃ tattha samudayas. nuppajjati; sabbesaṃ
cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe3 taṇhāvippayuttamaggavippayut-
tacittassa uppādakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ1 asaññasat-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha maggas. ca nuppajjati, samudayas. ca
nuppajjati.
     3. i. Yassa dukkhas. uppajjittha, tassa samudayas.
uppajjitthāti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana samudayas.

vā pana maggas. . . . pe . . . Āmantā.

jitthāti? Anabhisametāvīnaṃ tesaṃ samudayas. . . . pe . . .
(as above) . . .? Āmantā.

sadisaṃ, tantinānākaraṇaṃ heṭṭhāyatthakasadisaṃ).

paṭilabhissanti, tesaṃ dukkhas. ca uppajjissati, maggas.

     Yassa dukkhas. uppajjati, tassa maggas. uppajjitthāti?
Anabhisametāvīnaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppā-

1 S. dukkhaṃ.


[page 187]
                          Saccayamakaṃ                      187
dakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ maggas.
uppajjittha; abhisametāvīnaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte
cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas. ca uppajjati,
maggas. ca uppajjittha. Yassa vā pana maggas. uppaj-
jittha, tassa dukkhas. uppajjatīti? Abhisametāvīnaṃ
cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggas.
ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggas. uppajjittha,
no ca tesaṃ dukkhas. uppajjati; abhisametāvīnaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggas. ca
uppajjittha, dukkhas. ca uppajjati.
     Yassa samudayas. uppajjati, tassa maggas. uppajjit-
thāti? Anabhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ
samudayas. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ maggas. uppajjittha;
abhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayas.
ca uppajjati, maggas. ca uppajjittha. Yassa vā pana
maggas. uppajjittha, tassa samudayas. uppajjatīti?
Abhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayut-
tacitte vattamāne nirodhasamāpannānaṃ tesaṃ maggas.
uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ samudayas. uppajjati; abhisa-
metāvīnaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggas. ca
uppajjittha, samudayas. ca uppajjati.
     ii. Yattha dukkhas. . . . pe . . . (yatthakā sadisā sabbe).
     iii. Yassa yattha dukkhas. uppajjati, tassa tattha
samudayas. uppajjitthāti? Suddhāvāsānaṃ uppatticit-
tassa1 uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha dukkhas. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha samudayas.
uppajjittha; itaresaṃ catuvokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha
dukkhas. ca uppajjati, samudayas. ca uppajjittha. Yassa vā
pana yattha samudayas. uppajjittha, tassa tattha dukkhas.
uppajjatīti? Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ pavatte
cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca
uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha samudayas. uppajjittha, no ca
tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. uppajjati; catuvokāraṃ pañcavo-
kāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ
tattha samudayas. ca uppajjittha, dukkhas. ca uppajjati.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. upapatti-.


[page 188]
188                      Saccayamakaṃ
     Yassa yattha dukkhas. uppajjati, tassa tattha maggas.
uppajjitthāti? Suddhāvāsānaṃ uppatticittassa1 uppādak-
khaṇe anabhisametāvīnaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa
uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
dukkhas. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha maggas. uppaj-
jittha; abhisametāvīnaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa
uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. ca uppajjati, maggas.
ca uppajjittha. Yassa vā pana yattha maggas. uppajjittha,
tassa tattha dukkhas. uppajjatīti? {Abhisametāvīnaṃ}
cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa
ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha maggas. uppaj-
jittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. uppajjati; abhisame-
tāvīnaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe
tesaṃ tattha maggas. ca uppajjittha, dukkhas. ca uppajjati.
     Yassa yattha samudayas. uppajjati, tassa tattha maggas.
uppajjitthāti? Anabhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe
tesaṃ tattha samudayas. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
maggas. uppajjittha; abhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāye uppādak-
khaṇe tesaṃ tattha samudayas. ca uppajjati, maggas. ca
uppajjittha. Yassa va pana yattha maggas. uppajjittha,
tassa tattha samudayas. uppajjatīti? Abhisametāvīnaṃ
taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte pavattamāne
tesaṃ tattha maggas. uppajjittha, no ca t. t. samudayas.
uppajjati; abhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe t. t.
maggas. ca uppajjittha, samudayas. ca uppajjati.
     8. i. Yassa dukkhas. nuppajjati, tassa samudayas.
nuppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha. Yassa vā pana samudayas.
nuppajjittha, tassa dukkhas. nuppajjatīti? Natthi.
     Yassa dukkhas. nuppajjati, tassa maggas. nuppajjitthāti?
Abhisametāvīnaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgak-
khaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ
dukkhas. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ maggas. nuppajjittha;
anābhisametāvīnaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgak-
khaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas. ca nuppajjati, maggas. ca nuppaj-
jittha. Yassa vā pana maggas. nuppajjittha, tassa duk-
khas. nuppajjatīti? Anabhisametāvīnaṃ uppajjantānaṃ

ca nuppajjittha, dukkhas. ca nuppajjati.

ayas. nuppajjitthāti? Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ

ca tesaṃ tattha samudayas. nuppajjittha; suddhāvā-
sānaṃ uppatticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. ca nuppajjati, samudayas.
ca nuppajjittha. Yassa vā pana yattha samudayas.
nuppajjittha, tassa tattha dukkhas. nuppajjatīti? Sud-
dhāvāsānaṃ uppatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ

ca tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. nuppajjati; suddhāvāsānaṃ
uppatticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ

nuppajjitthāti? Abhisametāvīnaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte

tesaṃ tattha maggas. nuppajjittha, suddhāvāsānaṃ uppat-
ticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe anabhisametāvīnaṃ cavantānaṃ

190                      Saccayamakaṃ
pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. ca nuppajjati, maggas. ca nuppaj-
jittha. Yassa vā pana yattha maggas. nuppajjittha, tassa
tattha dukkhas. nuppajjatīti? Suddhāvāsānaṃ uppatticit-
tassa uppādakkhaṇe anabhisametāvīnaṃ uppajjantānaṃ1
pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha maggas. nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha
dukkhas. nuppajjati; suddhāvāsānaṃ uppatticittassa bhaṅ-
gakkhaṇe anabhisametāvīnaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa
bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
maggas. ca nuppajjittha, dukkhas. ca nuppajjati.

maggas. nuppajjitthāti? Abhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅ-
gakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte pavattamāne tesaṃ tattha
samudayas. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha maggas. nuppaj-
jittha; suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte pavattamāne anabhi-
sametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte
pavattamāne asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha samudayas. ca
nuppajjati, maggas. ca nuppajjittha. Yassa vā pana yattha
maggas. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha samudayas. nuppajjatīti?
Anabhisametāvīnaṃ tāṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha
maggas. nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha samudayas.
nuppajjati; suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte pavattamāne
anabhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayut-
tacitte pavattamāne asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha maggas.
ca nuppajjittha, samudayas. ca nuppajjati.
     9. i. Yassa dukkhas. uppajjati, tassa samudayas. uppaj-
jissaīti? Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ
cittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ
paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas.
uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ samudayas. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ duk-
khas. ca uppajjati, samudayas. ca uppajjissati. Yassa vā
pana samudayas. uppajjissati, tassa dukkhas. uppajjatīti?
Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe
maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudaya.

uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ dukkhas. uppajjati; sabbesaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ
samudayas. ca uppajjissati, dukkhas. ca uppajjati.
     Yassa dukkhas. uppajjati, tassa maggas. uppajjissatīti?
Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa uppād-
akkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ duk-
khas. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ maggas. uppajjissati; yassa
cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa
uppādakkhaṇe ye c' aññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ
dukkhas. ca uppajjati, maggas. uppajjissati. Yassa vā
pana magga. uppajjissati, tassa dukkhas. uppajjatīti?
Yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa
cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye c' aññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti
tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe
maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggas.
uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ dukkhas. uppajjati; yassa
cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa
uppadakkhaṇe ye c' aññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppadākkhaṇe tesaṃ
maggas. ca uppajjissati, dukkhas. ca uppajjati.

satīti? Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ
taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesan samudayas. uppajjati, no ca
tesaṃ maggas. uppajjissati; ye maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti
tesaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayas. ca uppaj-
jati, maggas. ca uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana maggas.
uppajjissati, tassa samudayas. uppajjatīti? Yassa cittassa
anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti* tassa cittassa uppā-
dakkhaṇe*1 ye c' aññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ
taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhavippayuttacitte pavattamāne
nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ maggas. up-
pajjissati, no ca tesaṃ samudayas. uppajjati; ye maggaṃ
paṭilabhissanti, tesaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggas.
ca uppajjissati, samudayas. ca uppajjati.

194                      Saccayamakaṃ
     Yassa dukkhas. nuppajjati, tassa maggas. nuppaj-
jissatīti? Yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭila-
bhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye c' aññe
maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa
bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādak-
khaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ maggas.
nuppajjissati; aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ
cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭila-
bhissanti tesan cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ duk-
khas. ca nuppajjati, maggas. ca nuppajjisati. Yassa vā
pana maggas. nuppajjissati, tassa dukkhas. nuppajjatīti?
Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa uppā-
dakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti
tesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ
maggas. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ dukkhas. nuppajjati;
aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅ-
gakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti
tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe
maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesan maggas. ca
nuppajjissati, dukkhas. ca nuppajjati.
     Yassa samudayas. nuppajjati, tassa maggas. nuppajjis-
satīti? Yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti
*tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe* ye c' aññe maggaṃ paṭila-
bhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayut-
tacitte pavattamāne nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ
tesan samudayas. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ maggas. nupajjis-
sati; aggamaggasamaṅgīnaṃ arahantānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā
maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe
taṇhāvippayuttacitte pavattamāne {cross}nirodhasamāpannānaṃ
asaññasattānaṃ{cross} tesaṃ samudayas. ca nuppajjati, maggas.
ca nuppajjissati. Y. v. p. maggas. . . . Ye puthujjanā
maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe
tesaṃ maggas. nuppajjissati, no ca t. samudayas. nuppajjati;
aggamaggasamaṅgīnaṃ arahantānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
* to *. Br. omits.
{cross} S. inserts asaññasattā cavantānaṃ here.

                          Saccayamakaṃ                      195
maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe
taṇhāvippayuttacitte pavattamāne *nirodhasamāpannānaṃ
asaññasattānaṃ* t. maggas. . . . samudayas. ca nuppajjati.
     ii. Yattha dukkhas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. dukkhas. nuppajjati, t. t. samudayas. nuppaj-
jissatīti? Catuvokārā {pañcavokārā} cavantānaṃ pavatte
cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppā-
dakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha samudayas. nuppajjissati, aggamaggassa bhaṅgak-
khaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe yassa cittassa
anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅ-
gakkhaṇe {cross}arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe{cross}
asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhas . . . samu-
dayas. ca nuppajjissati. Y.v.p.y. samudayas. . . . Agga-
maggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe
yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa
cittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha samudayas. nuppajjissati, no ca t. t. dukkhas.
nuppajjati; aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ
cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ
paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe1 arūpe mag-
gassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha samudayas. . . . dukkhas. ca nuppajjati.
     Y. y. dukkhas. nuppajjati, t. t. maggas. nuppajjissatīti?

cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye c' aññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti
tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe

dukkhas. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha maggas. nuppaj-
jissati; aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa

tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe

tānaṃ t. t. dukkhas. . . . maggas. ca nuppajjissati.
Y. v. p. y. maggas. . . . Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe
arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā

tattha maggas. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dukkhas

     Y. y. samudayas. nuppajjati, t. t. maggas. nuppajjissa-
tīti? {Yassa} cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti

bhissanti, tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayutta-
citte pavattamāne tesaṃ tattha samudayas. nuppajjati, no
ca tesaṃ tattha maggas. nuppajjissati; aggamaggasamaṅ-

santi tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte
pavattamāne asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha samudayas. . . .
maggas. canuppajjissati. Y. v. p. y. maggas. . . . Āpāyi-
kānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ
taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe t. t. maggas. nuppajjissati, no ca
tesaṃ tattha samudayas. nuppajjati; aggamaggasamaṅ-
gīnaṃ arahantānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggan na paṭilabhis-
santi tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte
pavattamāne asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha maggas. ca
nuppajjissati, samudayas. ca nuppajjati.
     11. i. Yassa dukkhas. uppajjittha, tassa samudayas.
uppajjissatīti? Aggamaggasamaṅgīnaṃ arahantānaṃ yassa
cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti, tesaṃ duk-
khas. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ samudayas. uppajjissati;
jitaresaṃ1 dukkhas. ca uppajjittha, samudayas. ca uppaj-
jissati. Y. v. p. samudayas. . . . Āmantā.

no ca tesaṃ maggas. uppajjissati; yassa cittassa anantarā

198                      Saccayamakaṃ
     Y. y. samudayas. uppajjittha, t. t. maggas. uppajjissatīti?

dayas. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha maggas. uppajjissati;

cittassa uppādakkhaṇe* ye c' aññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti,
t. t. samudayas. ca uppajjittha, maggas. ca uppajjissati.

tesaṃ tattha maggas. uppajjissati, no ca t. t. samudayas.
uppajjittha; yassa cittassa2 anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭila-
bhissanti *tassa cittassa {uppādakkhaṇe}*3 ye c' aññe maggaṃ
paṭilabhissanti, tesan tattha maggas. ca uppajjissati, samu-
dayas. ca uppajjittha.
     12. i. Yassa dukkhas. nuppajjittha, tassa samudayas.
nuppajjissatīti? Natthi. Yassa vā pana samudayas.
nuppajjissati, tassa dukkhas. nuppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.

jissatīti? Natthi. Y. v. p. maggas. . . . Uppajjittha.

jissatīti? Natthi. Y. v. p. maggas. . . . Uppajjittha.

jissatīti? Uppajjissati. Y. v. p. y. . . . Uppajjittha.

                      UPPĀDAVĀRAṂ NIṬṬHITAṂ.
                          [Nirodharāro. ]
     1. i. Yassa dukkhas. nirujjhati, tassa samudayas. niruj-
jhatīti? Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte taṇhāvippayutta-
cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas. nirujjhati, no ca
tesaṃ samudayas. nirujjhati; taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ
dukkhas. ca nirujjhati, samudayas. nirujjhati. Y. v. p.
samudayas. nirujjhati . . . Āmantā.
     Yassa dukkhas. nirujjhati, tassa maggas. nirujjhatīti?
Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte maggavippayuttacittassa
bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ
maggas. nirujjhati; pañcavokāre maggassa bhaṅgakkhane
tesaṃ dukkhas. ca nirujjhati, maggas. ca nirujjhati. Yassa
vā pana maggas. nirujjhati, tassa dukkhas. nirujjhatīti?
Arūpe maggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggas. nirujjhati,
no ca t. dukkhas. nirujjhati. Pañcavokāre maggassa
bhaṅgakkhaṇe t. maggas. . . . dukkhas. ca nirujjhati.
     Yassa samudayas. nirujjhati, tassa maggas. nirujjhatīti?
No. Y. v. p. maggas. . . . No.
     ii. Yattha dukkhas. nirujjhati, tattha samudayas. niruj-
jhatīti? Asaññasatte tattha dukkhas. nirujjhati, . . . pe
(yatthakaṃ. Uppāde pi Nirodhe pi Uppādanirodhe pi
sadisaṃ, natthi nānākaraṇaṃ.)
     iii. Y. y. dukkhas. nirujjhati, . . . pe . . . (yassayat-
thakaṃ2 pi sadisaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
     2. i. Yassa dukkhas. na nirujjhati, tassa samudayas. na
nirujjhatīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana samudayas. na

200                      Saccayamakaṃ
nirujjhati, tassa dukkhas. na nirujjhatīti? Sabbesaṃ
cavantānaṃ pavatte taṇhāvippayuttacittassa {bhaṅgak-

dukkhas. na nirujjhati; sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte

nirujjhati.

jhatīti?* Arūpe maggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas.
na nirujjhati, no ca tesan maggas. na nirujjhati; sabbesaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe phal-

nirujjhati; sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppā-
dakkhaṇe arūpe phalassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggas. ca
na nirujjhati, dukkhas. ca na nirujjhati.
     Yassa samudayas. na nirujjhati, tassa maggas. na niruj-
jhatīti? Maggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayas. na
nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ maggas. na nirujjhati; sabbesaṃ
cittassa uppādakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttamaggavippayutta-
cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasat-
tānaṃ tesaṃ samudayas. ca na nirujjhati, maggas. ca na
nirujjhati. Yassa vā pana maggas. na nirujjhati, tassa
samudayas. na nirujjhatīti? Taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe
tesaṃ maggas. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ samudayas. na
nirujjhati; sabbesaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe taṇhāvip-
payuttamaggavippayuttacittassa2 bhaṅgakkhaṇe nirodha-
samāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ maggas. na niruj-
jhati, samudayas. ca na nirujjhati.

[page 201]
                              Saccayamakaṃ                  201
     iii. Y. y. dukkhas. na nirujjhati (yassakaṃ pi yatthakaṃ1
pi1 yassayatthakaṃ pi sadisaṃ, yassayatthake pi nirodha-
samāpannānan ti c' etaṃ na kātabbaṃ).
     3,4. i. Yassa dukkhas. nirujjhittha, tassa samudayas.
nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā. (Yathā Uppādavāre2 atītā pucchā
anulomaṃ pi paccaniyaṃ3 pi vibhattaṃ,4 evaṃ Nirodhe5 pi
vibhajitabbaṃ, natthi nānākaraṇaṃ.)
     5. i. Yassa dukkhas. nirujjhissati, tassa samudayas.
nirujjhissatīti? Aggamaggasamaṅgīnaṃ arahantānaṃ yassa
cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti *tassa cittassa
uppādakkhaṇe *6 tesaṃ dukkhas. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ
samudayas. nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ7 dukkhas. . . . samu-
dayas. ca nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. samudayas. . . .
Āmantā.
     Yassa dukkhas. nirujjhissati, tassa maggas. nirujjhissa-
tīti? Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ ye ca
puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti, tesaṃ dukkhas.
nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ maggas. nirujjhissati; aggamag-
gassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ
paṭilabhissanti ye c' aññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti, t.
dukkhas. . . . maggas. ca nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. . . .
Āmantā.
     Yassa samudayas. nirujjhissati, tassa maggas. nirujjhis-
satīti? Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti, tesaṃ
samudayas. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ maggas. nirujjhissati;
ye maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti, tesaṃ samudayas. ca nirujjhis-
sati, maggas. ca nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana maggas.
nirujjhissati, tassa samudayas. nirujjhissatīti? Aggamag-
gassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ
paṭilabhissanti, tesaṃ maggas. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ
samudayas. nirujjhissati; ye maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti, tesaṃ
maggas. ca nirujjhissati, samudayas. ca nirujjhissati.

7 Br. inserts tesaṃ.

202                      Saccayamakaṃ
     ii. Yattha dukkhas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. dukkhas. nirujjhissati, t. t. samudayas. niruj-
jhissatīti? Aggamaggasamaṃgīnaṃ arahantānaṃ yassa
cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti asaññasat-
tānan tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha samudayas. nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ catuvokārānaṃ
pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. ca nirujjhissati,
samudayas. ca nirujjhissati. (Yassakaṃ pi yatthakaṃ1 pi1
yassayatthakaṃ pi sadisaṃ.)
     6. i. Yassa dukkhas. na nirujjhissati, tassa samudayas.
na nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana samudayas.
na nirujjhissati, tassa dukkhas. na nirujjhissatīti? Agga-
maggasamaṅgīnan arahantānaṃ yassa cittassa anantarā
aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti, tesaṃ samudayas. na niruj-
jhissati, no ca tesaṃ dukkhas. na nirujjhissati; pacchima-
cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayas. ca na nirujjhissati,
dukkhas. ca na nirujjhissati.
     Yassa dukkhas. na nirujjhissati, tassa maggas. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana maggas. na niruj-
jhissati, tassa dukkhas. na nirujjhissatīti? Aggamaggassa
bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na
paṭilabhissanti, tesaṃ maggas. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ
dukkhas. na nirujjhissati; pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
tesaṃ maggas. ca . . . dukkhas. ca na nirujjhissati.
     Yassa samudayas. na nirujjhissati, tassa maggas. na
nirujjhissatīti? Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa
anantarā aggamaggan paṭilabhissanti, tesaṃ samudayas.
na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ maggas. na nirujjhissati;
aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ tesaṃ samu-
dayas. ca na nirujjhissati, maggas. ca na nirujjhissati.
Y. v. p. maggas. . . . Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhis-
santi, tesaṃ maggas. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ samu-
dayas. na nirujjhissati; aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
arahantānaṃ tesaṃ maggas. ca na nirujjhissati, samudayas.
ca na nirujjhissati.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. omits.


[page 203]
                          Saccayamakaṃ                      203
     ii. Yattha dukkhas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. dukkhas. na nirujjhissati, t. t. samudayas. na
nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā. Y. v. p. y. samudayas. na
nirujjhissati, t. t. dukkhas. na nirujjhissatīti? Agga-
maggasamaṅgīnaṃ arahantānaṃ yassa cittassa anantarā
aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
samudayas. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dukkhas.
na nirujjhissati; pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ
tattha samudayas. . . . dukkhas. ca na nirujjhissati.
     Y. y. dukkhas. na nirujjhissati, t. tṃaggas. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Āmantā. Y. v. p. y. maggas. na nirujjhissati,
t. t. dukkhas. na nirujjhissatīti? Aggamaggassa bhaṅgak-
khaṇe arahantānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭila-
bhissanti āpāyikānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha maggas.
na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. na niruj-
jhissati; pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha
maggas. ca na nirujjhissati, dukkhas. ca na nirujjhissati.
     Y. y. samudayas. na nirujjhissati, t. t. maggas. na
nirujjhissatīti? Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cit-
tassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti, tesaṃ tattha
samudayas. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha maggas.
na nirujjhissati; aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahan-
tānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha samudayas. ca na
nirujjhissati, maggas. ca na nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. y.
maggas. na {nirujjhissati}, t. t. samudayas. na nirujjhis-
satīti? Āpāyikānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭila-
bhissanti, tesaṃ tattha maggas. na nirujjhissati, no ca
tesaṃ tattha samudayas. na nirujjhissati; aggamaggassa
bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
maggas. . . . samudayas. ca na nirujjhissati.
     6. i. Yassa dukkhas. nirujjhati, t. samudayas. niruj-
jhitthāti? Āmantā. Y. v. p. samudayas. . . . Sabbesaṃ up-
pajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa
ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayas. nirujjhittha,
no ca tesaṃ dukkhas. nirujjhati; sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ
pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayas. ca niruj-
jhittha dukkhas. ca nirujjhati.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 204]
204                      Saccayamakaṃ
     Yassa dukkhas. nirujjhati, tassa maggas. nirujjhitthāti?
Anabhisametāvīnaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgak-
khaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ maggas.
nirujjhittha; abhisametāvīnaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa
bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas. ca nirujjhati, maggas. ca
nirujjhittha. Y. v. p. maggas. . . . Abhisametāvīnaṃ up-
pajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa
ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggas. nirujjhittha, no
ca tesaṃ dukkhas. nirujjhati; abhisametāvīnaṃ cavantānaṃ
pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggas. ca niruj-
jhittha, dukkhas. ca nirujjhati.
     Yassa samudayas. nirujjhati, tassa maggas. niruj-
jhitthāti? Anabhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe
tesaṃ samudayas. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ maggas. niruj-
jhittha; abhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ
samudayas. ca nirujjhati, maggas. ca. nirujjhittha. Y. v. p.
maggas. . . . Abhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe
taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne nirodhasamāpannānaṃ
tesan maggas. nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ samudayas. niruj-
jhati, abhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ
maggas. ca nirujjhittha, samudayas. ca nirujjhati.
     ii. Yattha dukkhas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. dukkhas. nirujjhati, t. t. samudayas. niruj-
jhitthāti? Suddhāvāsānaṃ uppatticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
asaññasattaṃ1 tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. nirujjhati, no ca t. t.
samudayas. nirujjhittha; itaresaṃ catuvokārā pañcavokārā
cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe t. t. dukkhas.
ca nirujjhati, samudayas. ca nirujjhittha. Y. v. p. y.
samudayas. . . . Catuvokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ
pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa
ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha samudayas. nirujjhittha,
no ca tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. nirujjhati; catuvokārā pañ-
cavokārā cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ
tattha samudayas. ca nirujjhittha, dukkhas. ca nirujjhati.
     Y. y. dukkhas. nirujjhati, t. t. maggas. nirujjhitthāti?

1 Br. asaññasattācavantānaṃ. S. inserts cavantānaṃ.


[page 205]
                           Saccayamakaṃ                     205
Suddhāvāsānaṃ uppatticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe {anabhisam-
etāvīnaṃ} cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. nirujjhati,
no ca tesaṃ tattha maggas. nirujjhittha; {abhisametāvīnaṃ}
cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha
dukkhas. ca nirujjhati, maggas. ca nirujjhittha. Y. v. p. y.
maggas. nirujjhittha, t. t. dukkhas. nirujjhatīti? {Abhisam-
etāvīnaṃ} uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe
arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha
maggas. nirujjhittha, no ca t. t. dukkhas. nirujjhati;
abhisametāvīnaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
t. t. maggas. ca nirujjhittha, dukkhas. ca nirujjhati.
     Y. y. samudaya. nirujjhati, t. t. maggas. nirujjhitthāti?
Anabhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha
samudayas. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha maggas. niruj-
jhittha; abhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe t. t.
samudayas. ca nirujjhati, maggas. ca nirujjhittha. Y. v. p.
maggas. . . . Abhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe
taṇhāvippayuttacitte pavattamāne tesaṃ tattha maggas.
nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha samudayas. nirujjhati;
abhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha
maggas. ca nirujjhittha, samudayas. ca nirujjhati.
     8. i. Yassa dukkhas. na nirujjhati, tassa samudayas. na
nirujjhitthāti? Nirujjhittha. Yassa vā pana samudayas.
na nirujjhittha, tassa dukkhas. na nirujjhatīti? Natthi.
     Yassa dukkhas. na nirujjhati, tassa maggas na niruj-
jhitthāti? Abhisametāvīnaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cit-
tassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅ-
gakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ maggas.
na nirujjhittha; anabhisametāvīnaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte
cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas. na nirujjhati,
maggas. ca na nirujjhittha. Y. v. p. maggas. . . .
Anabhisametāvīnaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgak-
khaṇe t. maggas. na nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ dukkhas.
na nirujjhati; anabhisametāvīnaṃ . . . (as in previous
reply).
     Yassa samudayas. na nirujjhati, tassa maggas. na
nirujjhitthāti? Abhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

206                      Saccayamakaṃ
{taṇhāvippayuttacitte} pavattamāne nirodhasamāpannānaṃ
tesaṃ samudayas. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ maggas. na
nirujjhittha; anabhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāye uppādakkhaṇe
taṇhāvippayuttacitte pavattamāne asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ
samudayas. ca na nirujjhati, maggas. ca na nirujjhittha.
Y. v. p. maggas. . . . Anabhisametavīnaṃ taṇhāya
bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggas. na nirujjhittha, no ca t.
samudayas. na nirujjhati; anabhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya . . .
(as in previous reply).
     ii. Yattha dukkhas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. dukkhas. na nirujjhati, t. t. samudayas. na
nirujjhitthāti? Catuvokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ
pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa
ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. na nirujjhati,
no ca t. t. samudayas. na nirujjhittha; suddhāvā-
sānaṃ uppatticittassa1 uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ2
uppajjantānaṃ t. t. dukkhas. ca na nirujjhati, samu-
dayas. ca na nirujjhittha. Y. v. p. y. samudayas. . . .
Suddhāvāsānaṃ uppatticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattā
cavantānaṃ tesan tattha samudayas. nirujjhittha, no ca
tesan tattha dukkhas. na nirujjhati; suddhāvāsānaṃ up-
patticittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha samudayas. ca na nirujjhittha, dukkhas. ca
na nirujjhati.
     Y. y. dukkhas. na nirujjhati, t. t. maggas. na niruj-
jhitthāti? Abhisametāvīnaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa
uppādakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgak-
khaṇe tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha maggas. na nirujjhittha; suddhāvāsānaṃ uppatti-
cittassa uppādakkhaṇe anabhisametāvīnaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
t. t. dukkhas. ca na nirujjhati, maggas. ca na niruj-
jhittha. Y. v. p. y. maggas. . . . Suddhāvāsānaṃ up-
patticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe anabhisametāvīnaṃ cavantānaṃ

1 Br., upapatti- throughout.
2 S., asaññasattānaṃ.


[page 207]
                          Saccayamakaṃ                 207
pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesan
tattha maggas. na nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha dukkhas.
na nirujjhati; suddhāvāsānaṃ uppatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe
anabhisametāvīnaṃ {uppajjantānaṃ} pavatte cittassa uppā-
dakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha maggas.
ca na nirujjhittha, dukkhas. ca na nirujjhati.
     Y. y. samudayas. na nirujjhati, t. t. maggas. na
nirujjhitthāti? Abhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya. uppādakkhaṇe
taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne1 tesaṃ tattha samudayas.
na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha maggas. na nirujjhittha;
suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte vattamāne anabhisametāvīnaṃ
taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne
asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha samudayas. ca na nirujjhati,
maggas. ca na nirujjhittha. Y. v. p. y. maggas. . . .
Anabhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha
maggas. na nirujjhittha, no ca t. t. samudayas. na nirujjhati;
*suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte vattamāne* anabhisametā-
vīnan taṇhāya {uppādakkhaṇe} taṇhāvippayuttacitte vatta-
māne asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha maggas. ca na niruj-
jhittha, samudayas. ca na nirujjhati.

jhissatīti? Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cit-
tassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ
paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas.
nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ samudayas. nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ
cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas.
ca nirujjhati, samudayas. ca nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. samu-
dayas. nirujjhissati, tassa dukkhas. nirujjhatīti? Sabbesaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe mag-
gassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayas.
nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ dukkhas. nirujjhati; sabbesan
cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ samu-
dayas. ca nirujjhissati, dukkhas. ca nirujjhati.
     Yassa dukkhas. nirujjhati, tassa maggas. nirujjhissatīti?
Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅ-

208                      Saccayamakaṃ
gakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti
tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ

cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye c' aññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti
tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ
dukkhas. ca nirujjhati, maggas. ca nirujjhissati. Y. v. p.
maggas. nirujjhissati, tassa dukkhas. nirujjhatīti? Agga-
maggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā agga-
maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye
c' aññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte
cittassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca
bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggas. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ
dukkhas. nirujjhati; yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ
paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye c' aññe
maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa
bhaṅgakkhaṇe t. maggas. dukkhas. ca . . . nirujjhati.

satīti? Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ na1 paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ

{tesaṃ} maggas. nirujjhissati; ye maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti
tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayas. ca niruj-
jhati, maggas. ca nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. {maggas}. niruj-
jhissati, tassa samudayas. nirujjhatīti? Aggamaggassa
uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭila-
bhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye c' aññe maggaṃ
paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ {taṇhāya} uppādakkhaṇe taṇhāvip-
payuttacitte vattamāne nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasat-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha maggas. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ

samudayas. ca nirujjhati.

satīti? Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa

bhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
samudayas. nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ catuvokārā pañcavokārā

dukhas. ca nirujjhati, samudayas. ca nirujjhissati. Y. v.
p. y. samudayas. . . . Catuvokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa

     Y. y. dukkhas. nirujjhati, t. t. maggas. nirujjhissatīti?
Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅ-
gakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti
tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe apāyā1
asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesan tattha dukkhas. nirujjhati,
no ca tesaṃ tattha maggas. nirujjhissati; *pañcavokāre
maggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe* yassa cittassa anantarā agga-
maggan paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye
c' aññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte
cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. ca nirujjhati
maggas. ca nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. y. maggas. . . .
Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā
aggamaggan paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe
ye c' aññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa
ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha maggas. nirujjhissati no ca
tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. nirujjhati; *pañcavokāre maggassa2
bhaṅgakkhaṇe* yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ
paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye c' aññe
maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. omits.
* to *. Br. omits.
2 S. substitutes cittassa.


[page 210]
210                      Saccayamakaṃ
bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha maggas. ca nirujjhissati,
dukkhas. ca nirujjhati.
     Y. y. samudayas. nirujjhati, t. t. maggas. nirujjhissatīti?
Āpāyikānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti
tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha samudayas.
nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha maggas. nirujjhissati; ye
maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ
tattha samudayas. ca nirujjhati, maggas. ca nirujjhissati.
Y. v. p. y. maggas. . . . Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe
yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti *tassa
cittassa uppādakkhaṇe*1 ye c' aññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti
tesaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vatta-
māne tesaṃ tattha maggas. nirujjhissati, no ca tesan tattha
samudayas. nirujjhati; ye2 maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ
taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha maggas. ca nirujjhis-
sati, samudayas. ca nirujjhati.
     10. i. Yassa dukkhas. na nirujjhati, tassa samudayas.
na nirujjhissatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cit-
tassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca
bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ
samudayas. na nirujjhissati;3 aggamaggassa uppādak-
khaṇe4 arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa
anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppā-
dakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe
tesaṃ dukkhas. ca na nirujjhati, samudayas. ca na niruj-
jhissati. Y. v. p. samudayas. . . . Aggamaggassa
bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe yassa
cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa
bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayas. na nirujjhissati, no ca
tesaṃ dukkhas. na nirujjhati; aggamaggassa uppādak-
khaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa
anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppā-
dakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. and Br. omit * to *.
2 S. inserts ca.
3 S. inserts tassa dukkhasaccaṃ na nirujjhatīti.
4 S. substitutes bhangakkhaṇe.


[page 211]
                          Saccayamakaṃ                    211
tesaṃ samudayas. ca na nirujjhissati, dukkhas. ca na
nirujjhati.
     Yassa dukkhas. na nirujjhati, tassa maggas. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa
anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppā-
dakkhaṇe ye c' aññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa
ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas. na nirujjhati,
no ca tesaṃ maggas. na nirujjhissati; arahantānaṃ cittassa
uppādakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti
tesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe
maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas. ca
na nirujjhati, maggas. ca na nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. maggas.
. . . Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa
bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggan na paṭilabhissanti
tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ
maggas. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ dukkhas. na niruj-
jhati; arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye ca puthuj-
janā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte
cittassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca
bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggas. ca na nirujjhissati, dukkhas.
ca na nirujjhati.
     Yassa samudayas. na nirujjhati, tassa maggas. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa
anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti *tassa cittassa
uppādakkhaṇe* ye c' aññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ
taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne
nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ samudayas.
na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ maggas. na nirujjhissati;1
aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ ye ca puthuj-
janā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya uppādak-
khaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne *nirodhasamāpan-
nānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ* tesaṃ samudayas. ca na nirujjhati,
maggas. ca nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. maggas. . . . Ye
{puthujjanā} maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti, tesaṃ taṇhāya
bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggas. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ

1 S. inserts tassa.

212                      Saccayamakaṃ
samudayas. na nirujjhati; aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
arahantānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti
tesaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte1 vatta-
māne *nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ* tesaṃ
maggas. ca na nirujjhissati, samudayas. ca na nirujjhati.

nirujjhissatīti? Catuvokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ uppajjantānaṃ
pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa
ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. na nirujjhati, no
ca tesaṃ tattha samudayas. na nirujjhissati; aggamaggassa
uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa
cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa
uppādakkhaṇe3 arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgak-
khaṇe asaññasattaṃ4 uppajjantānaṃ4 tesaṃ tattha dukkhas.
ca na nirujjhati, samudayas. ca na nirujjhissati. Y. v. p.
y. samudayas. . . . Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ara-
hantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā
aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe

jhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. na nirujjhati; agga-
maggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādak-

tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe5 arūpe maggassa ca phalassa
ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ4 uppajjantānaṃ4 tesaṃ
tattha samudayas. ca na nirujjhissati, dukkhas. na niruj-
jhati. Y. y. dukkhas. na nirujjhati, t. t. maggas. na niruj-
jhissatīti?6 Pañcavokāre aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe
yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa
cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye c' aññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti

tesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe

puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ

tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. ca na nirujjhati, maggas. ca na
nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. y. maggas. . . . Aggamaggassa

pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe apāyā1 asaññasattā cavan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha maggas. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ

dakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti
tesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe

sattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha maggas. ca na nirujjhis-
sati, dukkhas. ca na nirujjhati.

na nirujjhati; aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ
ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya

uppādakkhaṇe {taṇhāvippayuttacitte}1 vattamāne asaññat-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha maggas. ca na nirujjhissati, samudayas.
ca nirujjhati.
     11. i. Yassa dukkhas. nirujjhittha, tassa samudayas.
nirujjhissatīti? Aggamaggasamaṅgīnaṃ arahantānaṃ
yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti, tesaṃ
dukkhas. nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ samudayas. nirujjhis-
sati; itaresaṃ2 dukkhas. ca nirujjhittha, samudayas. ca
nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. samudayas.3 . . . pe . . . Āmantā.

satīti? Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ ye ca
puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti, tesaṃ dukkhas.
nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ maggas. nirujjhissati; aggamag-
gassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ
paṭilabhissanti ye c' aññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti, tesaṃ
dukkhas. ca nirujjhittha, maggas. ca nirujjhissati. Y. v. p.
maggas.4 . . . pe . . . Āmantā. Yassa* samudayas. niruj-
jhittha, tassa maggas. nirujjhissatīti?*5 Aggamaggassa
bhaṃgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na

maggas. nirujjhissati; aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa

nirujjhissatīti? Aggamaggasamaṅgīnaṃ arahantānaṃ

. . . Suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesan tattha samudayas.
nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. nirujjhittha;

santi ye c' aññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti, tesaṃ tattha
dukkhas. ca nirujjhittha, maggas. ca nirujjhissati. Y. v.

tattha maggas. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dukkhas.

dukkhas. ca nirujjhittha.

paṭilabhissanti, tesaṃ tattha samudayas. ca nirujjhittha,
maggas. ca nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. y. maggas . . . Sud-
dhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte vattamāne tesaṃ tattha maggas.
nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha samudayas. nirujjhittha;

na nirujjhissatīti? Natthi. Y. v. p. samudayas. . . .
Nirujjhittha.

216                 Saccayamakaṃ
     Yassa dukkhas. na nirujjhitthaṃ, tassa maggas. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Natthi. Y. v. p. maggas. . . . pe . . .
Nirujjhittha.
     Yassa samudayas. na nirujjhittha, tassa maggas. na
nirujjhissatīti? Natthi. Y. v. p. maggas. . . . pe . . .
Nirujjhittha.
     ii. Yattha dukkhas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. dukkhas. na nirujjhittha, t. t. samudayas. na
nirujjhissatīti? Nirujjhissati.1 y. v. p. y. samudayas.
. . . Nirujjhittha.
     Y. y. dukkhas. na nirujjhittha, t. t. maggas. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. y. . . . pe . . .
Nirujjhittha.
     Y. y. samudayas. na nirujjhittha, t. t. maggas. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte vattamāne tesaṃ
tattha samudayas. na nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha
maggas. na nirujjhissati; asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
samudayas. ca na nirujjhittha, maggas. ca na nirujjhissati.
Y. v. p. y. maggas. . . . Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
arahantānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti,1
tesaṃ tattha* maggas. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ*
samudayas. na nirujjhittha; asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
maggas. ca na nirujjhissati, samudayas. ca na niruj-
jhittha.
                                NIRODHAVĀRAṂ NIṬṬHITAṂ.
                                [Uppāda-nirodha-rāro]
     1. i. Yassa dukkhas. uppajjati, tassa samudayas. niruj-
jhatīti? No. Y. v. p. samudayas. . . . No.
     Yassa dukkhas. uppajjati, tassa maggas. nirujjhatīti?
No. Y. v. p. maggas. . . . No.
     Yassa samudayas. uppajjati, tassa maggas. nirujjhatīti?
No. Y. v. p. maggas. . . . No.
     ii. Yattha dukkhas. uppajjati, tattha samudayas. niruj-
jhatīti? Asaññasatte tattha dukkhas. uppajjati, no ca
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. inserts āpāyikānaṃ.
* to * S. omits.


[page 217]
                          Saccayamakaṃ                 217
tattha samudayas. nirujjhati. (Yatthakaṃ Uppādavāre pi
Nirodhavāre pi Uppādanirodhavāre pi sadisaṃ, natthi
nānākaraṇaṃ.1)
     iii. Y. y. dukkhas. *uppajjati, t. t. samudayas.* niruj-
jhatīti?2 . . . . (Yassakaṃ pi yassayatthakaṃ pi sadisaṃ.)
     2. i. Yassa dukkhas. nuppajjati, tassa samudayas. na
nirujjhatīti? Taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas.
nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ samudayas. na nirujjhati; sab-
besaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte taṇhāvippayuttacittassa bhaṅ-
gakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe
tesaṃ dukkhas. ca nuppajjati, samudayas. ca na nirujjhati.
Y. v. p. samudayas. na nirujjhati, tassa dukkhas. nuppaj-
jatīti? Sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādak-
khaṇe tesaṃ samudayas. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ
dukkhas. nuppajjati; sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte taṇ
hāvippayuttacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca
phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayas. ca na niruj-
jhati, dukkhas. ca nuppajjati.
     Yassa dukkhas. nuppajjati, tassa maggas. na nirujjhatīti?
Maggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas. nuppajjati, no ca
tesaṃ maggas. na nirujjhati; sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte
maggavippayuttacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca
phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas. ca nuppajjati,
maggas. ca na nirujjhati. Y. v. p. maggas. . . . Sab-
besaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ
maggas. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ dukkhas. nirujjhati;
sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte maggavippayuttacittassa
bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādak-
khaṇe tesaṃ maggas. ca na nirujjhati, dukkhas. ca nup-
pajjati.
     Yassa samudayas. nuppajjati, tassa maggas. na niruj-
jhatīti? Maggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayas.
nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ maggas. na nirujjhati; taṇhā-
vippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe maggavippayuttacittassa
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. ninnānākaraṇaṃ.
* to * Br. omits.
2 Br. inserts No.


[page 218]
218                      Saccayamakaṃ
bhaṅgakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ
samudayas. ca nuppajjati, maggas. ca na nirujjhati. Y.
v. p. maggas . . . Taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ mag-
gas. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ samudayas. nuppajjati;
taṇhāvippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe maggavippayutta-
cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasat-
tānaṃ tesaṃ maggas. ca na nirujjhati, samudayas. ca
nuppajjati.
     ii. Yattha dukkhas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. dukkhas. nuppajjati, . . . pe . . . (yassakaṃ1
pi yassayatthakaṃ2 pi sadisaṃ. Yassayatthake3 {nirodhasam-
āpannānan} ti na kātābbaṃ.)
     3,4. i. Yassa dukkhas. uppajjittha, tassa samudayas.
nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā. Y. v. p. samudayas . . . pe
. . . Āmantā. (Atītā pucchā, yathā Uppādavāre vibhattā,
evaṃ Uppādanirodhavāre4 pi anulomaṃ pi paccaniyaṃ pi5
vibhajitabbaṃ.)
     5. i. Yassa dukkhas. uppajjissati, tassa samudayas.
nirujjhissatīti? Aggamaggasamaṅgīnaṃ arahantānaṃ
yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti, tesaṃ
dukkhas. uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ samudayas. nirujjhis-
sati; itaresaṃ6 dukkhas. ca uppajjissati, samudayas. ca
nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. samudayas. . . . pe . . . Āmantā.
     Yassa dukkhas. uppajjissati, tassa maggas. nirujjhis-
satīti? Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ ye ca
puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti, tesaṃ dukkhas.
uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ maggas. nirujjhissati; aggamag-
gassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ
paṭilabhissanti *ye c' aññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti* tesaṃ
dukkhas. ca uppajjissati, maggas. ca nirujjhissati. Y. v.
p. maggas.7 . . . pe . . . Āmantā.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. yassakam pi.
2 Br. -yatthakam pi.
3 K. adds pi ca.
4 K. and Br. omit -vāre.
5 Br. paccanīyam pi.
6 Br. inserts tesaṃ.
* to * S. omits.
7 Br. omits.


[page 219]
                           Saccayamakaṃ                     219
     Yassa samudayas. uppajjissati, tassa maggas. nirujjhis-
satīti? Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti, tesaṃ
samudayas. uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ maggas. nirujjhissati;
ye maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ samudayas. ca uppaj-
jissati, maggas. ca nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. maggas. . . .
Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā
aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti *tesaṃ maggas. nirujjhissati,
no ca tesaṃ samudayas. uppajjissati*; ye1 maggaṃ paṭila-
bhissanti, tesaṃ maggas. ca nirujjhissati, samudayas. ca
uppajjissati.
     2ii. Yattha dukkhas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. dukkhas. uppajjissati, tassa tattha samudayas.
nirujjhissatīti? Aggamaggasamaṅgīnaṃ *arahantānaṃ
yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti*
asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. uppajjissati, no ca
tesaṃ tattha samudayas. nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ catuvo-
kārānaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. ca uppaj-
jissati, samudayas. ca nirujjhissati. (Yassakaṃ3 pi yas-
sayatthakaṃ pi sadisaṃ.)
     6. i. Yassa dukkhas. nuppajjissati, tassa samudayas. na
nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā. Y. v. p. samudayas. . . .
Aggamaggasamaṅgīnaṃ arahantānaṃ yassa cittassa anan-
tarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti, tesaṃ samudayas. na
nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ dukkhas. nuppajjissati; pacchi-
macittasamaṅgīnaṃ tesaṃ samudayas. ca na nirujjhissati,
dukkhas. ca nuppajjissati.
     Yassa dukkhas. nuppajjissati, tassa maggas. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Āmantā. Y. v. p. maggas. . . .4 Aggamag-
gassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ
na paṭilabhissanti, tesaṃ maggas. na nirujjhissati, no ca

nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ maggas. na nirujjhissati; agga-

maggas. ca na nirujjhissati, samudayas. ca nuppajjissati.

     iii. Y. y. dukkhas nuppajjissati (yassakaṃ pi yassayat-
thakaṃ pi sadisaṃ) . . . pe . . . samudayas. maggas.
(nānākaraṇaṃ:) . . . aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahan-
tānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha maggas. ca na niruj-
jhissati, samudayas. ca nuppajjissati.)
     7. i. Yassa dukkhas. uppajjati, tassa samudayas. niruj-
jhitthāti? {Āmantā}.12 (Paccuppannenātītā pucchā Uppā-
davāre pi Uppādanirodhavāre pi yassakaṃ pi yatthakaṃ pi
yassayatthakaṃ pi anulomaṃ pi paccaniyaṃ3 pi sadisaṃ
asammohantena ribhajitabbaṃ.)4
     9. i. Yassa dukkhas. uppajjati, tassa samudayas. niruj-
jhissatīti? Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ
cittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamag-
gaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ
dukkhas. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ samudayas. nirujjhissati;
itaresaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ
dukkhas. ca uppajjati, samudayas. ca nirujjhissati. Y. v. p.
samudayas. . . . Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittasse
bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādak-
