                          Saccayamakaṃ                      221
{khaṇe} tesaṃ samudayas. nirujjhissati, no ca t. dukkhas.
uppajjati; sabbesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppā-
dakkhaṇe t. samudayas., dukkhas. ca . . . uppajjati.
Yassa dukkhas. uppajjati, tassa maggas. nirujjhissatīti?
Arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā
maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte
cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas. uppajjati, no1 ca2
tesaṃ3 maggas. nirujjhissati; aggamaggassa uppādak-
khaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti

bhissanti tesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādak-
khaṇe tesaṃ dukkhas. ca uppajjati, maggas. ca nirujjhis-
sati. Y. v. p. maggas. . . . *Aggamaggassa bhaṅgak-
khaṇe,* yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhis-
santi tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye c' aññe maggaṃ
paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgak-
khaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ
maggasaccaṃ nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ dukkhas. uppajjati;
aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā
aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe
ye c' aññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ uppajjantānaṃ
pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggas. ca nirujjhis-
sati, dukkhas. ca uppajjati.

satīti? Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ
taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayas. uppajjati, no ca
tesaṃ maggas. nirujjhissati; ye4 maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti,
tesaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayas. ca uppaj-
jati, maggas. ca nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. maggas. . . .

aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti *tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe*
ye c' aññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgak-
khaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne nirodhasamāpan-

tesaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggas. ca nirujjhissati,

dayas. ca nirujjhissati, dukkhas. ca uppajjati.

cittassa uppādakkhaṇe apāyaṃ3 asaññasattaṃ uppajjan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
maggas. nirujjhissati; aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa

dukkhas. ca uppajjati, maggas. ca nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. y.
maggas. . . . Aggamaggassa4 bhaṅgakkhaṇe5 yassa

bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye ca1
puthujjanā2 maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ
pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa
ca uppādakkhaṇe apāyā3 asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha dukkhas. ca nuppajjati, maggas. ca na nirujjhissati.
Y. v. p. y. maggas. . . . Arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādak-
khaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe apāyaṃ3
asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha maggas. na
nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dukkhas. nuppajjati;
aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅ-
gakkhaṇe ye ca4 puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti
tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe
maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe apāyā3 asañña-
sattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha maggas. ca na nirujjhissati,
dukkhas. ca nuppajjati.
     Y. y. samudayas. nuppajjati, t. t. maggas. na nirujjhissa-
tīti? Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā
aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe
ye c' aññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅ-
gakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne tesaṃ tattha
samudayas. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha maggas. na
nirujjhissati; aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ
ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya
bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne asaññasat-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha samudayas. ca nuppajjati, maggas. ca
na nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. y. maggas. . . . Āpāyikānaṃ
ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya
uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha maggas. na nirujjhissati, no
ca tesaṃ tattha samudayas. nuppajjati; aggamaggassa
bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na
paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippa-
yuttacitte vattamāne asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha maggas.
ca na nirujjhissati, samudayas. ca nuppajjati.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. and Br.: c' aññe.
2 S. and Br. omit.
3 Br. omits.
4 S. substitutes c' aññe.


[page 227]
                          Saccayamakaṃ                      227
     11. i. Yassa dukkhas. uppajjittha, tassa samudayas.
nirujjhissatīti? (Yathā Nirodhavāre atītenānāgatā1 pucchā
anulomaṃ pi paccaniyaṃ pi vibhattaṃ2 evaṃ Uppādanirodha-
vāre pi asammohantena vibhajitabbaṃ.)
                    UPPĀDANIRODHAVĀRAṂ NIṬṬHITAṂ.
                           [Pariññāvāro. ]
     1. Yo dukkhas. parijānāti, so samudayas. pajahatīti?
Āmantā. Yo vā pana samudayas. pajahati, so dukkhas.
parijānātīti? Āmantā.
     2. Yo dukkhas. na parijānāti, so samudayas. nappajaha-
tīti?3 Āmantā. Yo vā pana samudayas. nappajahati, so
dukkhas. na parijānātīti? Āmantā.
     3. Yo dukkhas. parijānittha, so samudayas. pajahitthāti?
Āmantā. Yo vā pana samudayas. pajahittha, so dukkhas.
parijānitthāti? Āmantā.
     4. Yo dukkhas. na parijānittha, so samudayas. nappa-
jahitthāti?4 Āmantā. Yo vā pana . . . pe . . . Āmantā.
     5. Yo dukkhas. parijānissati, so samudayas. pajahissa-
tīti? Āmantā. Yo vā pana . . . pe . . . Āmantā.
     6. Yo dukkhas. na parijānissati, so samudayas. nappa-
jahissatīti? Āmantā. Yo vā pana . . . Āmantā.
     7. Yo dukkhas. parijānāti, so samudayas. pajahitthāti?
No. Yo vā pana . . . pe . . . No.
     8. Yo dukkhas. na parijānāti, so samudayas. nappaja-
hitthāti? Arahā dukkhas. na parijānāti, no ca samu-
dayas. nappajahittha, aggamaggasamaṅgiñ ca arahantañ
ca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā dukkhas. ca na parijānanti,
samudayas. ca nappajahittha. Yo vā pana samudayas.
nappajahittha, so dukkhas. na parijānātīti? Aggamag-
gasamaṅgī samudayas. nappajahittha, no ca dukkhas. na
parijānāti; aggamaggasamaṅgiñ ca arahantañ ca ṭhapetvā
avasesā puggalā samudayas. ca nappajahittha, dukkhas.
ca na parijānanti.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. atītā anāgatā.
2 Br. vibhattā.
3 Br. na pajahatīti.
4 Br. na pajahitthāti throughout.


[page 228]
228                      Saccayamakaṃ
     9. Yo dukkhas. parijānāti, so samudayas. pajahissatīti?
No. Yo vā pana . . . pe . . . No.
     10. Yo dukkhas. na parijānāti, so samudayas. {nappaja-
hissatīti}? Ye maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti, te dukkhas. na
parijānanti, no ca samudayas. nappajahissanti; arahā ye
ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti, te dukkhas. ca
na parijānanti, samudayas. ca nappajahissanti. Ye vā
pana samudayas. nappajahissati, so dukkhas. na pari-
jānātīti? Aggamaggasamaṅgī samudayas. nappajahissati,
no ca dukkhas. na parijānāti; arahā ye ca puthujjanā
maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti, te samudayas. ca nappajahis-
santi, dukkhas. ca na parijānanti.
     11. Yo dukkhas. parijānittha, so samudayas. pajahis-
satīti? No. Yo vā pana,.. pe . . . No.
     12. Yo dukkhas. na parijānittha, so samudayas. nappa-
jahissatīti? Ye maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti, te dukkhas. na
parijānittha, no ca samudayas.1 nappajahissanti; aggamag-
gasamaṅgī ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti,
te dukkhas. ca na parijānittha, samudayas. ca nappajahis-
santi. Yo vā pana samudayas. nappajahissati, so dukkhas.
na parijānitthāti? Arahā samudayas. nappajahissati, no
ca dukkhas. na parijānittha; aggamaggasamaṅgī ye ca
puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti, te samudayas. ca
nappajahissanti, dukkhas. ca na parijānitthāti.
                       PARIÑÑĀVĀRAṂ NIṬṬHITAṂ.
             SACCAYAMAKAṂ NIṬṬHITAṂ PAÑCAMAṂ PARIPUṆṆAṂ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. inserts te.


[page 229]
                               229
                                VI.
                          SAṄKHĀRAYAMAKAṂ.1
     Tayo saṅkhārā: (1s) kāyasaṅkhāro (2s) vacīsaṅkhāro
(3s) cittasaṅkhāro. Assāsapassāsā kāyasaṅkhāro, vitak-
kavicārā vacīsaṅkhāro, saññā ca vedanā ca cittasaṅkhāro,2
ṭhapetvā vitakkavicāre sabbe pi cittasampayuttakā dhammā
cittasaṅkhāro.
     Kāyo kāyasaṅkhāro, kāyasaṅkhāro kāyo; vacī vacīsaṅ-
khāro, vacīsaṅkhāro vacī; cittaṃ cittasaṅkhāro, {cittasaṅ-
khāro} cittaṃ.
     Na kāyo na kāyasaṅkhāro, na kāyasaṅkhāro na kāyo;
na vacī . . . (as for kāyo) . . . na cittaṃ . . .
     Kāyo kāyasaṅkhāro, saṅkhārā vacīsaṅkhāro; kāyo
kāyasaṅkhāro, saṅkhārā cittasaṅkhāro. Vacī vacīsaṅkhāro,
saṅkhārā kāyasaṅkhāro . . . (as for kāyo) . . . {cittasaṅ-
khāro}. Cittaṃ cittasaṅkhāro, saṅkhārā kāyasaṅkhāro . . .
vacīsaṅkhāro.
     Na kāyo na kāyasaṅkhāro, na saṅkhārā na vacīsaṅkhāro;
na kāyo na kāyasaṅkhāro, na saṅkhārā na cittasaṅkhāro.
Na vacī na vacīsaṅkhāro, na saṅkhārā na kāyasaṅkhāro
. . . (as for kāyo) . . . na cittasaṅkhāro. Na cittaṃ na
cittasaṅkhāro, na saṅkhārā na kāyasaṅkhāro . . . na
vacīsaṅkhāro.
     Kāyasaṅkhāro vacīsaṅkhāro, vacīsaṅkhāro kāyasaṅkhāro;
kāyasaṅkhāro cittasaṅkhāro, cittasaṅkhāro kāyasaṅkhāro.
Vacīsaṅkhāro cittasaṅkhāro, cittasaṅkhāro vacīsaṅkhāro.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. begins Namo tassa, etc.
2 M. i. 301 (Cūḷavedalla-sutta).


[page 230]
230                      Saṅkhārayamakaṃ
     Na kāyasaṅkhāro na vacīsaṅkhāro . . . (as in preceding
paragraph, but with negative forms).
                            UDDESAVĀRAṂ.
                           [Paṇṇattivāro. ]
     Kāyo kāyasaṅkhāro ti? No. Kāyasaṅkhāro kāyo ti?
No. Vacī vacīsaṅkhāro ti? No. Vacīsaṅkhāro vacī ti?
No. Cittaṃ cittasaṅkhāro ti? No. Cittasaṅkhāro cittan
ti? No.
     Na kāyo na kāyasaṅkhāro ti? Kāyasaṅkhāro na kāyo,
kāyasaṅkhāro; kāyañ ca kāyasaṅkhārañ ca ṭhapetvā
avasesā* na ceva kāyo na ca kāyasaṅkhāro. Na kāya-
saṅkhāro na kāyo ti? Kāyo na kāyasaṅkhāro, kāyo;
kāyañ ca kāyasaṅkhārañ ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva kāyo
na ca kāyasaṅkhāro. Na vacī na vacīsaṅkhāro ti? . . .
(as for kāyo) . . . na ca cittasaṅkhāro.
     Kāyo kāyasaṅkhāro ti? No. Saṅkhārā vacīsaṅkhāro
ti? Vacīsaṅkhāro saṅkhāro ceva vacīsaṅkhāro ca, avasesā
saṅkhārā saṅkhārā, na vacīsaṅkhāro. Kāyo kāyasaṅkhāro
ti? No. Saṅkhārā cittasaṅkhāro ti? Cittasaṅkhāro saṅ-
khāro ceva cittasaṅkhāro ca, avasesā saṅkhārā saṅkhārā,1
na cittasaṅkhāro. Vacī vacīsaṅkhāro ti? No.
Saṅkhārā kāyasaṅkhāro ti? Kāyasaṅkhāro saṅkhāro ceva
kāyasaṅkhāro ca, avasesā saṅkhārā saṅkhārā,1 na kāya-
saṅkhāro. Vacī vacīsaṅkhāro ti? No. Saṅkhārā citta-
saṅkhāro ti? Cittasaṅkhāro saṅkhāro ceva cittasaṅkhāro
ca, avasesā saṅkhārā saṅkhārā,1 na cittasaṅkhāro.
Cittaṃ cittasaṅkhāro ti? No. Saṅkhārā kāyasaṅkhāro ti?
Kāyasaṃkhāro saṅkhāro ceva kāyasaṅkhāro ca, avasesā
saṅkhārā saṅkhārā,1 na kāyasaṅkhāro. Cittaṃ cittasaṅ-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
* K (footnote): Avasesan ti: na kevalaṃ sesasankhāradvayam
     eva, kāyasankhāravinimuttaṃ pana sesaṃ sabbam pi
     sankhatāsankhatapaṇṇattibhedaṃ dhammajātaṃ neva kāyo
     na kāyasankhāro ti. Aṭṭhakathā.
1 Br. omits.


[page 231]
                          Saṅkhārayamakaṃ                   231
khāro ti? No. Saṅkhārā vacīsaṅkhāro ti? Vacīsaṅkhāro
saṅkhāro ceva vacīsaṅkhāro ca, avasesā saṅkhārā saṅ-
khārā,1 na vacīsaṅkhāro.
     Na kāyo na kāyasaṅkhāro ti? Kāyasaṅkhāro na kāyo,
kāyasaṅkhāro; kāyañ ca kāyasaṅkhārañ ca ṭhapetvā
avasesā na ceva kāyo na ca kāyasaṅkhāro. Na saṅkhārā
na vacīsaṅkhāro ti? Āmantā. Na kāyo na kāyasaṅkhāro
ti? Kāyasaṅkhāro . . . (as in first reply) . . . na ca kāya-
saṅkhāro. Na saṅkhārā na cittasaṅkhāro ti? Āmantā.
     Na vacī na vacīsaṅkhāro ti? Vacīsaṅkhāro na vacī,
vacīsaṅkhāro; vaciñ ca vacīsaṅkhārañ ca ṭhapetvā avasesā
na ceva vacī na ca vacīsaṅkhāro. Na saṅkhārā na {kāyasaṅ-
khāro} ti? . . . pe . . .2 Na saṅkhārā na cittasaṅkhāro
ti? Āmantā. Na cittaṃ na cittasaṅkhāro ti?
cittasaṅkhāro na cittaṃ, cittasaṅkhāro; cittañ ca citta-
saṅkhārañ ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva citta na ca citta-
saṅkhāro. Na saṅkhārā na kāyasaṅkhāro ti? . . . pe . . .
Na saṅkhārā na vacīsaṅkhāro ti? {Āmantā}.
     Kāyasaṅkhāro vacīsaṅkhāro ti? No. Vacīsaṅkhāro
kāyasaṅkhāro ti? No . . . (etc., thus: 1s 3s? 3s 1s?
2s 3s? 3s 2s?3).
     Na kāyasaṅkhāro na vacīsaṅkhāro ti? Vacīsaṅkhāro na
kāyasaṅkhāro, vacīsaṅkhāro; kāyasaṅkhārañ ca {vacīsaṅ-
khārañ} ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva kāyasaṅkhāro na
ca vacīsaṅkhāro. Na vacīsaṅkhāro na kāyasaṅkhāro ti?
Kāyasaṅkhāro na vacīsaṅkhāro . . . pe . . . (the converse
of the preceding reply). Na kāyasaṅkhāro na
cittasaṅkhāro ti? . . . (reply and converse question and
reply as for 1s 2s. So also for 2s 3s).
                      PAṆṆATTIVĀRAṂ NIṬṬHITAṂ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. omits.
2 Br. inserts Āmantā. Na vacī na vacīsankhāro ti, vacīsankhāro
     na vacī, vacīsankhāro; vaciñ ca vacīsankhārañ ca ṭhapetvā
     avasesā na ceva vacī na ca vacīsankhāro.
3 See p. 229, first sentence.


[page 232]
232                      Saṅkhārayamakaṃ
                            [Uppādavāro. ]
     1. i. Yassa kāyasaṅkhāro uppajjati, tassa vacīsaṅkhāro
uppajjatīti? Vinā vitakkavicārehi assāsapassāsānaṃ uppā-
dakkhaṇe tesaṃ kāyas. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ vacīs. uppaj-
jati; paṭhamajjhānaṃ1 samāpannānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ
assāsapassāsānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ kāyas. ca uppajjati,
vacīs. ca uppajjati. Y. v. p. vacīs. . . . Vinā assāsapassā-
sehi vitakkavicārānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ vacīs. uppajjati,
no ca tesaṃ kāyas. uppajjāti; paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpan-
nānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe
tesaṃ vacīs. ca uppajjati, kāyas. ca uppajjati.
     Yassa kāyas. uppajjati, tassa cittas. uppajjatīti? Āmantā.
Y. v. p. cittas. . . .Vinā assāsapassāsehi cittassa uppā-
dakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittas. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ kāyas.
uppajjati; assāsapassāsānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittas.
ca uppajjati, kāyas. ca uppajjati.
     Yassa vacīs. uppajjati, tassa cittas. uppajjatīti? Āmantā.
Y. v. p. cittas. . . . Vinā vitakkavicārehi cittassa uppā-
dakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittas. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ vacīs. uppaj-
jati; vitakkavicārānaṃ uppādakkhane tesaṃ cittas. ca
uppajjati, vacīs. ca uppajjati.
     ii. Yattha kāyas. uppajjati, tattha vacīs. uppajjatīti?
Dutiyajjhāne tatiyajjhāne tattha kāyas. uppajjati, no ca
tattha vacīs. uppajjati; paṭhamajjhāne kāmāvacare tattha
kāyas. ca uppajjati, vacīs. ca uppajjati. Y. v. p. vacīs.
. . . Rūpāvacare2 tattha vacīs. uppajjati, no ca tattha
kāyas. uppajjati; paṭhamajjhāne . . . (as above) . . .
uppajjati.
     Yattha kāyas. uppajjati, tattha cittas. uppajjatīti?
Āmantā. Y. v. p. cittas. . . . Catutthajjhāne rūpāvacare2
arūpāvacare tattha cittas. uppajjati, no ca tattha kāyas.
uppajjati; paṭhamajjhāne dutiyajjhāne tatiyajjhāne kāmā-
vacare tattha cittas. ca uppajjati, kāyas. ca uppajjati.
     Yattha vacīs. uppajjāti, tattha citta. uppajjatīti?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. paṭhamajhānaṃ, dutiyajhānaṃ, etc., throughout.
2 Br. inserts arūpāvacare.


[page 233]
                          Saṅkhārayamakaṃ                   233
Āmantā. Y. v. p. cittas. . . . Dutiyajjhāne tatiyajjhāne
catutthajjhāne tattha cittas. uppajjati, no ca tattha vacīs.
uppajjati; paṭhamajjhāne kāmāvacare rūpāvacare arūpā-
vacare tattha cittas. . . . vacīs. ca uppajjati.
     iii. Y. y. kāyas. . . . pe . . . (yassakaṃ di yassayatthakaṃ
pi sadisaṃ).
     2. i. Yassa kāyas. nuppajjati, tassa vācīs. nuppajjatīti?
Vinā assāsapassāsehi vitakkavicārānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ
kāyas. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ vacīs. nuppajjati; sabbesaṃ
cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe vinā assāsapassāsehi avitakka-
avicāracittassa uppādakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asañ-
ñasattānaṃ tesaṃ kāyas. ca nuppajjati, vacīs. ca nuppajjati.
Y. v. p. vacīs. . . . Vinā vitakkavicārehi assāsapassāsānaṃ
uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ vacīs. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ kāyas.
nuppajjati; sabbesaṃ . . . (as in foregoing reply) . . . tesaṃ
vacīs. ca nuppajjati, kāyas. ca nuppajjati.
     Yassa kāyas. nuppajjati, tassa cittas. nuppajjatīti?
Vinā assāsapassāsehi cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ kāyas.
nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cittas. nuppajjati; sabbesan cit-
tassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ
tesaṃ kāyas. ca nuppajjati, cittas. ca nuppajjati. Y. v. p.
cittas. . . . Āmantā.
     Yassa vacīs. nuppajjati, tassa cittas. nuppajjatīti? Vinā
vitakkavicārehi cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ vacīs. nuppaj-
jati, no ca tesaṃ cittas. nuppajjati: sabbesan . . . (as in
preceding paragraph) . . . tesaṃ vacīs. . . . cittas. ca nuppaj-
jati. Y. v. p. . . . pe . . . Āmantā.
     ii. Yattha kāyas. nuppajjati, tattha vacīs. nuppajjatīti?
Rūpāvacare arūpāvacare tattha kāyas. nuppajjati, no ca
tattha vacīs. nuppajjati; catutthajjhāne asaññasatte tattha
kāyas. ca nuppajjati, vacīs. ca nuppajjati. Y. v. p. vacīs.
. . . Dutiyajjhāne tatiyajjhāne tattha vacīs. nuppajjati,
no ca tattha kāyas. nuppajjati; catutthajjhāne asaññasatte
tattha vacīs. ca nuppajjatti, kāyas. ca nuppajjati.
     Yattha kāyas. nuppajjati, tattha cittas. nuppajjatīti?
Catutthajhāne rūpāvacare arūpāvacare tattha kāyas.
nuppajjati, no ca tattha cittas. nuppajjati; asaññasatte
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 234]
234                      Saṅkhārayamakaṃ
tattha kāyas. ca nuppajjati, cittas. ca nuppajjati. Y. v. p.
. . . pe . . . Āmantā.
     Yattha vacīs. nuppajjati, tattha cittas. nuppajjatīti?
Dutiya-, tatiya-, catuttha-jjhāne tattha vacīs. nuppajjati,
no ca tattha cittas. nuppajjati; asaññasatte tattha vacīs.
ca nuppajjati cittas. ca nuppajjati. Y. v. p. . . . pe . . .
Āmantā.
     iii. Y. y. kāyas. nuppajjati, t. t. vacīs. nuppajjatīti?
Vinā assāsapassāsehi vitakkavicārānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ
tattha kāyas. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha vacīs. nuppaj-
jati; sabbesaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe vinā assāsapassāsehi
avitakka-avicāra-cittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha kāyas. ca nuppajjati, vacīs. ca nuppajjati.
(Yassakaṃ pi yassayatthakaṃ pi sadisaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
Yassayatthake nirodhasamāpannānaṃ ti na labbhati.1)
     3. i. Yassa kāyas. uppajjittha, tassa vacīs. uppajjitthāti?
Āmantā. Y. v. p. vacīs . . . pe . . . Āmantā.
     Yassa kāyas. uppajjittha, tassa cittas. uppajjitthāti?
Āmantā. Y. v. p. cittas. . . . pe . . . Āmantā.
     ii. Yattha kāyas. . . . pe . . . (yatthakaṃ pi sabbattha
ekasadisaṃ).
     iii. Y. y. kāyas. uppajjittha, t. t. vacīs. uppajjitthāti?
Dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
kāyas. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha vacīs. uppajjittha;
paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha kāyas. ca uppajjittha, vacīs. ca uppajjittha. Y. v.
p. y. vacīs. . . . Rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha vacīs. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas. uppaj-
jittha; paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha vacīs. ca uppajjittha, kāyas. ca uppajjittha.
     Y. y. kāyas. uppajjittha, t. t. cittas. uppajjitthāti?
Āmantā. Y. v. p. y. cittas. . . . Catutthajjhānaṃ samā-
pannānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesan tattha
cittas. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas. uppajjittha;
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. substitutes labhissanti.


[page 235]
                          Saṅkhārayamakaṃ                   235
paṭhamajjhānaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ samāpan-
nānaṃ kāmāvaccarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cittas. ca uppajjittha,
kāyas. ca uppajjittha.
     Y. y. vacīs. uppajjittha, t. t. cittas. uppajjitthāti?
Āmantā. Y. v. p. y. cittas. . . . Dutiya-, tatiya-, catuttha-
jjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte vatta-
māne, tesaṃ tattha cittas. uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha
vacīs. uppajjittha, paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ kāmā-
vacarānaṃ itaresaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha cittas. ca uppajjittha, vacīs. ca uppajjittha.
     4. i. Yassa kāyas. nuppajjittha, tassa vacīs. nuppaj-
jitthāti? Natthi. Y. v. p. vacīs. . . . pe . . . Natthi.
     Yassa kāyas. nuppajjittha, tassa cittas. nuppajjitthāti?
Natthi. Y. v. p. . . . Natthi.
     {Yassa} vacīs. nuppajjittha, tassa cittas. nuppajjitthāti?
Natthi. Y. v. p. . . . Natthi.
     ii. Yattha kāyas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. kāyas. nuppajjittha, t. t. vacīs. nuppajjitthāti?
Rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha kāyas. nuppaj-
jittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha vacīs. nuppajjittha; catutthaj-
jhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte vatta-
māne asaññasattānaṃ tesan tattha kāyas. ca nuppajjittha,
vacīs. ca nuppajjittha. Y. v. p. y. vacīs. . . . Dutiyaj-
jhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs.
nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas. nuppajjittha;
catutthajjhānaṃ . . . (as in last corresponding answer).
     Y. y. kāyas. nuppajjittha, tassa tattha cittas. nuppaj-
jitthāti? Catutthajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ
arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha kāyas. nuppajjittha, no ca
tesaṃ tattha cittas. nuppajjittha; suddhāvāsaṃ uppajjan-
tānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha kāyas. ca nuppajjittha,
cittas. ca nuppajjittha. Y. v. p. y. . . . pe . . . Āmantā.
     Y. y. vacīs. nuppajjittha, t. t. cittas. nuppajjitthāti?
Dutiya-, tatiya-, catuttha-jjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ suddhā-
vāsānaṃ dutiye citte vattamāne tesaṃ tattha vacīs. nuppaj-
jittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha cittas. nuppajjittha; suddhāvāsaṃ
uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs. ca nup-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 236]
236                      Saṅkhārayamakaṃ
pajjittha, cittas. ca nuppajjittha. Y. v. p. . . . pe . . .
Āmantā.
     5. i. Yassa kāyas. uppajjissati, tassa vacīs. uppajjissatīti?
Āmantā. Y. v. p. vacīs. . . . Yassa cittassa anantarā
kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati, rūpāvacare
arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ arūpā-
vacaraṃ uppajjitvā1 parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ cavantānaṃ
tesaṃ vacīs. uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ kāyas. uppajjissati;
itaresaṃ vacīs. ca uppajjissati, kāyas. ca uppajjissati.
     Yassa kāyas. uppajjissati, tassa cittas. uppajjissatīti?
Āmantā. Y. v. p. cittas. . . . Yassa cittassa anantarā
kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati, rūpāvacare
arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ arūpā-
vacaraṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ
tesaṃ cittas. uppajjissati, no ca tesan kāyas. uppajjissati;
itaresaṃ cittas. ca uppajjissati, kāyas. ca uppajjissati.
     Yassa vacīs. uppajjissati, tassa cittas. uppajjissatīti?
Āmantā. Y. v. p. cittas. . . . Yassa cittassa anantarā
avitakka-avicāra2-pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati, tesaṃ cittas.
uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ vacīs. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ
cittas. ca uppajjissati, vacīs. ca uppajjissati.
     ii. Yattha kāyas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. kāyas. uppajjissati, t. t. vacīs. uppaj-
jissatīti? Dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha kāyas. ca uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
vacīs. uppajjissati; {paṭhamajjhānaṃ} samāpannānaṃ kāmā-
vacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha kāyas. ca uppajjissati, vacīs.
ca uppajjissati. Y. v. p. y. vacīs. . . . Yassa cittassa
anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati rūpā-
vacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs. uppajjissati,
no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas. uppajjissati; paṭhamajjhānaṃ
samāpannānaṃ itaresaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs.
ca uppajjissati, kāyas. ca uppajjissati.
     Y. y. kāyas. uppajjissati, t. t. cittas. uppajjissatīti?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. upapajjitvā throughout.
2 Br. avicāraṃ throughout.


[page 237]
                          Saṅkhārayamakaṃ                               237
Āmantā. Y. v. p. y. cittas. . . . Yassa cittassa anantarā
kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati catutthaj-
jhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha cittas. uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas.
uppajjissati; paṭhama-, dutiya-, tatiya-jjhānaṃ samāpan-
nānaṃ itaresaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cittas. ca
uppajjissati, kāyas. ca uppajjissati.
     Y. y. vacīs. . . . cittas. uppajjissatīti? Āmantā. Y. v.
p. y. . . . Yassa cittassa anantarā avitakka-avicārapac-
chimacittaṃ uppajjissati dutiya-, tatiya-, catuttha-jjhānaṃ
samāpannānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cittas. uppajjissati, no ca
tesaṃ tattha vacīs. uppajjissati; paṭhamajjhānaṃ samā-
pannānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ itaresaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāva-
carānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cittas. ca uppajjissati, vacīs. ca uppaj-
jissati.
     6. i. Yassa kayas. nuppajjissati, tassa vacīs. nuppajjis-
satīti? Yassa cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchi-
macittaṃ uppajjissati, rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchima-
bhavikānaṃ ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ uppajjitvā
parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ kāyas. nuppaj-
jissati, no ca tesaṃ vacīs. nuppajjissati; pacchimacitta-
samaṅgīnaṃ yassa cittassa anantarā avitakkāvicāra-
pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati, tesaṃ kāyas. ca nuppaj-
jissati, vacīs. ca nuppajjissati. Y. v. p. . . . pe . . .
Āmantā.
     Yassa kāyas. nuppajjissati, tassa cittas. nuppajjissatīti?
Yassa cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ
uppajjissati, rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ
ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāyis-
santi tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ kāyas. nuppajjissati, no ca
tesaṃ cittas. nuppajjissati; pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ tesaṃ
kāyas. ca nuppajjissati, cittas. ca nuppajjissati. Y. v. p.
cittas. . . . pe . . . Āmantā.
     Yassa vacīs. nuppajjissati, tassa cittas. nuppajjissatīti?
Yassa cittassa anantarā avitakka-avicāra-pacchimacittaṃ
uppajjissati, tesaṃ vacīs. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ cittas.
nuppajjissati; pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ tesaṃ vacīs. ca
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 238]
238                      Saṅkhārayamakaṃ
nuppajjissati, cittas. ca nuppajjissati. Y. v. p. . . . pe
. . . Āmantā.
     ii. Yattha kāyas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. kāyas. nuppajjissati, t. t. vacīs. nuppajjissatīti?
     Yassa cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ
uppajjissati, rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
kāyas. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha vacīs. nuppajjissati;
pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ yassa cittassa anantarā avitakka-avicāra-
pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati, catutthajjhānaṃ samāpan-
nānaṃ {asaññasattānaṃ} tesaṃ tattha kāyas. ca nuppajjissati,
vacīs. ca nuppajjissati. Y. v. p. y. vacīs. . . . Dutiyaj-
jhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs.
nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas. nuppajjissati;
pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ yassa cittassa anantarā avitakka-
avicāra-pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati, catutthajjhānaṃ samā-
pannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs. ca nuppaj-
jissati, kāyas. ca nuppajjissati.
     Y. y. kāyas. nuppajjissati, t. t. cittas. nuppajjissatīti?
Yassa cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ
uppajjissati, catutthajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ rūpāvaca-
rānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha kāyas. nuppajjissati,
no ca tesaṃ tattha cittas. nuppajjissati; pacchimacitta-
samaṅgīnaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha kāyas. ca nuppaj-
jissati, cittas. ca nuppajjissati. Y. v. p. y. . . . pe . . .
Āmantā.
     Y. y. vacīs. nuppajjissati, t. t. cittas. nuppajjissatīti?
Yassa cittassa anantarā avitakka-avicāra-pacchimacittaṃ
uppajjissati, dutiya-, tatiya-, catuttha-jjhānaṃ samāpan-
nānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
cittas. nuppajjissati; pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ asañña-
sattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs. ca nuppajjissati, cittas. ca
nuppajjissati. Y. v. p. . . . pe . . . Āmantā.
     7. i. Yassa kāyas. uppajjati, tassa vacīs. uppajjitthāti?
Āmantā. Y. v. p. vacīs. . . . Sabbesaṃ cittassa bhaṅgak-
khaṇe vinā assāsapassāsehi cittassa uppādakkhaṇe niro-
dhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ vacīs. uppajjittha,
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 239]
                          Saṅkhārayamakaṃ                   239
no ca tesaṃ kāyas. uppajjati; assāsapassāsānaṃ uppādak-
khaṇe tesaṃ vacīs. ca uppajjittha, kāyas. ca uppajjati.
     Yassa kāyas. uppajjati, tassa cittas. uppajjitthāti?
Āmantā. Y. v. p. cittas. uppajjittha, tassa
tassa kāyas. uppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ . . . (as in
preceding paragraph, substituting 3s for 2s).
     Yassa vacīs. uppajjati, tassa cittas. uppajjitthāti?
Āmantā. Y. v. p. cittas. . . . Sabbesaṃ cittassa bhaṅ-
gakkhaṇe vinā vitakkavicārehi cittassa {uppādakkhaṇe}
nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittas. uppaj-
jittha, no ca tesaṃ vacīs. uppajjati; vitakkavicārānaṃ
uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittas. ca uppajjittha, vacīs. ca
uppajjati.
     ii. Yattha kāyas. . . . pe . . .

jittha? Dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ1
assāsapassāsānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha kāyas.
uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha vacīs. uppajjittha; paṭhamaj-
jhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ
uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha kāyas. ca uppajjati, vacīs.
ca uppajjittha. Y. v. p. y. vacīs. . . . Paṭhamajjhānaṃ
samāpannānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ bhaṅ-
gakkhaṇe tesaṃ yeva vinā assāsapassāsehi cittassa uppādak-
khaṇe rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs.
uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas. uppajjati; paṭha-
majjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ assāsapassā-
sānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha vacīs. ca uppajjittha,
kāyas. ca uppajjati.
     Y. y. kāyas. . . . cittas. uppajjitthāti? Āmantā. Y. v.
p. y. cittas. . . . Sabbesaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe vinā
assāsapassāsehi cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha cittas.
uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas. uppajjati; assāsa-
passāsānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha cittas. ca uppaj-
jittha, kāyas. ca uppajjati.
     Y. y. vacīs. . . . cittas. uppajjitthāti? Āmantā. Y. v.
p. cittas. . . . Sabbesaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe vinā
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. inserts kāmāvacarānaṃ.


[page 240]
240                      Saṅkhārayamakaṃ
vitakkavicārehi cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha cittas.
uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha vacīs. uppajjati; vitak-
kavicārānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha cittas. ca uppaj-
jittha, vacīs. ca uppajjati.
     8. i. Yassa kayas. nuppajjati, tassa vacīs. nuppajjitthāti?
Uppajjittha. Y. v. p. . . . nuppajjatīti? Natthi.
     Yassa kāyas. nuppajjati, tassa cittas. nuppajjitthāti?
Uppajjittha. Y. v. p. . . . Natthi.
     Yassa vacīs. nuppajjati, tassa cittas. nuppajjitthāti?
Uppajjittha. Y. v. p. . . . Natthi.
     ii. Yattha kāyas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. kāyas. nuppajjati, tassa tattha vacīs. nuppaj-
jitthāti? Paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ
assāsapassāsānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ yeva vinā assāsa-
passāsehi cittassa uppādakkhaṇe rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāva-
carānaṃ tesaṃ tattha kāyas. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
vacīs. nuppajjittha; dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ samā-
pannānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ yeva vinā
assāsapassāsehi cittassa uppādakkhaṇe catutthajjhānaṃ
samāpannānaṃ suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte vattamāne
asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha kāyas. ca nuppajjati, vacīs.
ca nuppajjittha. Y. v. p. y. vacīs. . . . Dutiyajjhānaṃ
tatiyajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ uppādak-
khaṇe tesaṃ tattha vacīs. nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha
kāyas. nuppajjati; dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ samā-
pannānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ yeva vinā
assāsapassāsehi cittassa uppādakkhaṇe catutthajjhānaṃ
samāpannānaṃ suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte vattamāne
asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs. ca nuppajjittha, kāyas.
ca nuppajjati.
     Y. y. kāyas. nuppajjati, t. t. cittas. nuppajjitthāti?
Sabbesan cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe vinā assāsapassāsehi
cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha kāyas. nuppajjati, no
ca tesaṃ tattha cittas. nuppajjittha; suddhāvāsaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha kāyas. ca nuppajjati,
cittas. ca nuppajjittha. Y. v. p. . . . pe . . . Āmantā.
     Y. y. vacīs. nuppajjati, tassa tattha cittas. nuppajjitthāti?

[page 241]
                          Saṅkhārayamakaṃ                   241
Sabbesaṃ . . . (as in last corresponding reply, substituting
vitakkavicārehi for assāsapassāsehi, and 2s for 1s). Y. v.
p. y. . . . pe . . . Āmantā.
     9. i. Yassa kāyas. uppajjati, tassa vacīs. uppajjissatīti?
Āmantā. Y. v. p. vacīs. . . . Sabbesaṃ cittassa bhaṅ-
gakkhaṇe vinā assāsapassāsehi cittassa uppādakkhaṇe
nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ vacīs. uppaj-
jissati, no ca tesaṃ kāyas. uppajjati; assāsapassāsānaṃ
uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ {vacīs}. ca uppajjisati, kāyas. ca
uppajjati.
     Yassa kāyas. uppajjati, tassa cittas. uppajjissatīti?
Āmantā. Y. v. p. cittas. . . . Sabbesaṃ . . . (as in last
corresponding answer, substituting 3s for 2s).
     Yassa vacīs. uppajjati, tassa cittas. uppajjissatīti?
Savitakka-savicāra-pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ
vacīs. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cittas. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ
vitakkavicārānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ vacīs. ca uppajjati,
cittas. ca uppajjissati. Y. v. p. cittas. . . . Sabbesaṃ (as
in last corresponding reply, substituting vitakka-vicārehi for
assāsa--) . . . no ca tesaṃ vacīs. uppajjati; vitakka-
vicārānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittas. ca uppajjissati, vacīs.
ca uppajjati.
     ii. Yattha kāyas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. kāyas. uppajjati, t. t. vacīs. uppajjissatīti?
Dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ assāsapassā-
sānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha kāyas. uppajjati, no ca
tesaṃ tattha vacīs. uppajjissati; paṭhamajjhānaṃ samā-
pannānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe
tesaṃ tattha kāyas. ca uppajjati, vacīs. ca uppajjissati.
Y. v. p. y. vacīs. . . . Paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ
kāmāvacarānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ yeva
vinā assāsapassāsehi cittassa uppādakkhaṇe rūpāvacarānaṃ
arūpāvacarānaṃ tesan tattha vacīs. uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha kāyas. uppajjati; paṭhamajjhānaṃ . . . pe . . .
uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha vacīs. ca uppajjissati, kāyas. ca
uppajjati.
     Y. y. kāyas. . . . cittas. uppajjissatīti? Āmantā. Y. v
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 242]
242                      Saṅkhārayamakaṃ
p. y. cittas. . . . Sabbesaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe vinā
assāsapassāsehi cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha cittas.
uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas. uppajjati; assāsa-
passāsānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha cittas. ca uppajjis-
sati, kāyas. ca uppajjati.
     Y. y. vacīs. uppajjati, t. t. cittas. uppajjissatīti?
Savitakka-savicāra-pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ
tattha vacīs. uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha cittas. uppajjis-
sati; itaresaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha
vacīs. ca uppajjati, cittas. ca uppajjissati. Y. v. p. y.
cittas. . . . Sabbesaṃ . . . (as in preceding paragraph,
substituting vitakka-vicāra for assāsapassāsa, and 2s for 1s).
     10. i. Yassa kāyas. nuppajjati, tassa vacīs. nuppajjissa-
tīti? Sabbesaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe vinā assāsapassāsehi
cittassa uppādakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasat-
tānaṃ tesaṃ kāyas. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ vacīs. nuppaj-
jissati; pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ yassa cittassa anantarā1
avitakka1-avicārapacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati, tesaṃ kāyas.
ca nuppajjati, vacīs. ca nuppajjissati. Y. v. p. vacīs. . . .
pe . . . Āmantā.
     Yassa kāyas. nuppajjati, tassa cittas. nuppajjissatīti?
Sabbesaṃ . . . (as in last corresponding answer) . . .
cittas. nuppajjissati; pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ tesaṃ
kāyas. ca nuppajjati, cittas. ca nuppajjissati. Y. v. p.
. . . pe . . . Āmantā.
     Yassa vacīs. nuppajjati, tassa cittas. nuppajjissatīti?
Sabbesaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe vinā vitakkavicārehi cit-
tassa uppādakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ
tesaṃ vacīs. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cittas. nuppajjissati;
savitakkasavicārapacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe avitakka-
avicārapacchimacittassa2 uppādakkhaṇe3 tesaṃ vacīs. ca
nuppajjati, cittas. ca nuppajjissati. Y. v. p. cittas. . . .
Savitakka-savicāra-pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ

Paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ assāsa-
passāsānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ yeva vinā assāsapassāsehi
cittassa uppādakkhaṇe rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha kāyas. nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha vacīs.
nuppajjissati; pacchimacittasamaṅgīnan yassa cittassa
anantarā avitakka-avicāra-pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati,
dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ assāsapas-

cittassa uppādakkhaṇe catutthajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ
asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha kāyas. ca nuppajjati, vacīs.
ca nuppajjissati. Y. v. p. y. vacīs. . . . Dutiyajjhānaṃ
tatiyajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ uppādak-
khaṇe tesaṃ tattha vacīs. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
kāyas. nuppajjati; pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ yassa cittassa

dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ assāsapassā-
sānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ yeva vinā assāsapassāsehi
cittassa uppādakkhaṇe catutthajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ
asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs. ca nuppajjissati, kāyas.
ca nuppajjati.

     11. i. Yassa kāyas. uppajjittha, tassa vacīs. uppajjissa-

avitakka-avicārapacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati; tesaṃ kāyas.

kayās. ca uppajjittha, vacīs. ca uppajjissati. Y. v. p. . . .
pe . . . Āmantā.

ca tesaṃ cittas. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ kāyas. ca uppajjittha,
cittas. ca uppajjissati. Y. v. p. cittas. . . . pe . . .
Āmantā.
     Yassa vacīs. uppajjittha, tassa cittas. uppajjissatīti?

tesaṃ cittas. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ vacīs. ca uppajjittha,
cittas. ca uppajjissati. Y. v. p. cittas. . . . pe . . .
Āmantā.

tattha kāyas. ca uppajjittha, vacīs. ca uppajjissati. Y. v.
p. y. vacīs. . . . Rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ

tattha vacīs. uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas. uppaj-
jittha; paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ

     Y. y. kāyas. uppajjittha, t. t. cittas. uppajjissatīti?
Kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ tesaṃ tattha

kāmāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha kāyas. ca uppajjittha, cittas.
ca uppajjissati. Y. v. p. y. cittas. . . . Catutthajjhānaṃ

carānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cittas. ca uppajjissati, kāyas. ca

tattha vacīs. ca uppajjittha, cittas. ca uppajjissati. Y. v.
p. y. cittas. . . . Avitakka-avicārabhūmiyaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cittas. uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha vacīs. uppajjittha;
savitakka-savicārabhūmiyaṃ tesaṃ tattha cittas. ca uppaj-
jissati, vacīs. ca uppajjittha.
     12. i. Yassa kāyas. nuppajjittha, tassa vacīs. nuppajjis-
satīti? Natthi. Y. v. p. vacīs. . . . pe . . . Uppajjittha.

Natthi. Y. v. p. . . . pe . . . Uppajjittha.
     Yassa vacīs. nuppajjittha, tassa cittas. nuppajjissatīti?
Natthi. Y. v. p. . . . pe . . . Uppajjittha.
     ii. Yattha kāyas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. kāyas. nuppajjittha, t. t. vacīs. nuppajjissatīti?
Rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha kāyas. nup-
pajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha vacīs. nuppajjissati; rūpāva-
care arūpāvacare savitakka-savicāra-pacchimacittassa bhaṅ-
gakkhaṇe avitakka-avicāra-pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ yassa

jissati, catutthajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ

tesaṃ tattha kāyas. ca nuppajjittha, vacīs. ca nuppajjissati.
Y. v. p. y. vacīs. . . . Kāmāvacare pacchimacittasamaṅ-
gīnaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha vacīs. nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas.
nuppajjittha; rūpāvacare arūpāvacare savitakka-savicāra-
pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe avitakka-avicāra-pacchima-
cittasamaṅgīnaṃ yassa cittassa anantarā avitakka-avicāra-
pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati, catutthajjhānaṃ samāpannānan
asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs. ca nuppajjissati, kāyas.
ca nuppajjittha.
     Y. y. kāyas. nuppajjittha, t. t. cittas. nuppajjissatīti?

jittha, cittas. ca nuppajjissati. Y. v. p. y. cittas. . . .

nuppajjissati no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas. nuppajjittha;
rūpāvacare . . . (as in foregoing answer, transposing 1s
and 3s clauses).
     Y. y. vacīs. nuppajjittha, t. t. cittas. nuppajjissatīti?
Avitakka-avicārabhūmiyaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs. nuppajjittha,
no ca tesaṃ tattha cittas. nuppajjissati; avitakka-avicāra-
bhūmiyaṃ pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha vacīs. ca nuppajjittha, cittas. ca nuppajjissati.

pacchimacittasamaṅgīnan tesaṃ tattha cittas. nuppajjissati,
no ca tesaṃ vacīs. nuppajjittha; avitakka-avicārabhūmiyaṃ
pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cittas. ca nuppajjissati, vacīs. ca nuppajjittha.
                       UPPĀDAVĀRAṂ NIṬṬHITAṂ.1

1 Br. uppādavāro niṭṭhito.


[page 247]
                          Saṅkhārayamakaṃ                   247
                           [Nirodhavāro. ]
     1. i. Yassa kāyas. nirujjhati, tassa vacīs. nirujjhatīti?
Vinā vitakkavicārehi assāsapassāsānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe
tesaṃ kāyas. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ vacīs. nirujjhati;
paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ assāsa-
passāsānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ kāyas. ca nirujjhati,
vacīs. ca nirujjhati. Y. v. p. vacīs. . . . Vinā assāsa-
passāsehi vitakkavicārānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ vacīs.
nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ kāyas. nirujjhati; paṭhamajjhānaṃ
samāpannānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ bhaṅ-
gakkhaṇe tesaṃ vacīs. ca nirujjhati, kāyas. ca nirujjhati.
     Yassa kāyas. nirujjhati, tassa cittas. nirujjhatīti?
Āmantā. Y. v. p. cittas. . . . Vinā assāsapassāsehi
cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittas. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ
kāyas. nirujjhati; assāsapassāsānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ
cittas. . . . kāyas. ca nirujjhati.
     Yassa vacīs. nirujjhati, tassa cittas. nirujjhatīti?
Āmantā. Y. v. p. cittas. . . . Vinā vitakkavicārehi
cittassa, bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittas. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ
vacīs. nirujjhati; vitakkavicārānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ
cittas. . . . vacīs. ca nirujjhati.
     ii. Yattha kāyas. nirujjhati, tattha vacīs. nirujjhatīti?*
Dutiyajjhāne tatiyajjhāne tattha kāyas. nirujjhati, no ca
tattha vacīs. nirujjhati; . . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. kāyas. nirujjhati . . . pe . . . (yassakam pi
yassayatthakam pi sadisaṃ.)
     2. i. Yassa kāyas. na nirujjhati, tassa vacīs. na niruj-
jhatīti? Vinā assāsapassāsehi vitakkavicārānaṃ bhaṅ-
gakkhaṇe tesaṃ kāyas. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ vacīs.
na nirujjhati; sabbesaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe vinā
assāsapassāsehi avitakka-avicāra-cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ kāyas. ca na
nirujjhati, vacīs. ca na nirujjhati. Y. v. p. vacīs. . . .
Vinā vitakkavicārehi assāsapassāsānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe
tesaṃ vacīs. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ kāyas. na niruj-

* to * Br. omits.

1s and 2s).
     Yassa kāyas. na nirujjhati, tassa cittas. na nirujjhatīti?

na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ cittas. na nirujjhati; sabbesaṃ

cittas. . . . pe . . . Āmantā.

Vinā vitakkavicārehi cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ vacīs.
na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ cittas. na nirujjhati; sabbesaṃ

asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha kāyas. ca na nirujjhati, vacīs.
ca na nirujjhati . . . pe . . .
     3. (Yassakam pi yassayatthakam pi sadisaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.

jhitthāti? Āmantā . . . pe2 . . . (yathā Uppādavāre atītā
pucchā yassakaṃ pi yassayatthakaṃ pi anulomaṃ pi paccaniyaṃ
pi vibhattaṃ, evaṃ NIrodhavāre pi vibhajitabbaṃ. Natthi3
nānākaraṇaṃ.
     5. i. Yassa kāyas. nirujjhissati, tassa vacīs. nirujjhis-
satīti? Āmantā. Y. v. p. vacīs. . . . Kāmāvacarānaṃ
pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā

                          Saṅkhārayamakaṃ                   249
kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati rūpāvacare
arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ
arūpāvacaraṃ uppajjitva parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ cavan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ vacīs. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ kāyas.
nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ vacīs.1 ca nirujjhissati, kāyas. ca
nirujjhissati.
     Yassa kāyas. . . . cittas. nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.
Y. v. p. cittas. . . . Kāmāvacarānaṃ . . . (as in last
corresponding answer, substituting 3s for 2s).
     Yassa vacīs. nirujjhissati, tassa cittas. nirujjhissatīti?
Āmantā. Y. v. p. cittas. . . . Avitakka-avicārapacchi-
macittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā avitakka-
avicārapacchimacittaṃ uppajjissāti, tesaṃ cittas. niruj-
jhissati, no ca tesaṃ vacīs. nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ cittas.
ca nirujjhissati, vacīs. ca nirujjhissati.
     ii. Yattha kāyas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. kāyas. nirujjhissati, t. t. vacīs. nirujjhissatīti?
Dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
kāyas. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha vacīs. nirujjhissati;
paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha kāyas. ca nirujjhissati, vacīs. ca nirujjhissati.
Y. v. p. y. vacīs. . . . Kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittassa
uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ
pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha vacīs. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas.
nirujjhissati; paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ itaresaṃ
kāmāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs. ca nirujjhissati, kāyas.
ca nirujjhissati.
     Y. y. kāyas. nirujjhissati, t. t. cittas. nirujjhissatīti?
Āmantā. Y. v. p. y. cittas. . . . Kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchi-
macittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā kāmā-
vacarānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati catutthajjhānaṃ
samāpannānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
cittas. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas. nirujjhissati;
paṭhama-, dutiya-, tatiya-jjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ itaresaṃ
kāmāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cittas. ca nirujjhissati, kāyas.
ca nirujjhissati.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. inserts tesaṃ.


[page 250]
250                      Saṅkhārayamakaṃ
     Y. y. vacīs. . . . cittas. nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.
Y. v. p. y. cittas. . . . Avitakka-avicāra-pacchimacittassa
uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā avitakka-avicāra-
pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati dutiya-, tatiya-, catuttha-
jjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cittas. nirujjhissati,
no ca tesaṃ tattha vacīs. nirujjhissati; paṭhamajjhānaṃ
samāpannānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ itaresaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ
arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cittas. ca nirujjhissati, vacīs.
ca nirujjhissati.
     6. i. Yassa kāyas. na nirujjhissati, tassa vacīs. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittassa uppādak-
khaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchima-
cittaṃ uppajjissati rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchimabha-
vikānaṃ ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ uppajjitvā
parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ kāyas. na niruj-
jhissati, no ca tesaṃ vacīs. na nirujjhissati; savitakka-
savicāra-pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe avitakka-avicāra-
pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ yassa cittassa anantarā avitakka-
avicāra-pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati, tesaṃ kāyas. ca na
nirujjhissati, vacīs. ca na nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. vacīs.
. . . pe . . . Āmantā.
     Yassa kāyas. na nirujjhissati, tassa cittas. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Kāmāvacarānaṃ . . . (as in last corresponding
answer) . . . no ca tesaṃ cittas. na nirujjhissati; pacchima-
cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ kāyas. ca na nirujjhissati,
cittas. ca na nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. cittas. . . . pe . . .
Āmantā.
     Yassa vacīs. na nirujjhissati, tassa cittas. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Avitakka-avicāra-pacchimacittassa uppādak-
khaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā avitakka-avicāra-pacchima-
cittaṃ uppajjissati, tesaṃ vacīs. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ
cittas. na nirujjhissati; pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
tesaṃ vacīs. ca na nirujjhissati, cittas. ca na nirujjhissati.
Y. v. p. cittas. . . . pe . . . Āmantā.
     ii. Yattha kāyas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. kāyas. na nirujjhissati, t. t. vacīs. na nirujjhis-
satīti? Kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 251]
                          Saṅkhārayamakaṃ                   251
yassa cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ
uppajjissati, rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
kāyas. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha vacīs. na niruj-
jhissati; savitakka-savicāra-pacchimacittassa bhaṅgak-
khaṇe avitakka-avicāra-pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ yassa
cittassa anantarā avitakka-avicāra-pacchimacittaṃ1 uppaj-
jissati, catutthajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha kāyas. ca na nirujjhissati, vacīs. ca na niruj-
jhissati. Y. v. p. y. vacīs. . . . Dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyaj-
jhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs. na nirujjhissati,
no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas. na nirujjhissati; savitakka-
savicāra . . . (as in foregoing answer, transposing 1s and 2s).
     Y. y. kāyas. na nirujjhissati, t. t. cittas. na nirujjhis-
satīti? Kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe
yassa cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ
uppajjissati catutthajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha kāyas. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
cittas. na nirujjhissati; pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha kāyas. ca na nirujjhissati,
cittas. ca na nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. y. cittas. . . . pe . . .
Āmantā.
     Y. y. vacīs. na nirujjhissati, t. t. cittas. na nirujjhissatīti?
Avitakka-avicāra-pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa
cittassa anantarā avitakka-avicāra-pacchimacittaṃ uppaj-
jissati dutiya-, tatiya-, catuttha-jjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha vacīs. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha cittas.
na nirujjhissati; pacchimacittassa . . . (as in last corresponding
answer, substituting 2s for 1s). Y. v. p. y. cittas.
. . . pe . . . Āmantā.
     7. i. Yassa kāyas. nirujjhati, tassa vacīs. nirujjhitthāti?
Āmantā. Y. v. p. vacīs. . . Sabbesaṃ cittassa uppādak-
khaṇe vinā assāsapassāsehi cittassa {bhaṅgakkhaṇe} nirodha-
samāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ vacīs. nirujjhittha,
no ca tesaṃ kāyas. nirujjhati; assāsapassāsānaṃ bhaṅgak-
khaṇe tesaṃ vacīs. ca nirujjhittha, kayas. ca nirujjhati.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Br. has here avicāra-pacchimacittaṃ, elsewhere avicāraṃ.


[page 252]
252                      Saṅkhārayamakaṃ
     Yassa kāyas. nirujjhati, tassa cittas. nirujjhitthāti?
Āmantā. Y. v. p. cittas. . . . Sabbesaṃ . . . (as in last
corresponding answer, substituting 3s for 2s)
     Yassa vacīs. . . . cittas. nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā.
Y. v. p. cittas. . . . Sabbesaṃ . . . (as in foregoing
answer, substituting vitakkavicāra for assāsapassāsa-, and
2s for 1s).
     ii. Yattha kāyas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. kāyas. nirujjhati, t. t. vacīs. nirujjhitthāti?
Dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ assāsapassā-
sānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha kāyas. nirujjhati, no ca
tesaṃ tattha vacīs. nirujjhittha; paṭhamajjhānaṃ samā-
pannānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe
tesaṃ tattha kāyas. ca nirujjhati, vacīs. ca nirujjhittha.
Y. v. p. y. vacīs. . . . Paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ
kāmāvacarānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ
yeva vinā assāsapassāsehi cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe rūpā-
vacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs. nirujjhittha,
no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas. nirujjhati; paṭhamajjhānaṃ
samāpannānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ bhaṅ-
gakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha vacīs. ca nirujjhittha kāyas. ca
nirujjhati.
     Y. y. kāyas. . . .cittas. nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā. Y. v.
p. y. cittas. . . . Sabbesaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe vinā
assāsapassāsehi cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha cittas.
nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas. nirujjhati; assāsa-
passāsānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha cittas. ca niruj-
jhittha, kāyas. ca nirujjhati.
     Y. y. vacīs. . . . cittas. nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā. Y. v.
p. y. cittas. . . . Sabbesaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe vinā
vitakkavicārehi cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha cittas.
nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha vacīs. nirujjhati; vitakka-
vicārānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha cittas. ca nirujjhittha,
vacīs. ca nirujjhati.
     8. i. Yassa kāyas. na nirujjhati, tassa vacīs. na niruj-
jhitthāti? Nirujjhittha. Y. v. p. vacīs. . . . Natthi.
     Yassa kāyas. . . .cittas. na nirujjhitthāti? Nirujjhittha.
Y. v. p. cittas. . . . Natthi.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 253]
                     Saṅkhārayamakaṃ                        253
     Yassa vacīs. . . . cittas. na nirujjhitthāti? Nirujjhittha.
Y. v. p. cittas. . . . Natthi.
     ii. Yattha kāyas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. kāyas. na nirujjhati, t. t. vacīs. na nirujjhis-
satīti? Paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ
assāsapassāsānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ yeva vinā assāsa-
passāsehi cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpā-
vacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha kāyas. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha vacīs. na nirujjhittha; dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ
samāpannānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ yeva
vinā assāsapassāsehi cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe catutthaj-
jhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte vatta-
māne asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha kāyas. ca na nirujjhati,
vacīs. ca na nirujjhittha. Y. v. p. y. vacīs. . . . Duti-
yajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ
bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha vacīs. na nirujjhittha, no ca
tesaṃ tattha kāyas. na nirujjhati; dutiyajjhānaṃ . . .
(as above) . . . uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ yeva vinā assāsapassā-
sehi cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe catutthajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ
suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte vattamāne asaññasattānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha vacīs. ca na nirujjhittha, kāyas. ca na
nirujjhati.
     Y. y. kāyas. na nirujjhati, t. t. cittas. na nirujjhitthāti?
Sabbesaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe vinā assāsapassāsehi cit-
tassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha kāyas. na nirujjhati, no
ca tesaṃ tattha cittas. na nirujjhittha; suddhāvāsaṃ uppaj-
jantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha kāyas. ca na niruj-
jhati, cittas. ca na nirujjhittha. Y. v. p. y. cittas. . . .
pe . . . Āmantā.
     Y. y. vacīs. na nirujjhati, t. t. cittas. na nirujjhitthāti?
Sabbesaṃ . . . (as in last corresponding answer, substituting
vitakkavicāra for assāsa-, and 2s for 1s). Y. v. p. y. cittas.
. . . pe . . . Āmantā.
     9. i. Yassa kāyas. nirujjhati . . . nirujjhissatīti?
Āmantā. Y. v. p. vacīs. . . . Sabbesaṃ cittassa uppā-
dakkhaṇe vinā assāsapassāsehi cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
nirodhassamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ vacīs. niruj-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 254]
254                      Saṅkhārayamakaṃ
jhissati, no ca tesaṃ kāyas. nirujjhati; assāsapassāsānaṃ
bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ vacīs. ca nirujjhissati, kāyas. ca
nirujjhati.
     Yassa kāyas. . . . cittas. nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.
Y. v. p. cittas. . . . Sabbesaṃ . . . (as in last corresponding
answer, substituting 3s for 2s).
     Yassa vacīs. nirujjhati, tassa cittas. nirujjhissatīti?
Savitakka-savicāra-pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ
vacīs. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ cittas. nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ
vitakkavicārānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ vacīs. ca nirujjhati,
cittas. ca nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. cittas. . . . Sabbesaṃ
cittassa uppādakkhaṇe vinā vitakkavicārehi cittassa bhaṅ-
gakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ
cittas. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ vacīs. nirujjhati; vitakka-
vicārānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ [tattha]1 cittas. ca niruj-
jhissati, vacīs. ca nirujjhati.
     ii. Yattha kāyas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. kāyas. nirujjhati, t. t. vacīs. nirujjhissatīti?
Dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ assāsapassā-
sānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha kāyas. nirujjhati, no ca
tesaṃ tattha vacīs. nirujjhissati; paṭhamajjhānaṃ samā-
pannānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe
tesaṃ tattha kāyas. ca nirujjhati, vacīs. ca nirujjhissati.
Y. v. p. y. vacīs. . . . Paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ
kāmāvacarānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ
yeva vinā assāsapassāsehi cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe rūpā-
vacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs. nirujjhissati,
no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas. nirujjhati; paṭhamajjhānaṃ
samāpannānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ bhaṅ-
gakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha vacīs. ca nirujjhissati, kāyas. ca
nirujjhati.
     Y. y. kāyas. . . . cittas. nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.
Y. v. p. y. cittas. . . . Sabbesaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe
vinā assāsapassāsehi cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha
cittas. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas. nirujjhati;
assāsapassāsānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha cittas. ca
nirujjhissati, kāyas. ca nirujjhati.

1 Occurs in all three versions.


[page 255]
                          Saṅkhārayamakaṃ                   255
     Y. y. vacīs. nirujjhati, t. t. cittas. nirujjhissatīti?
Savitakka-savicāra-pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ
tattha vacīs. nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha cittas. nirujjhis-
sati; itaresaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesan tattha
vacīs. ca nirujjhati, cittas. ca nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. y. . . .
Sabbesaṃ . . . (as in last corresponding answer, substituting
vitakkavicāra for assāsa-, and 2s for 1s).
     10. i. Yassa kāyas. na nirujjhati, tassa vacīs. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Sabbesaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe vinā assāsa-
passāsehi cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ
asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ kāyas. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ
vacīs. na nirujjhissati; savitakka-savicāra-pacchimacittassa
bhaṅgakkhaṇe avitakka-avicāra-pacchimacittasamaṅgīnan
yassa cittassa anantarā avitakka-avicāra-pacchimacittaṃ
uppajjissati tesaṃ kāyas. ca na nirujjhati, vacīs. ca na
nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. vacīs. . . . pe . . . Āmantā.
     Yassa kāyas. na nirujjhati, tassa cittas. na nirujjhissa-
tīti? Sabbesaṃ . . . (as in last corresponding answer) . . .
no ca tesaṃ cittas. na nirujjhissati; pacchimacittassa
bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ kāyas. ca na nirujjhati, cittas. ca na
nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. cittas. . . . pe . . . Āmantā.
     Yassa vacīs. na nirujjhati, tassa cittas. na nirujjhissatīti?
Sabbesaṃ . . . (as in last corresponding answer, substituting
vitakkavicāra-) . . . no ca tesaṃ cittas. na nirujjhissati;
avitakka-avicāra-pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ
vacīs. ca na nirujjhati, cittas. ca na nirujjhissati. Y. v. p.
cittas. . . Savitakka-savicāra-pacchimacittassa bhaṅ-
gakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittas. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ vacīs.
na nirujjhati; avitakka-avicāra- . . . pe . . .
     ii. Yattha kāyas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. kāyas. na nirujjhati, t. t. vacīs. na nirujjhis-
satīti? Paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ
assāsapassāsānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ yeva vinā assāsa-
passāsehi cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpā-
vacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha kāyas. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ
tattha vacīs. na nirujjhissati; savitakka-savicāra-pacchima-
cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe avitakka-avicāra-pacchimacittasam-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 256]
256                      Saṅkhārayamakaṃ
{aṅgīnaṃ} yassa cittassa anantarā avitakka-avicāra-
pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ
samāpannānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ yeva
vinā assāsapassāsehi cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe catutthaj-
jhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ asaññasattānan tesaṃ tattha kāyas.
ca na nirujjhati, vacīs. ca na nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. y.
vacīs. . . . Dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ
assāsapassāsānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha vacīs. na
nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas. na nirujjhati;
savitakka-savicāra-pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
avitakka-avicāra-pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ yassa cittassa
anantarā avitakka-avicāra-pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati
dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ assāsapassā-
sānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ yeva vinā assāsapassāsehi
cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe catutthajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ
asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs. ca na nirujjhissati,
kāyas. ca na nirujjhati.
     Y. y. kāyas. na nirujjhati, t. t. cittas. na nirujjhissatīti?
Sabbesaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe vinā assāsapassāsehi
cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha kāyas. na nirujjhati,
no ca tesaṃ tattha cittas. na nirujjhissati; pacchimacittassa
bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha kāyas. ca na
nirujjhati, cittas. ca na nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. y. cittas.
. . . Āmantā.
     Y. y. vacīs. na nirujjhati, t. t. cittas. na nirujjhissatīti?
Sabbesaṃ . . . (as in last corresponding answer, substituting
vitakkavicāra, and prefixing avitakka-avicāra to pacchima-
cittassa). Y. v. p. y. cittas. . . . Savitakka-savicāra-
pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha cittas. na
nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha vacīs. na nirujjhati;
avitakka-avicāra-pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe asañña-
sattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cittas. ca na nirujjhissati, vacīs. ca
na nirujjhati.
     11. i. Yassa kāyas. nirujjhittha, tassa vacīs. niruj-
jhissatīti? Savitakkasavicārapacchimacittassa bhaṅgak-
khaṇe avitakka-avicārapacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ yassa
cittassa anantarā avitakka-avicārapacchimacittaṃ uppaj-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 257]
                          Saṅkhārayamakaṃ                   257
jissati, tesaṃ kāyas. nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ vacīs. niruj-
jhissati; itaresaṃ kāyas. ca nirujjhittha, vacīs. ca niruj-
jhissati. Y. v. p. vacīs. . . . pe . . . Āmantā.
     Yassa kāyas. nirujjhittha, tassa cittas. nirujjhissatīti?
Pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ kāyas. nirujjhittha,
no ca tesaṃ cittas. nirujjhissati; itaresaṃ kāyas. ca niruj-
jhittha, cittas. ca nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. cittas. . . . pe . . .
Āmantā.
     ii. Yattha kāyas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. kāyas. nirujjhittha, t. t. vacīs. nirujjhissatīti?
Kāmāvacare pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe dutiyajjhānaṃ
tatiyajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ tesaṃ tattha kāyas. niruj-
jhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha vacīs. nirujjhissati; paṭhamaj-
jhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ itaresaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha kāyas. ca nirujjhittha, vacīs. ca nirujjhissati.
Y. v. p. y. vacīs. . . . Rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha vacīs. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas.
nirujjhittha; paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ kāmāva-
carānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs. ca nirujjhissati, kāyas. ca
nirujjhittha.
     Y. y. kāyas. nirujjhittha, t. t. cittas. nirujjhissatīti?
Kāmāvacare pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha
kāyas. {nirujjhittha}, no ca tesaṃ tattha cittas. nirujjhissati;
paṭhama-, dutiya-, tatiya-jjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ itaresaṃ
kāmāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha kāyas. ca nirujjhittha, cittas
ca nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. y. cittas. . . . Catutthajjhānaṃ
samāpannānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesan tattha
cittas. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas. nirujjhittha;
paṭhama-, dutiya-, tatiya-jjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ kāmā-
vacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cittas. ca nirujjhissati, kāyas. ca
nirujjhittha.
     Y. y. vacīs. . . . nirujjhissatīti? Savitakka-savicāra-
bhūmiyaṃ pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha
vacīs. nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha cittas. nirujjhissati;
itaresaṃ savitakka-savicārabhūmiyaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs. ca
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. (footnote): Ito paraṃ pruimasadisaṃ, tasmā idha
     na dassitan ti veditabbaṃ.


[page 258]
258                      Saṅkhārayamakaṃ
nirujjhittha, citta. ca nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. y. cittas. . . .
Avitakka-avicārabhūmiyan tesaṃ tattha cittas. nirujjhissati,
no ca tesaṃ tattha vacīs. nirujjhittha; savitakka-savicāra-
bhūmiyaṃ tesaṃ tattha cittas. ca nirujjhissati, vacīs. ca
nirujjhittha.
     12. i. Yassa kāyas. na nirujjhittha, tassa vacīs. na
nirujjhissatīti? Natthi. Y. v. p. vacīs. . . . Nirujjhittha.
     Yassa kāyas. . . . cittas. na nirujjhissatīti? Natthi.
Y. v. p. cittas. . . . Nirujjhittha.
     Yassa vacīs. . . . cittas. na nirujjhissatīti? Natthi.
Y. v. p. cittas. . . . Nirujjhittha.
     Yassa vacīs. . . . na nirujjhissatīti? Natthi. Y. v. p.
cittas. . . . Nirujjhittha.
     ii. Yattha kāyas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. kāyas. na nirujjhittha, t. t. vacīs. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
kāyas. na nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha vacīs. na niruj-
jhissati; rūpāvacare arūpāvacare savittakkasavicārapac-
chimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe avitakka-avicāra-pacchima-
cittasamaṅgīnaṃ yassa cittassa anantarā avitakka-avicāra-
pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati, catutthajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ
asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha kāyas. ca na nirujjhittha,
vacīs. ca na nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. y. vacīs. . . . Kāmā-
vacare pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe dutiyajjhānaṃ
tatiyajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs. na niruj-
jhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas. na nirujjhittha; rūpā-
vacare arūpāvacare avitakkā1-avicāra2-pacchimacittassa
bhaṅgakkhaṇe avitakka-avicāra-pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ
yassa cittassa anantarā avitakka-avicārapacchimacittaṃ
uppajjissati catutthajjhānaṃ . . . (as in foregoing answer,
transposing last two clauses).
     Y. y. kāyas. . . . cittas. na nirujjhissatīti? Catutthaj-
jhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha kāyas. na nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha
cittas. na nirujjhissati; rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchima-

1 and 2 Br. savitakka-savicāra-.


[page 259]
                          Saṅkhārayamakaṃ                   259
cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha kāyas.
ca na nirujjhittha, cittas. ca na nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. y.
cittas. . . . Kāmāvacare pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
tesaṃ tattha cittas. na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
kāyas. na nirujjhittha; rūpāvacare . . . (as in foregoing
answer, transposing last two clauses).
     Y. y. vacīs. . . . cittas. na nirujjhissatīti? Avitakka-
avicārabhūmiyaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs. na nirujjhittha, no ca
tesaṃ tattha cittas. na nirujjhissati; avitakka-avicāra-
bhūmiyaṃ pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha vacīs. ca na nirujjhittha, cittas. ca na niruj-
jhissati. Y. v. p. y. cittas. . . . Savitakka-savicārabhū-
miyaṃ pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha cittas.
na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha vacīs. na nirujjhittha;
avitakka-avicārabhūmiyaṃ pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cittas. ca na nirujjhissati,
vacīs. ca na nirujjhittha.
                       NIRODHAVĀRAṂ NIṬṬHITAṂ.
                       [Uppāda-nirodha-vāro].
     1. i. Yassa kāyas. uppajjati, tassa vacīs. nirujjhatīti?
No. Y. v. p. vacīs. . . . No.
     Yassa kāyas. uppajjati, tassa cittas. nirujjhatīti? No.
Y. v. p. cittas. . . . No.
     Yassa vacīs. uppajjati, tassa cittas. nirujjhatīti? No.
Y. v. p. . . . No.
     ii. Yattha kāyas. uppajjati, tattha vacīs. nirujjhatīti?
Dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ tattha* kāyas. uppajjati, no
ca tattha vacīs. nirujjhati; . . . pe . . .*1 (itaresaṃ
yatthakānaṃ sadisaṃ.
     iii. Y. y. {cross}kāyas. uppajjati, . . . pe . . .{cross}2 (yassakaṃ pi
yassayatthakaṃ pi sadisaṃ.)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. and Br. omit * to *.
2 S. and Br. omit {cross} to {cross}.


[page 260]
260                      Saṅkhārayamakaṃ
     2. i. Yassa kāyas. nuppajjati, tassa vacīs. na niruj-
jhatīti? Vitakkavicārānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ kāyas.
nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ vacīs. na nirujjhati; vinā assāsa-
passāsehi cittassa uppādakkhaṇe vinā vitakkavicārehi
cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasat-
tānaṃ tesaṃ kāyas. ca nuppajjati, vacīs. ca na nirujjhati.
Y. v. p. vacīs. . . . Assāsapassāsānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe
tesaṃ vacīs. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ kāyas. nuppajjati;
vinā assāsapassāsehi cittassa uppādakkhaṇe, vinā vitakka-
vicārehi cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe, nirodhasamāpannānaṃ
asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ vacīs. ca na nirujjhati, kāyas. ca
nuppajjati.
     Yassa kāyas. nuppajjati, tassa cittas. na nirujjhatīti?
Sabbesaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ kāyas. nuppajjati,
no ca tesaṃ cittas. na nirujjhati; vinā assāsapassāsehi
cittassa uppādakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasat-
tānaṃ tesaṃ kāyas. ca nuppajjati, cittas. ca na nirujjhati.
Y. v. p. cittas. . . . Assāsapassāsānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe
tesaṃ cittas. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ kāyas. nuppajjati;
vinā assāsapassāsehi cittassa uppādakkhaṇe nirodhasamā-
pannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittas. ca na nirujjhati,
kāyas. ca nuppajjati.
     Yassa vacīs nuppajjati, tassa cittas. na nirujjhatīti?
Sabbesaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ vacīs. nuppajjati,
no ca tesaṃ cittas. na nirujjhati; vinā vitakkavicārehi
cittassa uppādakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasat-
tānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs. ca nuppajjati, cittas. ca na niruj-
jhati. Y. v. p. cittas. . . . Vitakkavicārānaṃ uppādak-
khaṇe tesaṃ cittas. na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ vacīs. nuppaj-
jati; vinā vitakkavicārehi cittassa uppādakkhaṇe nirodha-
samāpannānaṃ tesaṃ cittas. ca na nirujjhati, vacīs. ca
nuppajjati.
     ii. Yattha kāyas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. kāyas. nuppajjati, . . . pe . . . (yassakaṃ pi
yassayatthakaṃ pi sadisaṃ. Yassayatthake nirodhasamā-
pannānan ti na labbhati.)
     3. i. Yassa kāyas. uppajjittha, tassa vacīs. nirujjhit-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


[page 261]
                          Saṅkhārayamakaṃ                   261
thāti? Āmantā. (Atītā pucchā Uppādavāre pi Nirodha-
vāre pi sadisaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
     5. i. Yassa kāyas. uppajjissati, tassa vacīs. nirujjhis-
satīti? Āmantā. Y. v. p. vacīs. . . . Kāmāvacarānaṃ
pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā
kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati, rūpāvacare
arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ
arūpāvacaraṃ uppajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ cavan-
tānaṃ tesaṃ vacīs. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ kāyas. uppaj-
jissati; itaresaṃ vacīs. ca nirujjhissati, kāyas. ca uppaj-
jissati.
     Yassa kāyas. uppajjissati, tassa cittas. nirujjhissatīti?
Āmantā. Y. v. p. cittas. . . . (as in last corresponding
answer, substituting 3s).
     Yassa vacīs. uppajjissati, tassa cittas. nirujjhissatīti?
Āmantā. Y. v. p. cittas. . . . Pacchimacittassa uppādak-
khaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā avitakka-avicāra-pacchima-
cittaṃ uppajjissati, tesaṃ cittas. nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ
vacīs. uppajjissati; itaresaṃ cittas. ca nirujjhissati, vacīs.
ca uppajjissati.
     ii. Yattha kāyas. . . . pe . . .
     iii. Y. y. kāyas. uppajjissati; t. t. vacīs. nirujjhissatīti?
Dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ tesaṃ tattha
kāyas. uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha vacīs. nirujjhissati;
paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ
tattha kāyas. ca uppajjissati, vacīs. ca nirujjhissati.
Y. v. p. y. vacīs. nirujjhissati, t. t. kāyas. uppajjissatīti.
Kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa
cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ uppaj-
jissati rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīs.
nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha kāyas. uppajjissati;
paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ itaresaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha vacīs. . . . pe . . .
     Y. y. kāyas. . . . cittas. nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.
Y. v. p. y. cittas. . . . Kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittassa
uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ
pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati catutthajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ

rūpāvacarānaṃ . . . (as in last corresponding answer, substituting
3s for 2s) . . . uppajjissati; paṭhama-, dutiya-,
tatiya-jjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ itaresaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ
tesaṃ tattha cittas. ca nirujjhissati, kāyas. ca uppajjissati.

     6. i. Yassa kāyas. nuppajjissati, tassa vacīs. na niruj-
jhissatīti? Kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittassa uppādak-

bhavikānaṃ ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ uppajjitvā
parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ kāyas. nuppaj-
jissati, no ca tesaṃ vacīs. na nirujjhissati; savitakka-
savicāra-pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe avitakka-avicāra-
pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ yassa cittassa anantarā avitakka-
avicāra-pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati tesaṃ kāyas. ca nuppaj-
jissati, vacīs. ca na nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. vacīs. . . . pe . . .

nirujjhissati; pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ vacīs.
ca nuppajjissati, cittas. ca na nirujjhissati. Y. v. p. cittas.

     ii. Yattha kāyas. . . . pe . . .
